Great way to have fun This club is a great way to get out and do things that you don’t or shouldn’t do on your own.  I.e. I’m from WI but joined a Tucson hiking group.  I had a great time hiking trails with experienced people happy to have take beginners out and introduce them to hiking in AZ.  The group was a good mix of experienced, beginners, locals and visitors.  I saw sights I would never had seen without Meetup.

Newby In the past I have tried Meet Up in a different city for business purposes.  I wasn’t impressed with the results.  This time I’m using Meet up for more social gatherings. I’m very impressed with the groups I’ve joined.  The people that have responded are fun and informative. the Meet up app makes it easy to keep track of events, dates, and messaging.   It has helped my transition to Savannah be less of a challenge.

Better than I even expected! I just started using the app to meet people since I am new to my city. It’s so wonderful! The suggestions for groups are great and even better is that it adds events to your calendar so when you open up waze for directions it already knows where you’re going!

Great app Love this app so far. I’ve been to 2 meetups, one mixed and one all female. I recommend the all female meet up groups! No awkwardness and you get to meet so many interesting and fabulous ladies!! So excited to continue making new friends and going on new adventures. Took off one star because the app is a little complex to use and understand. Especially when trying to search for a specific group.

Easy to use and reliable I have been using the Meetup app for several years and it’s a great way to network, organize and maintain meetings without having to have the knowledge of a Web admin to manage the page. It’s great and super easy to use! I even gave it I stalked in my cell phone and use it often to look up meeting details.

Organizer As a homeschool group organizer this app makes things simple. I can collect payments ahead of an event, take attendance, make each person as paid, send private messages or group messages on the discussion board, the events link to the calendar, it gives announcements and reminders. Sometimes it’s hard to load pictures but most of times it works just fine.

Meh This app is great in theory. Biggest issues is that there aren’t that many groups to begin with. Want a chess club? None. Want to be on any blind date? None. Want an open mic? They have one group for open mic but they meet up 200 miles away.

Great way to find friends We were wondering how to make friends in a new place.  So we created an event. Within 12 hours we had a full guest list for our event and dozens of people in our “group”. We just hosted our game night event, had a great time and are going to make it a weekly thing and now have 60 plus members in one week

Great App Joined to meet people and make friends. I have met people and made friends. It’s a great solution if you don’t happen to connect with anyone at work, are new in town, or just need to some new people in your life.

Ever present problems The basic premise and functionality of Meetup is solid, but the usability and features of both the app and the site have slowly declined, with more and more bugs, glitches, and problems with their app and system. I am constantly emailing support to tell them about issues but nothing ever seems to get fixed. Meetup feels like a half finished project that no one is working on. It’s a real shame too, because I have been paying ever increasing amounts for services that seem to be declining. Who knows when they’ll get their act together, very disappointing.

lack of help for app/wen functionality issues despite certain usability issues including  constant non-intuitive interface changes, this used to still be pretty good, esp for a free app, and the developers were responsive to user issues and even ideas for improvement (i’ve had one of mine implemented!), which i thought was amazing and much appreciated. however there are some persistent bugs, and nowadays contacting developers for help is utterly useless as “tickets” submitted through the app just disappear without a trace, without resolution, and without any response. i’m not even sure they really go through. it’s been like this for quite a while. the “contact” aspect needs to be fixed or removed altogether so that people aren’t wasting their time writing to no one.

Grace Yoga Studio I found Grace studio on Meetup and started going to classes this summer. They have yoga and Pilates classes. The instruction has been outstanding and the studio has a wonderful, warm, embracing feeling tone. Everyone who works there, including the owners, Katie and Jody, are lovely and caring people. This is a place where everyone can feel comfortable and at home. I am so glad I have discovered this studio!
Everyone needs meetup! Never be stuck home alone watching TV ever again!
Crash I love being apart of meetup but my problem is the app keeps crashing on my ipad and iphone... Pls fix thank you..

Nice but get rid of continual pop up I like the app but after going to an event I get asked every time if I want to review the event with a pop up. It is very annoying to have to close it every single time. If I want to give a review the first time I will, but hate being constantly asked!  Make an option so I can choose not to be asked again. Or better yet, take the feature out!

Perfect for organizing events Have been using Meetup since maybe 2011. Wish it was as popular here in USA as my experience with Hong Kong Hiking Meetup and Hong Kong Trail Runners while I lived there. You can put the one entire ‘who, what, when, how, why, where and more’ on the way events you organize. So people just have to read the info and click as going. So simple.

Socializing, Learning, Making Friends Meetup provides countless opportunities to engage with other people who share your interest in particular activities. Opportunities range from small discussion groups to sports to historic tours to hiking to book clubs, dancing, traveling, and much more. Soon after I was widowed I joined Meetup as a way of staying busy and making friends. Success!
All types of events for all types of interests I love this app! Easy to use! Loads of interests and events

Grateful for the MeetUps I’ve participated in MeetUps on tennis, ballroom dancing, and an inspired talk. It’s cheap to free and I have gained new friends, learning new things, and the possibilities to grow in even other new and interesting groups are amazing! I moved to San Antonio from Cincinnati in 2016 with no family and I’ve met people who I now consider family, from MeetUps. Thank you for the MeetUps and let’s keep growing!

Frustrating User Interface This app is more useful for me in my role as a member of someone else’s Meetup group than in my role as an organizer. Unfortunately, however, it’s not letting me find a new Meetup group I need. When I do a search on “grief,” it shows me only events offered by groups of which I am already a member. To find a group ABOUT grief, I have to browse through hundreds and hundreds of groups on myriad unrelated subjects. Therefore, I have not found the kind of group I need.

Helps me get out of the house I’m disabled and most of my friends from work and other areas of my life seemed to drop off when I had to quit my job 12 years ago and go on disability. The Meetup app helps me find other local people who are interested in the same things I am and makes me want to go out and try new things.

Great app for meeting likeminded people! I am new to the Portland Oregon area and didn’t know anyone here. I signed up for a couple of groups and found an instant community of people who like to do the things I like. Now that Fall is coming, I will be looking to add a couple of groups that are more suited to indoor activities such as a book club and perhaps crafts. So happy I found this app!

Meetup is one of my all-time favorite apps I am a work from home entrepreneur and I love the opportunities that Meetup gives me to meet with other like minded people. I’ve attend book clubs, a work from home coffees and several different networking events. Use the app to meet others that share your hobbies as well. The sky is the limit the people I’ve met are high caliber.

Great app for traveling This app is great for me since I’m in a new state and city every 3-6 months. It really helps me get out and be social and meet new people and make new friends all while doing something fun and I enjoy! If you are a traveling medical professional or just on a lengthy vacation, this app helps you to discover what’s going on around the area one is residing in. I tell all my friends and such about this app!

One of the worst apps! I wish someone else would step up and make an improved app- meetup is consistently garbage. My profile never works, I’m not able to see any events for groups that I belong to, every time I try to search for new groups it says ‘nothing available’ and now I can’t even sign in?!?!? Trying to sign in the login button isn’t working at all. Why won’t someone fix this app? Lots of people are just using Facebook to set up groups because this is so terrible and expects people to pay to set up groups on top of it all!! Insult to injury. Forget it.

Great App with great people I'm really enjoying the Meetups I've attended and looking forward to ones in the future. The only issues I've found with the app are the sketchy iPad compatibility and the inability to sort Meetup locations more thoroughly. I live next to a city which distance-wise is very close, but functionally is often an hour or more away. It'd be nice to be able to sort by state or travel time.

Cool app!!! Gets ‘Er done. I have found the Meetup app to be useful and very user friendly. It sends notifications of upcoming events and keeps you in the loop on any comments or changes to the events. I love the fact that it automatically add the events to my calendar when I indicate that I am attending. It also allows you to forward the Meetup to a friend which is pretty cool. Overall, I think it’s a great app. Give it a try!

Great app! I have been using this app for a couple weeks now after recently moving to a different state and it’s been really great at finding and meeting new people. My husband and I are in our 40’s and it’s hard to meet new friends. This app has made that a much easier task. Very easy to use and very helpful. Thank you!

So easy to use I love Meetup! The app works great. It’s easy to scroll and find groups, to sign up and to remove myself from a list when I change my mind. Easy to communicate with organizers and ask questions. It’s a great way to find things you might like or try new things. Or just find people with similar interests.

App ignores push notification settings I’ve turned off the push notification settings for one of my groups that always has chatter in the discussions.  The app doesn’t respect my settings - global settings are off and individual discussion post settings are off yet I still get tons of notifications. It’s annoying as hell and the only option is to leave the group. In the past hour, I’ve received at least 15 notifications when settings are off.
Fundamental Communal Game Changer This app has changed my life. I’ve met some of the most important people , who changed my life, gave it direction, added color and meaning.

Meetup- be brave enough! I have yet to attend a meet up event, but I appreciate the organizers of the various groups who take the time to lay out guidelines for specific expectations at the events and declare what the group’s purpose is right up front. You still have to be a courageous person to take that step and actually go to an event! Unfortunately for me, many of the events are in the bigger cities. That’s just how it goes!
Great for the most part I think Meetup is great for the most part. You get to meet people who have similar interests and I’ve made friends through it.

Meetup has introduced me to fantastic friends Meetup is an ideal place to make new friends with common interests. It’s a great venue (especially for those new to the area in our Portland,OR and surrounding cities). Hiking is a big one, concerts in the park, dancing, live music in the hundreds of clubs here), fantastic dining, and any number of activities. Meetup has forever changed my life in a positive way. Thank you

Meetup is a great way to network with people I have been using the meetup app for quite sometime now and it is amazing. Meetup is a great way to meet new people and network. I love that it gives you reminders on the calendar and notification on what time the events start. If you are looking for an app to meet new people and network then try Meetup.

Public Speaking: Outside the Comfort Zone It is the perfect place to get comfortable and improve your public speaking skills. The feedback from other great speakers is invaluable. It forces me to step out of my comfort zone. You know you are growing and improving your talents when you take that step outside your comfort zone. Lookout world, here comes the new and improved model of me.

A bit buggy but good overall There’s some annoying quirks between the app and the emails you receive but overall I have enjoyed it. I’ve been using meetup for a couple years and attended some amazing events I wouldn’t have found out about any other way. Even if you don’t join a group you can still browse to find out what’s going on in your city.

Awesome way to meet peeps! Yall, whoever came up w meetup is genius. I have been a member for several years and I dont see myself deleting this app soon. I got friends but sometimes I like to go out and meet new people. This is where it comes in. I pply attend about 2-4 events per year. Some are good some are just nah. Still, I enjoy it because it creates a sense of community.

Technology bringing strangers together What a fantastic way to meet like minded people! Pick a group that you’re interested in joining, keep notifications on so you can be notified of events to go to, and show up! Some gatherings are free, and other events vary on the venue. This app can be great if you are new to an area, in town for the weekend or enjoy meeting new people.

Great App. Easy To Navigate This is a really good app. It’s extremely helpful to people who have relocated to places where they don’t know people and are looking for things to do. Nothing bad to say about the app; only about the cities. If you move someplace where people don’t do much, you can start a new group or, sadly,  hope for the best like I do.

Easy, useful, reliable The meetup app is easy to use and always reliable. The format is excellent. I never need my laptop for the full site. I can accomplish anything through this app: RSVP, messaging, etc. It keeps me organized! I’m in so many different meetups (yay!) so it’s necessary for me to have this app. Meetup is a great way to meet new people who share your interests!

Relevant now more than ever Meetup reminds me of old technology when you used to have chat rooms and you got a sense of a micro community within which you can make friends at the most gentlest pace. In a city as big as LA, it’s nice to have a platform where you can make connections with a group of people who share similar interests. It’s wonderful.
Great content, poor searchability and multiple crashes I've been using meetup via web for a while and just decided to download the app.

Meet Up Is Great! I just joined a few groups in Meet Up. I wanted to meet others to go hiking with and I also want to join a group of Doodle owners to meet and take our doggies on outings. I am so impressed with the many different interest groups available. What a great way in which to make friends who have common interests and enjoy similar experiences.

A great place to speak Italian and about Italy We all have our stories about the magical place. In this meet up all love sharing and listening to each other’s stories, as well as work on our Italian for past and future visits. I’ve enjoyed getting to know people in the group, and love the stories of each person’s visits.

Try it out Great app, most groups are free, some have membership fees which is fine if worth it. Variety of groups and subjects available. Seems a bit weird to show up to something and you have no connection to anyone but it’s a great way to get out and see the city as well as meet new interesting people.

Great Way To Make New Friends Whenever I move to a new city the first thing I do is update my new city so I can see what new things I can get into. I’m still very thankful for the co-worker who suggested it years ago. I’ve gone from by-stander to participant and host. It’s a great way to delve into all that’s around you, and most groups are free or very affordable to join.

Great concept The meetup app is great, but there are a couple of features that I wish were available as a group organizer. Group chat features (voluntary for interested group members only) and the ability to poll members. We would love to gauge where our members live, what event days/times work best, and get feedback on events they’d like to see but I think additional organizer features would help.

User Friendly? The coordinator of the Meetup group that I have been attending has had ongoing issues with the functionality of the post.  It always lists our location as TBD, even when the location has been entered multiple times, and participants in the group are not allowed to send an RSVP until they are within 24 hours of the start time.  Perhaps the instructions for use should be made a bit clearer.

Great! Scope for improvement. I think it’s a great app but with recent updates, the past user friendliness has reduced. It has become more confusing and difficult to navigate through the different pages of the app. I takes time to figure out to go back to a particular page you were on. If this can be fixed I think it would be the best app meet up events.

Important part of my life I’ve attended roughly 20 meetups before I started hosting my own. Sacramento Web and Mobile Developers has become a place where I hang out with my friends and enjoy life as a software developer. Meetup helps make that possible. But that’s not where it ends. This app enables and facilitates so much meaningful human interaction. Give it a try!

Great app A great way to get to know new people you probably would never have met otherwise, to always have people to do fun stuff with and to try new things from volunteering, to sports to all sorts of hobbies, restaurants and live shows, outdoor adventures, meditation classes, shooting range, golf, etc, etc. niche groups for political causes, ages groups, etc.

Lots of fun people I’ve met lots of fun and interesting people do new and different experiences. If I were to have any one suggestion it would be to have broader groups for things outside the normal for this area. Mostly hiking , board game potluck, some dance classes. All of which are great but I’ve found little for other outdoor activities such as target shooting (archery or firearms), motorcycle rides, things like that.

Finally getting good use from app I recently moved and in my new location, the app has been instrumental in meeting new people that share similar interests. However, there are a few meetups that feel catfish-like, people looking for something, what exactly I don’t know and I didn’t stick around long enough to find out. Other than that, I find the app very useful.

Expense is prohibitive but the format is great! Group organizers are required to pay to use the site, which has led to the disbanding of several groups I’ve been a part of. I’m sure this could be handled differently through many alternatives. But I love the format of the app and enjoy the opportunity to meet new people who have common interests.

Such a great way to connect with community Love this app! It makes it so easy to see all the upcoming events in a phone-friendly way do I don’t even have to get on my computer to look it up. Can be handy if I’m on the way to an event and just need to look up some quick info on it such as the address.

Great tool to get connected I have been using this to get connected to technical groups/forums and it’s works great. Most of the workshops and training session offered in the technical groups are well represented, you can see current, future and past events. Signing for them is super easy, with just one click.

Easy to use; lots of ways to use MEETUP is easy to use. It has a good search capability, offers useful sharing of meetup details and participant comments, and gives timely updates. If details or location of the event change, notifications of same are quickly sent and received.

Perfect for someone trying to get out more I found this app through a hiking group. I’ve met some fascinating people at each activity. This is a nice way to get more social without having a bunch of strangers in your personal business. I met a lady who travels for work and uses the app to get out of her hotel. I think that’s an awesome idea!

Great selection of activities, great people! I adore the people that I have met through Meet-Up! I wish I had known about it sooner. There are clubs and groups for every interest. If there is not one for yours, you can start your own. It is very user-friendly. Privacy is protected, and you will find many new things to do in your area!

New app less user friendly. Prior to upgrade app was fairly easy to navigate. Now, not so much. In addition, not all future meet up dates appear on the app on the phone. Wanted to sign up for a December 3 meet up from my phone but the Meetup did not appear. I had to wait until I got home to my laptop to sign up for the event. Not helpful.

Great way to meet people I’ve had this app for awhile now and it is great! It is easy to meet people who have similar interests and hobbies. The last few adventures I have been on were because of this app and I’ve made some really amazing friends though it. I definitely recommend this app to anyone trying to meet new people.

Excellent App I joined Meetup a few months ago to meet new friends and get more active. I love this App because It’s so easy to use and I’m able to find what I’m interested in quickly. It also lets me know when there are are new meetups in my area and that’s how I found one I really enjoy. Met some wonderful new friends with common interest.

Core Functions Rock! Please Fix small bugs. I love this app. It's helped a lil' isolated introvert like me meet a whole bunch of cool, loving, supportive people that are productive and passionate about what they do.

Best App for newcomers We’ve known about Meetup for sometime now but never used it, we’re now traveling in Nova Scotia and decided to settle in Halifax for a few months, we looked in Meetup for activities and we’ve found a plethora of options.  I attended my first activity last week and was welcomed into the group as if I was an old acquaintance, certainly a GREAT APP.

The antidote to social media I am absolutely in love with Meetup. This website / app brings people together in conversation and social activity based on their interests and hobbies. Find something cool to do in your area this week. Don’t see anything? Start a group!

Meetup App Is Awesome Meetup App was suggested by a friend to me so that I would stop working all the time and get out more.  So far I’ve gone to a craft project group where I met some great people. Then I went to a Comedy show with old friends, that I would have never called if it wasn’t for the show.  The apps been great so far.  Definitely recommend.

Great Place to Meet There are so many ways to meet on social media and this one stands apart from the rest because it’s focus is to bring people together in real time and space to actually connect. I like that the meetup groups are centered around a common theme. Also, I appreciate the messenger feature within the app. It’s convenient.

New friend opportunities made easy I’m really enjoying this app. It is a wonderful fount of information of what’s going on locally for women over 50 in Suffolk County!  I’ve been looking for a beginners Mah Jongg game for a while now and who would think the app helped me find one so close in Whole Foods !! So much more activities to track. Happy I was introduced to this app!!

Wonderful app I’ve never organized an event, so I’m only reviewing the other side. It’s very easy to find events that you are interested in because of the interest categories you’ve choose. Contacting an admin is easy, if they are in a current group. Some groups seem to disband but still have their meet ups posted.

WORST APP EVER!! DO NOT GET!! I downloaded this miserable app, and it immediately glitched. I can’t even get to the home screen. It will not recognize my password, and the process to reset is almost impossible to follow. After FOUR attempts to reset my password, it finally worked. Then I went into the app to cancel my subscription. Guess what? There are no obvious links to do that. I’ve been sitting here screaming at my phone for about half an hour. I have NEVER regretted downloading an app more than I regret downloading this useless piece of crap.

I think you should un-hide the “Add to calendar” feature This app lets you instantly add an event to your phone calendar.  Nice... right?  But, it doesn’t have the words “Add to Calendar.”  Instead, there’s this tiny greyed-out clock next to the date and time.  I basically only found out by accident.

Great way to meet new friends and stay connected I’ve been using Meetup since 2011 for meeting new people, exchanging business contact info, and exploring new hobbies. I’ve been able to generate a lot of positive feedback regarding my personal endeavors. It’s an outstanding tool that I use pretty much every week. I highly recommend it.

Provides great opportunities especially for a newcomer to the area! Great app for finding things to do and getting to know people with similar interests. I’m just getting started with two groups but am excited to find more things and opportunities I want to explore. So far very user friendly for an older gal! Definitely 5 stars!

Works just as explained I was a bit skeptical about the app at first but once I downloaded and joined a few groups and started RSVPing for events I got the hang of it. Well done with this app and it’s a great way for people just getting started in their careers to network and even for people who just want to try new and different stuff.

Always awesome This group consist of a welcoming community and great individuals. Eric is very professional, fun and embracing to all.  I’m new to Maryland from NY and this group has been one of the experiences that has lessened being home sick.    It’s a great place for business opportunities and services and products as well.  I definitely recommend this meet up group.

Sharing Vision Being made aware of various opportunities to gather among persons with similar interests is a gift!  Talking about what is seen and how it is seen is wonderful.  The most effective way of learning is by doing.  Lessons learned in the classroom setting is defined and learned while doing together. All photographers gather in the same place and each photograph is singularly quique!
Great for business growth. A huge issue and trying to start a business

Meet Up app I started using Meet Up about a year ago and am enjoying it. I’ve found some groups I joined and  now have a new face to face social network. The app seems to work well for communicating on upcoming events and then follow ups as well. I’ll continue exploring in the app for even more groups as I get more leisure time

Creating My Own Community It's become apparent to me that positive community and environment are paramount to my happiness. Since I haven't managed to stumble upon the types of influences and ideas that add value to my life, it's become necessary to create environments where people can flourish. I feel like this app lets me do that in a way that is easy for people to participate.

Author connecting with readers The app is very easy to use and will help you meet people with similar interests. Remember the phrase ***Things happen for a reason*** and that most things are positive.

I Loved it! I was a bit skeptical, as I had never been to a meetup group. Upon arrival I found that everyone was very professional and welcoming! I looked for a group with the most people attending a meeting and closest to me. The group I attended was a part of BNI. Awesome networking opportunity, definitely going back next week! Take the first step and just go!

Spam with inappropriate content I love meet up. It works really well for my groups that meet. However, in the last several days I have had people spamming me what it looks like a robot. Had to change the way people asked to be in the group so that I can control the comments from the people trying to get him to my group that shouldn’t be there

Millions of Emails. Took hours to unsubscribe This is a good idea for an app and I have met people through it but the consistent emails that you receive gets ridiculous. I signed up to a lot of groups as I was prompted to do and received literally hundreds of emails. It is on clear when you sign up to receiving all of these emails and it’s a really long winded process and subscribe from settings. In fact I had to unsubscribe on a desktop

Get reconnected with the world as we know it We tend to be like turtles and stay within the safe confines of our shell. It is not until you reach out to groups within meetup, that you realize there is a safer and happier way to shell-ter yourself around genuinely fun loving people. So get off that couch and jump into a group. Live life to the fullest with like minded people!!!
Have loved Meetup since 2013 I discovered this wonderful app after moving from CA to WA.  It has enabled me to make many new friends and find people with whom I have things in common.

Great way to connect with similar interests I just completed the EBRP district pole hiking class and joined the instructors meet up group to coordinate future hikes. In doing so I saw other hiking groups throughout the Bay Area. Since I don’t like to hike alone for safety reasons I find this a great way to be able to hike and meet new people with similar interests. This is a great app for that purpose.

Best “Getting Out Of Your Comfort Zone App” If you are someone who needs a change in your life, this app will do just that! This app gives you the opportunity to meet new people with like minded or different perspectives on life. There is literally a group for everyone and it is by far the best social networking app for meeting new people!

Healthy Motivation Love Sarah’s nutritional knowledge and care for motivating others into  a healthier lifestyle! Kelly, the owner of the Rio Vista Gym, was generous in allowing the members of the challenge to take some classes while we’re involved. The other Sarah, the dance class teacher, was phenomenal! Sweat, smiles, and sexy salsa moves, taught so well, that i was proud to own a few moves, and saunter out of class with them! ~judi spencer

Excellent for meeting people, a bit expensive to start a group I have joined a few groups and met a few people so far, but there arent really any creative writing groups in my area and I was looking to start one and it is $10/month for the low tier, and that’s too much for me at the moment. But overall a great app.

Love the choices I’ve been using Meetup for a few years and really enjoy how I have choices of fun things to do with different groups of people. I’ve met a few good friends and have enjoyed laughs with strangers that become friends. It’s a great app and easy to use. I recommend it, especially if you’re new to the area.

User friendly This app makes adding events to my calendar a piece of cake, which i need because i tend to forget things very easily. Also, it sends reminders about events for the upcoming week, which i also need. App is user-friendly and easy to upload pics of our events!

I’m happy to find this App! I just moved to LA and I was having hard time connecting with people to learn more about culture and everything else in the community, I heard about meetup from a friend-Joined yesterday and already going to two very cool events!

Good way to meet people with similar interests I’ve been using Meetup for about 5 years. When I lived in Southern California, it was great. While I wish there was a bit more  groups to chose from, I met a lot of wonderful people. Then I moved to rural Minnesota. I guess small town people don’t really have the need for Meetup. They already know each other! So, it’s not all that useful in a small town.

Garbage on iPad When I opened this thing, I did a doubletake. I wad typing with an external keyboard and the signin screen did not swivel to landscape. Uh okayyy. No biggie, you only use the signin screen once so I’m sure the actual app is fine. Wrong! They didn’t even bother to make an ipad app. You just use the same app as the iphone. If you think using a phone app with phone dimensions on an ipad is a crappy experience then you would be correct. I don’t know what they are thinking. It’s not hard to change the dimensions of your iphone app and make an actual ipad app.

Perfect way to make new friends If you’re new in town or just an introvert who decides, yeah, some like-minded friends would be nice to have, Meetup will help you connect.  Just give it a few months. Keep going. New people joining all the time. It takes time to build a history of experiences with which to make friendships.

Love meeting people and doing fun activities! I’ve had some great experiences the past few years using Meetup.  I went to a LACMA and was guided by a retired docent. I’ve gone to dance clubs, book clubs and writing groups.  I’m sure I will continue to meet interesting people and take part in fun activities because of Meetup.  I recommend this app to anybody and everybody.

Completely monetized I was under the impression this app was a platform where regular people could list interests and meet up. However at this point, the whole thing is just full of class/seminars from companies you have to pay to go to, and even reg people have to pay to set up a meeting. Not really the organic experience I was looking for (if I wanted classes, I’d just google it) and just overall not useful to me.

Meetup This is a great app. I haven’t encountered any issues using it or with any of my groups of choice. There’re many groups to accommodate to everyone’s interests. I would say that most of the people that create these groups are legitimately doing it to help them selves while helping others. I hope that this helps. Enjoy

A Great App I wanted to help people by teaching Meditation. Meditation helps people to come out from their negative emotions. So I started a meet up. Now, I am so happy to say that many people get so many benefits. But, I do not change them though Meet up asks me to do so. I bear my 19 dollars loss every month alone. May many people come and use Meetup and be successful!!!

Awesome Very cool app that keeps you updated on events near you that you wouldn’t normally know about. It’s very easy to find events that you like, ones that are related to those type of events, and new events about things you are starting to look into :) find new activities to fit into your life!

Meetup This is a great app that makes it easy to connect to groups of people based on similar interests. You are able to see the amount of members in each group, past events, and upcoming activities which can help you decide if you would be interested in a particular group.

Good app! Excellent way to find groups to try new things with.  Pursue a hobby or interest, learn or teach something.  Fun and safe way to expand your world.  The app sends you notifications from groups you choose to connect with.  When you sign up to attend an event, the app puts it in your calendar for you.  Very easy to use.

Need some improvement Overall good but could be improved by having a different feel. Home page should listing the individual groups signed up. Under each group listing sub categories of descriptions, # messages, # events. In each category sub-categories like # members, complete description and bylaw for “description”, etc.

Meetup Meetup gives people like me a chance to meet others and make new friends.  There is only two groups ( I think ) that come to my area,  Maple Grove or Osseo MN.  I am nervous to drive in or too new strange areas to me.  So I am ever so grateful to the groups close to me.  When you become a older widow, your life can be lonely.  These groups offer Hope.

Meet up group I am a new member, and I really enjoy the social networking aspects of the meet up group.  I love the fact that I have many interests which are also parts of the meet up group, and, I can join the groups that I am interested in.  For example, dancing, karaoke, dance lessons, outdoor activities, photography, etc.

Why doesn’t it show notifications... Until you click on the actual event? I used to be able to click on the new notification and see what comment/update was new. Now I click on it and it’s blank but if I then open the event manually I see what is new. A lot of unnecessary time and effort. Please fix with an update, love your app otherwise.
A Whole World Out There Met awesome people who are like minded and enjoy the same interests in myself.
Awesome! I don’t know if I’m rating meet-up in general or the specific softball meet-up I am in.

The best way to get to know interesting things happening I have found several groups that fulfill my inspirations and hobbies. It is not easy to find friends especially if you have just moved to another city and this app is just what you need to step outside of your comfort zone and get to know them.

Meet ups is great and easy to use. It updates your calendar for you and you can expand to view more information. Something I found was that not everyone posts that they are going to join. A lot of people just show up so don’t be dissuaded by low numbers. Quick install and it hasn’t had any problems to use so far.

Great app for finding group activities I used this app to find running groups. The people were always welcoming and friendly. I need that extra push of being expected to show up to make sure I get out the door and complete the runs. Great app hope it helps you as well.

Meetup review I have been on meetup for 8 years this pass November. I started the meetup because I wanted to make friends that enjoy scrapbook and cards making. First month, I meet 2 new friends. 8 years later, I have over 200 members and meet between 25 to 40 each month. Thank You to the designers of MeetUp.

Mountain biking I started mountain biking and was struggling to find people to ride with. Went to my local bike shop and they suggested meetup(at first thought it was a dating site and laughed) then realized they were serious and I downloaded it and now can look for rides within any distance I want and always have someone to ride with!

So many activities and groups to join! Useful app that offers an exhaustive list of local meetup groups. Could be a little easier to navigate and if you click on a group to investigate further, going back will kick you back up to activities you have already perused.

The platform is awesome!! The platform is user friendly and instantly connects you with a community. I’m bringing quality women together who would have otherwise never met. Everyday I’m getting new members and can easily communicate with them via the app. So happy this is available and at a low cost too!!

Great way to find group activities. I love Meetup for finding group activities I’m interested in. Once you sign up you can add events to your calendar, get reminders, get a map to the location, message other participants. And post reviews and photos afterwards. Excellent! Every activity club should use this.
The meetup app is great. I really enjoy seeing the things happening around my town. I have gone to one event but I plan on going to many more in the future.

Amazing app for an amazing purpose In this day and age where we have all the ways to socialize nothing can ever beat meeting in person!! So how do you evaluate where to go and make sure it’s going to be worth you time??? Here is meetup!! Solves that issue!! Now I can plan where, why and who I would like to meetup with!! People are awesome and this app helps you find and connect with amazing people!!!

Difficult to find things in search The app used to be simpler and better but has become very difficult to customize and search to find things of interests. It shows too many irrelevant things. One has to scroll through stuff from past to get to current and future events . Going through each group works better but that’s a tedious process

A great way to get in on things happening in your area. The Papp integrates events into your schedule seemlessly, so it’s easy to see new events directly in your calendar. You can search events and groups by name, by subject matter, and by proximity. It even lets you know how many people have committed to the meet up.

Wonderful to Meet Likeminded Meet up if wonderful to find the activities you enjoy doing and meet likeminded friends.  Through meet up, I have tried many different activies with my husband and some by myself. There is no reason to feel alone in this world when you have a meet up app!

Meet Up App I love love love this app! The meetup groups are very diverse & interesting . There is something for everyone to enjoy from A-Z including all adult ages. The app is extremely user friendly. It’s a great way to get out and meet people & to do things you may not have done before. It always feels good to be a part of something good.

Meetup I have really enjoyed being a part of meetup! It is great to have such an organization that offers many types of activities for people to meet other people that they have something in common with! It just a great organization to help you meet & make new friends! I really felt very welcome at my first meeting!  Michael Allen

Making friends with Meetup When I talk to someone about a passion they have. I always ask them, “Have you heard of Meetup?” I’m happy to say I have a vast network of photographers, models and makeup artists that I consider friends. I met most of them through Meetup. If you don’t see a Meetup that fits your passion, start your own! It’s easy!

Great App but needs improvement This app gives you the opportunity to connect with groups of your interest.  It works really great. I’m giving it 4 stars because you can’t modify your list of interest. That is important because what I’m interested in could change and it actually changes every time I learn about something new
Fantastic app! Kind of new to the app, but I really like it! I’ve already found great organizations and groups in and around my area! Wish there were more, but who knows, maybe I’ll start one soon!

Much more ‘phone friendly’ than the website! I hate downloading apps, but I believe this one was actually worth it. It has drastically simplified following up with my meetup groups from my phone. The messages functionality feels similar to sending text messages!

An app that actually lets me meet people, but isn’t creepy. I have noticed that a few of the buttons are on labeled. Since I use a voiceover, which is built into any Apple product, that’s a little surprising. Might want to fix that. Other than that though, I like the app. It’s fairly easy to use, and I enjoy getting to know more people in my area.

Ok Is there any way a filter can be added so we only get updates for certain days and/or within certain cities?  For example, I am generally only interested in meetups on the weekends, so I’d like to be able to set preferences so I only get notifications for those days. I also live in a large metropolitan area and though I set mileage preferences, I still get notifications for suburbs that I don’t want to travel to. Thanks!

Terrific A terrific app for those looking for like minded people interested in what you enjoy doing, seeing, exploring, learning about and more... I had no idea how many groups there were in Los Angeles open to broaden their member base and/or start up new groups.  Thanks “meet up” for bringing the people in our city and those from abroad together!

Good app, but bad navigation Good app, but it’s really hard to find upcoming meetups since it’s not intuitive. You have to click the search tab and then try to adjust the settings to look for upcoming meetups. There should be a button or something. Other than that, works really well

Social Media Bringing Real People Together With Meetup you can meet people who share your passion and stop trying to convince your friends and family that: (choose one): hiking is fun, playing chess is fun, Lithuanian culture is fun, foraging is fun. The leaders find themselves and there is no advertising If there were more than 5 stars, this would be the place.

Easy to use, great way to meet people Been going to various coding meet ups using this app. It feels well-optimized for the phone interface and offers just as much functionality as its web counterpart.  I recommend it for both newbies and experienced users of the website.

Easy to Use The only downside is the fee to set up a Meet Up group but by requiring a fee to create and maintain a Meet Up group is far better than the ad heavy, data mining, privacy pirate that Facebook has become. The app is easy to use and has a clean, crisp appearance. There’s lots of various activity groups on Meet Up.

Helpful Awesome app, it’s helpful to someone new to a city or anyone that’s looking to branch out and explore possibilities among art, exploration, volunteering, meditation, dance, and so much more. The app categorizes the events in ways that make it easy to find something you’re interested in that fit your schedule. I recommend this app to everyone.

Great way to get involved in things you enjoy! Great way to find people with like interests and enjoy the activity together. If your looking to do something but don't have someone to do it with, this app gives the chance to do the activity and meet new people who may soon be your friends.

MeetUp Grateful for this app giving perfect opportunities of meeting and gatherings of like-minded activities and groups to enjoy time and space in this great journey of life... love meeting up w Gals on a Journey

Interesting! Pretty cool app! Group/interest suggestions are so helpful. There is something for everyone. Easy to navigate. If you’re looking for new things to try, new ppl to befriend or date... this is the perfect app! The only negative thing is that the app crashes and you can only edit your interest on mobile web browser. But overall it’s great!

User App seemed to operate well be more recent, or last few 3 or so weeks, where it would drop out or lock up.  The screen may just go blank in bringing up the app.  Now it isn't operating so I have deleted it from my phone while now trying to down load a newer version, unsucessfully.  Keeping my peepers open for a workable version of the Meetup App

Great app, clunky communication Has been great to use for finding pickup sports in LA for me, only thing I don’t trust the app so much for is the comments section for each event. I prefer to use the website to really check the whole event first, then just use the app for reference. 4 stars for having essentially everything still there and functioning on the app.

Great hiking! This is the perfect way to meet people who love to do what you do.  So there is an instant connection with other hikers. Everyone is always very friendly. You can take as much or as little as you like. The leaders are awesome!  The hike is challenging.  I love this at the end of a busy work week.  Relaxing, invigorating and a great workout.

Great app, easy to use to make connections! Great app, helps you easily connect with so many special-interest groups. Perfect for discovering new interests that you might not have thought about otherwise & finding exciting ways to get out & about while meeting new people along the way!

Great facilitator technology to personally connect without technology By facilitator technology I mean the app permits organization of humans finding humans to pursue (whatever it may be) common interest.  Social media ain’t social! (Really you only see screens/pictures but no actual people; doesn’t feel the same does it?)

Accountability I wish I could be one of those people that can put himself on the clock and get things done from the comfort of his home, but I can get easily distracted. Meetup helps me find people who get together and have a focused effort on whatever project you choose to master. I’ve found it very helpful.

Why did I wait so long! This is a super resource.  I heard about it a while ago however did not take advantage of it.  I am so happy that I got moving using this wonderful app.  I have begun my journey to master the French language and now with meet up have made friends who are on the same journey. Thanks Meet up!

A great place to meet people with similar hobbies and aspirations I joined a mom’s group on meet up after moving to a new area and it has been an awesome tool to see what events are being planned and who is attending. This app has helped me join the community and has helped me to settle and feel more at home in a new environment!

Downriver Anxiety and Depression Support Group Although I am a new member, the group comes up with fun and imaginative activities, as well as a support group meeting. I plan to be more active in the group soon. I give the group for top marks for comments and activities which many depressed people struggle ( including me) to get out and socialize!

San Mateo County Medical Association I love this group. I moved here a year ago from the East Coast and was looking for a group with whom I can walk to get in my steps and also meet people. I wish the group would meet at other times besides the summer months. Is there a possibility this could be extended to every weekend throughout the year?

Easiest way to keep up with your groups If you haven’t joined Meetup, you are missing out.  There are groups for any taste.  Not only do you make new friends, you learn about the activities going on around you that would appeal to your interests. This app is the easiset way to interact with Meetup on a mobile device.

Great way to connect with like minded people! I love the meet up app. There are so many great groups of people gathering for various reasons. You can even start your own group. There’s some overlap in groups which makes it fun. I’ve met a lot of wonderful people through this app. I’ve also got to do lots of fun activities.

Very outstanding marketing and advertising conveyed through this app. This app has everything one could possibly want. From diverse meet up groups to an open variety of different choices, and options for people to come together and make something special.

Something for everybody! This allow you to participate in activities with others who have similar interests. It offers a wide variety of activities and groups, and you can pick choose those of interest. I’ve met some really nice people, and had some good times.

Meet up app Very easy to navigate and search for new groups. Response times are quick. Only glitch is if you click on a photo it hangs there for a while as if you’ve locked out the App, but eventually it comes back to the beginning.

Sometimes change is not better This website is priceless!  EVERY non-profit would benefit from using this app to keep members informed and involved.  My only gripe is that occasionally Meetup eliminates a function I liked to use such as BOLD typeface to catch readers eye.  But thank you!! This is well worth the$.  Membership increased 150% 2nd year.

Bring the check in feature back Why did you take away the “I’m here” check in feature? Please bring that back! This is a great app but I think you charge to much for it. Maybe you could ease up on high cost if membership is low.

Great app to connect with like minded individuals This app keeps one connected to groups/classes, etc., that interests you. It’s a great way to stay up to date with my Tai Chi lessons around the area. I always get a notification whenever the schedule changes or a new one is added. Very easy to navigate. Excellent!

Profile updates I love the idea of the app, it’s brilliant!! There’s only one problem I have with it is that I can’t upload my profile picture and my information such as the gender and the age.. I tried to log out and even turned my iPhone off and on but it didn’t work.. I know it’s a minor thing but ppl care about these things.. thank you all for all of your hard work and effort 🙏🏼

The way of the future. I am a huge fan of platforms, such as MeetUp, that allow us to expand who we connect with online, but then bring people together in an in-person environment. Such a great concept that I hope more and more people take advantage of for years to come.

Super helpful! Love this app. It’s easy to customize your interests and be in the know about all the cool things happening around you. If you’re new to an area and want to find likeminded peeps, or you’re just looking for some different things to do or interesting activities to try, this is the app for you!

Could be better Not easy to use this app if you’re the Organizer of a group. You can’t mass email from the app or approve new members. App crashes almost every time I try to create a Meetup event. In fact, I usually have to set the date, time, description and title, then save a barebones version of my Meetup event, then edit in additional details at a later time.

Meet up makes Mongo happy Very happy to have discovered Meet Up. I love to draw but have been unwilling (ie: afraid) to show others my work. Joined a Sketching group and had my first Meetup yesterday. Great experience and was surprised to find a few others had the same trepidations. Overall a great experience. Highly recommended.

New beginnings I love this app. It’s allowed me to get out of the house, try new activities, and make new friends. I wish I had known about it sooner. I’ve really been missing out. I encourage everyone to browse and see what interests you. There’s no obligation to stay in a group. I promise you will find something to do.

Finally. A better layout, nevermind Stop asking me to rate Meetup every time I log in!!!! Update: back to no quality control. Are your developers all children? You update this program every other day and it's continually broken. This time it shows no upcoming events on any meetup or it says the content is unavailable… this development team is absolutely the worst I've ever encountered in the App Store. Please stop updating the program every 15 seconds, please start quality controlling your app so it's functional stable and intuitive.

Helped me master two sports! Meetup helped me conquer two sports that take time, dedication, and most importantly support from those more experienced. I was able to find groups that offered classes and a supportive community to help me progress without giving up on motorcycling and bicycling. Life wouldn’t be the same!

Perfect! I am new to town and I had no clue of how I would find out about events and happens in my area until I came across Meet Up. It’s “perfect!” There’s a lot of different groups to join, so not only do I get a wide variety of things to do; but I also get to meet tons of new people! I recommend, Meet Up!

Great way to meet people with similar interests The app has a great way to meet people who have similar interests. You can pick from many interests and find a group of people who like it too. I have found groups that I never knew existed and have started enjoying activities with them.

Meetup App is great I have been using meetup since 2016 and has not been disappointed since then when it comes to signing up to a new group and scheduling meetups. The push notification works great and reminds me of future meetups even if I am very busy with work and other personal commitments.

Move this app! One of my daily apps I use This is an app I check nearly daily. It really helped me find the right events I was looking for. Having just moved cities 3 months ago I feel settled in and welcomed thanks to the events I have found on the app. It is really user friendly and resourceful.

Connecting with your interests made easy Speaks for it self and you already kind of know what you're walking into so that makes it nice also knowing you already have something in common with a group of people that can help others or for Phil and further your interest

Love this app A couple years back I took a staycation for a week and wanted to experience some activities around my new city. Meet up allowed me to participate in a wealth of different kinds of activities. Things I would never have found on my own. I’ve been using it ever since. I absolutely love this app!

I love it most of the time! Hi everyone I’m a MeetUp organizer, I don’t really have a complaint just some quirks I think App. If you started a new event he gets confused when you try to save it and then go back to at least for me. I have better luck using it on my iPad and I do on my iPhone that the going back-and-forth. But just me. Other than that it works really well!

Meet Up Fun Meet Up has allowed me to join a great group of people to participate in fun activities in our town. We have over 100 members now and sometimes there are as few as 3 or 4 who are interested in an activity, other times as many as 20+. A great way to find friends in a new place!
Activities not by myself Great way for a single to join like minded active people in a safe setting of a group.

Great way to meet people If you’re looking to meet more people, MeetUp is a great place to start. The personal profile features could be a little more dynamic and the make-your-own group features are a little bit clunky. The experience of finding folks with similar interests for casual socializing or play makes up for all of that.

Great for a newcomer! I like the Meetup app’s versatile listing of groups and events. It really helps when you’ve just moved to a city or want to connect with people with similar interests. It’s fun to use and great to find new types of things I didn’t know about before. Give it a try and be open to the experiences!

Excellent App for Growing Learning & Making Longtime Friends I met longtime friends through this app when I was searching for a workout Bootcamp. Just recently attended an awesome Meetup where I got to see a demo for an application we may be getting at work and I got to meet other people and learn what they do and it was just amazing!
Happy Hiker Although I cannot take part in the some of the events, it’s great keeping you in the loop.

Useful and fun I’ve been using Meetup both professionally to attract people to events in my business and also personally to find groups of likeminded people and activities to join. I’ve found it both useful and quite fun so far. Highly recommend this app—there are no cons, only pros!

Meetup app Love using this app to meet like minded people with common interests. The app is user friendly. It’s easy to change locations to find groups and activities in different areas. I would definitely recommend the app to anyone who is looking to meet great people in a safe and convenient manner.

Uplifting app This app is really cool and I love how many different categories and groups there are! It’s tough in the city to always make friends/keep friends with busy schedules so this app/ website is wonderful for me to branch out! I haven’t been to a meeting just yet but the support from other members and messaging is nice!

Very open and welcoming group My social skills are limited to begin with. This group makes it easy to meet people and everyone I’ve met has been welcoming. I didn’t feel left out of conversation or activities. Thank you to all of you who organize this group!

New to Town Meetup is a fantastic way to meet new people in your area. Been in my new home town for 4 years and still not many friends to speak of. Joined some fun groups on Meetup and my calendar is full again! The best part is connecting with others who share your interests and passions!

Meetup Meetup app is a great way to connect with people who share common interests with you. Whatever you like to do that requires more than yourself to do it search for a meetup in the app if that thing and if you don’t find one create it yourself and people will join. What can be cooler than that

A great resource I really enjoy the information and resources I have been able to find on this app. It’s so nice to see something like this helping us create community in large cities where for some reason it has become so difficult to connect with like minded people!

Great App for finding events & groups If you’re looking for groups of people with interests similar to your own, or if you’re looking for new adventures and a way to break out of your comfort zone...this is the App!

A story of friends Of course this app’s ability with differ according to where you are and who is around you. But when I moved from California to Washington, this is how I’ve made nearly all of my friends. Including my roommate. Great app. And I constantly recommend it to people who haven’t used it.

Love the convenience I find myself looking for things to do on the go. The Meetup app loads quickly and provides location-based meetups. I wish I can look for events in a wider radius. Even with that, I like the feature “send to calendar” where I can RSVP and put the event in my calendar with two clicks!

Faulty App This app is very frustrating at times... Every time I get a notification that there’s a new message in the app, when I tap on it eight times out of 10 I now get a message “oops, somethings gone wrong, please try again later“.   Of course, when I try again I get the same message. Sometimes I can still get in the app but the message keeps coming up. I’ve never experienced so many glitches in one single app (iPhone 7, iOS 12.3).  When it comes to meet up’s, I mainly just look for emails versus using the app.

Keeping a pulse on Boston Tech with Meetup Meetup is a great app for creating opportunities to learn and be part of communities. In my case the Boston Tech communities, learning from many different teams on many different topics (performance, up and coming apps, frameworks, accessibility just to name a few).

MeetUp Review There is always something for someone.  Never any pressure to join in weekly activities - just lots of choices and I’ve met some pretty fantastic people.  A wide variety of interest groups only limited by the time you want to participate. Excellent way to meet people and learn new things.

Great Way to connect with people! My husband and I just moved to Spokane and found Meetup! It’s been so helpful for connecting with people who like the same things we do, and seeing events coming up...it would have taken us much longer to find groups of interest with out Meetup!

Cure for introversion My wife’s a social butterfly and I’m an introvert. We had our first dinner with our new MU group and I had a blast. Regardless to say that my wife was very pleased and happy that I came out of my shell and get out of my comfort zone. So I’m now looking for more opportunities for me to get out and find one or two groups for me.

Community This app really makes it easy to stay engaged with community! Experiencing life with other people is in our nature and we don’t always know how to do that. This app has made that easy again. I’m meeting great people with the same interests as myself and I am having a fun time!

Great I’m really enjoying the app. I like that I can join in on activities that I like or go to meet people that share the same interest. I can go alone and just do the activities that I enjoy, like painting or meditating, not necessarily to talk or meet people. And I can also go with the intention of conversing and meeting people.

Great way to find your people! Moved to the Portland area knowing no one and with Meetup I’m doing what I like to do with people that share my focused interest. I highly recommend you try it whether you’re new to your area, new to the interest of the group or just looking for new friends.

How do you get worse??? Like seriously I'm so furious! I use meetup for everything!!! And now it's barely functional. I demand that you go back to the old app! It wasn't even a choice to update, you had to or the app didn't work. It's a terrible up day and whoever redid it should be fired!

So far, not disappointed! When life throws you for a loop and puts you in a new state with no one you know.. this App has come to the rescue. I’ve been connecting with new people everyday and am yet to find myself feeling unsure about what options are available out there for me to do.
Issue Starting New Group Hi, I didn’t want to rate low so I rated high but this is a suggestion...

Move and meet up. Meet up is great if your a very social person but have to move a-lot. I’ve used it in different cities and states and I have always had a great experience. It’s easy and fun especially if you keep in mind that everybody is looking for the same thing you are.

Much Better Works smoothly, stable. I feel like both the “controls” and presentation of information organized in ways I can navigate are much improved since I last reviewed this app. iPhone Calendar ends up with invitations stuck in its Inbox, as a user this is harmless but untidy.

Meetup I am loving the MeetUp app for both business and social .  With this app I have been able to attend some great lectures and group discussions by scheduling directly to me calendar.  I am also more active now that I have found organized sporting games to jump into.  My life is much fuller now and so is my calendar.

A great app I've been using this app for a couple of years now, and it has worked flawlessly. I've never had to close the app out because it was stuck, and I've never had to delete then re-read load it because it was malfunctioning.

Is the standard for a reason Many thousands of groups.  App works well, though i like the website better.  If you are looking for a meetings app and don’t have very unusual criteria this is likely the right first one.  It likely will be your main one and could be your only one.

Highly Recommend! I had used the Meetup app years ago & it certainly has improved dramatically. It is extremely easy to navigate, I use it with the same ease as I do on my laptop. It is one of my most used apps. No glitches whatsoever, I attend fun events and make new friends along the way!

Making new friends This is a great app for crafts,wellness, having dinners with people you would have never met had it not been for this app. Explore a-little you just show up at the time for your event and everyone is new to what is going on

Perfect App For Those Who Move to a New City or Country! I have lived now in four countries and multiple cities and I’ve used this app to meet interesting people. For example, I never thought I would become a hiker but Ireland is the perfect place for such a sport. If you are an expat moving to a new city, try it out!
Easy to use I enjoyed having immediate access to the group and receiving notifications. User friendly. And able to upload pics directly from my phone instead of waiting to access my laptop.

Great for making new friends If you want to get out more, try new activities or just enjoy familiar ones while making new friends then Meetup is the perfect venue for you.  I love it.  My only complaint is that I don’t have the time and stamina to do all the activities that interest me.

Impossible to access messages Cartoony and unusable. Cannot see current events .mobile site is much better. The messages icon has disappeared in the app. It appears on the mobile site but when I click on it the app comes up. I'm deleting the app. The new pink and green  and fake bright colors are terrible and ugly. I'm not not downloading a version with no calendar. Can't do many organizer functions from app. The mobile website works better. Don't release bug filled versions without extensive testing!

UI/UX I love Meetup. It’s the only way I’ve been able to find soccer games after moving to NYC without any sort of network! I’ve made some great friends and am SO glad this app exists. It is also really easy to pay for games through the app. (Nicer than always having to have the right amount of cash with me).

author_name: Use to be ur biggest app fan
review_body: Love this app but hate the incessant event rating pop-up I love the meetup app, I use it daily. HowevEr the last update now has a relentless pop-up asking you to rate the lastevent you attended and you cannot clear it unless you give a rating. You can exit out of it without giving a rating but the. Knute you reopen the app it pops up again. Pleasssssse make it STOP! This is so aggravating in a perfectly working app.

Wish I'd found it sooner It makes it so easy to find groups in the area that get together to nerd out about some of my favorite stuff. I get so fired up by going to these events, learn so much about things and about how to give talks and how to interact with the group to answer questions.

Great app Instead of scrolling through websites, looking for things to do, this app has it all figured out for you. I especially like that it keeps track of all the events I plan to attend ! It's safe, does you who's going to each event and allows you to message the host of the event.

New to meet and Arizona I moved to Arizona from Chicago and didn’t know anything about the area. It shows you a lot of social events that I didn’t know existed close to my area. Also more events that I can travel to. So far it is helping me navigate through this new place I live in and I love it.

Great app in an increasingly disconnected world! This app is great to find people with shared interests who get together as often as weekly or as infrequently as monthly. The search functions allow you to quickly find hobbies that you may or may not be doing today and peruse the folks that are participating.

Great new format While running a piano Meetup, I appreciate the new format — more space, ability to keep messages organized, personal interests clear, notifications, etc.   And of course, the overall idea of putting people together based on activities they love!
This app is impossible to use Meetup is great and the idea is brilliant. I enjoy the groups and participate often.

Meetup app helps when away from desktop Sometimes I have to update meetings and I don’t have access to my desktop computer. Being able to use the app has been extremely helpful and easy to use!  I highly recommend it.

Great app to meet people I've used Meetup in various cities to meet people who share common interests. The app is super easy to use, lets you quickly save the info in your calendar, message other members and browse various ways. I'm thankful for an easy way to find my people who enough what I do.

Fun so far Haven’t met up with a group yet been busy. But the choices are amazing. I’m seeing things on here that I am ACTUALLY interested in. Can’t wait to get out a some hike or camp or explore. I also joined a group that will meet up and chat about things that I’m into. That makes me happy. Keep up the good work.

Fantastic I have been looking for a way to meet other singles in the area and stumbled on this app. It is a fantastic way to meet other people. So easy to use as well. Just join whatever groups that speaks to you and see what they gave going on. Now, I have a full calendar of events 😊

Good but not real user friendly The app works about as well as the regular site. Like most apps it appears to lack some functionality. I can’t find where I can adjust member roles. So most likely that doesn’t exist. Since both the app and web page are not real user friendly to those who are organizers I have given 4 stars.

Awesome site to meet awesome folks! I downloaded this app after moving to a new city and wanting to make friends! I’ve had lots of fun just meeting up with people that have similar hobbies or even trying out new hobbies! For example, I made a group for local K-Pop fans and I joined a group for playing Ultimate Frisbee!!

Great way to learn about local options As someone new to an area who travels constantly for work it is difficult to know what is happening at home when I do “drop in” for a few days between assignments. Meetup gives me lots of options and creates opportunities to meet people.

Needs a lot of work Hi and thanks for making this app but needs a lot of fixes in order to work fluidly and be a tool refresh time is bad once yo open notifications or messages they all change status as if you have seen them not individually as they should badges don’t appear in real time in the app communication an posts are not easy with other members yo don’t get to send pic on the discussions etc guess you are all working in all this matters hope you put an update ASAP so this tool can work better

Best IRL meetup app, like student groups back in college but for adults! Extremely helpful for society because obviously we only learn from each other! Seriously meetup is the most publicly open non abusive social network by like so much! Thanks so much for helping to make the world a better place!

Awesome app to meet new people and groups It’s really Great platform with similar intrest when you’re new to any place by using this app you can meet different groups and share your thoughts and knowledge.
Wow...it actually works! I’ve only been to one MeetUp so far, and I already have a group of friends to go do fun and try new things in our area.

Connected This app is a huge help when moving to a new place. It gets you connected to the community of things you enjoy. Instead of wondering endlessly to find your tribe, with this app you can meet them today. (or whenever the next meet up is)

Up with Meet Up! A great app for keeping track of my Meetups and finding new ones. It's also well designed for following up with people I meet at Meetups and vice versa without divulging email addresses or phone #s right off the bat. The photos help as often you don't catch someone's full name.

Great App to support the website. I like using this app because then I can easily message people. It also is really helpful to see upcoming events and meet up groups that I might like to attend. I think that it’s easy to use and great for my needs. I would recommend getting the app and getting out to have a good time doing stuff you love!!

Love it!!! This app has allowed me to connect with the type of people I've been trying to connect with for years, right in my local area. This app has opened so many doors for me and helped me to connect with so many useful people in my life. This is truly a awesome app - if you use it right.

Meet up. Happens. Happened. Meetup has a very effective formation/ layout & is very welcoming to the eyes! If I had the option to reformat the page however, I would include an option for a darker tonality overall. 😎

Love this app I belong to only one Meet Up group and am so happy I found them. There are so many groups that engage in a multitude of activities....something for everyone. If one group isn’t right for you, keep looking. You are sure to find the right mix of friends or relationships on this app.

Great way to find groups, whether social or professional This is a great app to let you know all the amazing groups and activities or meetings going on in your area.  It’s an amazingly easy way to find social or professional groups. No pressure, just easy access, details, and new adventures.

Love Meetup! I’ve met some of my closest friends through this app! It has provided me a great way to meet people with common interests. I also love that it connects people in your area that you normally wouldn’t run across especially when you don’t have the opportunity to get out much.

A great tool. I used this app to find a local hiking group. It’s a messaging and actually connecting social media intended to help you meet others. Works way better than instagram or Facebook for MAKING friends. Highly recommend and hope it never goes away!

Like to dance like no ones watching, this is your place! If you’re into free dance of any kind or just want to move your body in an expressive way of whatever reason this is the place to go! I get so welcomed and comfortable to move, breathe and let my body lead the way in this safe space!

Great app Great app.  I just started using it after a break up to meet new ppl and get out.  I would say check the app for cancellations bf you go bc sometimes organizers cancel events at the last minute and you may not get a notification from the app.  But other than that great idea for connecting and getting to know new ppl.  I wish it was my idea.

Good tool Meetup provides a good source tool for finding, and communicating with, any number of interest groups.  I’d rate it a five but sometimes it seems difficult to filter through to the specific interest groups I am interested in.   That could be my newness to the APP or a deficiency.  Overall I find it a helpful tool to seek out like minded/interest oriented people/groups.

Welcome. Come join us! This app has the potential to change lives, cure loneliness, and create a community again from the ashes of our technology immersed society. It gives you a reason to look up from your mobile phone screen and rejoin the real world. Meetup is a community revitalizer!

Each new update makes it worse and worse Now when you get an email notifying you of an event and you click on the event it doesn't take you to the event on the app, it takes you to any random page. The app is completely useless now, but the email notifications unfortunately are linked with the horrid app not the internet, so there's no relationship between links on the email and the app at all . For all the price increases you imposed you'd expect improvements of some sort.

Gotten better The app has improved leaps and bounds, as an Organizer (and assistant organizer of a second group) having this access be such a smooth experience has been amazing. I wish more people would actually use it lol

Meet up Nice app, easy to use. I have only used it for a short time but have found many interesting groups and those I have contacted with questions have responded quickly. If you are looking for a group or activity this is good place to start.
“Life-changing” is bold... but true 🙂 I discovered the Meetup app 2 weeks ago, and it has already improved my life SO much.
Great idea I love the Meetup app. It’s helped me identify groups of interest and similar professions. The events and reminders within the app are great, also the ability to transfer to my calendar.

Great way to find like minded folks in a new place I’ve both looked for and created events on Meet up and the process is super easy. If you’re looking to try something new at a low cost you can find pretty much whatever you need OR create it yourself!

Most useful app About 3 years ago I first used Meetup to find hiking groups and since then my life has changed! It has become my daily ritual to check the app for new hikes coming up. I have become much more active outdoors, have made great friends through meetup. It’s a great app.
