🤙🏼🤙🏼 I lived about 2 hours away from the city and finally moved to the city. It has been the best way to get to meet new people who have similar interests. Everyone’s really welcoming and for someone who’s an introvert like me, made me comfortable to be able to go and meet them. The events are always fun

Best app for spending free time wisely This app has offered so many amazing opportunities for growth, health, fun, meeting new people. It’s just an all-around awesome app offering one opportunity after another to get together with likeminded individuals. Highly recommend this app for all ages, especially if you’re new to an area.

Uploading Photos from OiS For whatever reason the new version of the app only recognizes 89 random photos of the over 350 photos on my phone. I deleted it and download it from the Cloud again, hoping that corrects the issue. It did not.

Educational and enlightening Had a great eye opening experience and the funny thing is I tried the techniques we practiced tonight and the response from my partner was just as negative as I expected. I’m going to need to practice this technique...a lot. I’ll be back. Thank you Elizabeth and Arturo for creating a safe space to be.

Informative and easy to use This app has really helped align and made easy finding events near me, where I can continue to explore and meet new people. As a newly divorced person with no friends or family in the area, it’s challenging to meet groups of people with similar likes, especially when I work from home.

Great app I just downloaded this app. I joined a few groups. Yesterday I participated in two events. In the morning I went to a community outreach event where we fed and gave necessities to the homeless at Tempe Town Lakes.

Best app ever!!! I can’t thank the creators enough for this app! It makes socializing in new places so easy. Who doesn’t want to try thing and meet people but not be the only one alone. It’s a great way to make friends and try new things! Thank you so much for making adult socializing so easy!

Cobb/Cherokee Hang Out Started out to be a beautiful day at the lake with fun, loving folks. Plenty of  hamburgers, hot dogs, potato, pasta and fruit salad for the taking.  Some people bathed and someone even brought his boat. There was a nice breeze and unfortunately after a few hours rain came down. Thank you everyone we had a nice time 🙂
Great way to meet people I’ve found a few great groups through here. It’s great for meeting people with similar interests.

Great way to meet new people and try new things I’ve made two big moves so far, and both times, Meetup has been my go-to for finding like-minded people to spend time with in a new city. I actually met one of my closest friends at a Meetup event a couple of years ago!

Great for finding people with shared interests. It can be difficult finding people who share mutual interests to do things with. This certainly helps and most everyone is in the same situation trying to get to know other people. I’ve had a lot of great experiences thanks to this app.
Good but could be better for organizers Overall, good app. It would be totally solid with a few improvements for group organizers.

Great website keeps me informed I’ve been using Meetup for about a year and it has afforded me the opportunity to select events that I can attend. It gives reminders on my calendar and lets me know upcoming events I can attend. I highly recommend it if you are a vendor or if you want o attend local events,

Great App This App allows like minded or even diversified thinkers to congregate. It’s a one stop shop to allow one to explore interests and to add new interests without a lot of pressure. The various amount of groups and interests simplifies expanding a social life or passions, without the associated headaches that can accompany having only a set group of friends.

Having Fun In a New City I would highly recommend the meetup app to anyone who just moved to a new place and is looking to meet people and get involved in community activities. It solves the problem of making friends as an adult, especially helpful if you work from home!

Awesome way to get social! I am enjoying this app thus far. I’ve had only positive experiences with the groups that I’ve joined and the outings that I’ve participated. I’ve had a much better experience living nearer a larger city than I did when I was in a smaller city. There are a lot more opportunities.

Business owner/Golf coach I’m relatively new to Dallas after leaving here and spending 31 years as an entrepreneur in Los Angeles metroplex. This app is remarkable, I’ve only been introduced to it a day ago and have joined several groups already. I’ve had the opportunity also to refer others to the app.  Thank you

Annoying and unnecessary reminder notification This app keep sending me unnecessary notification of the meetups that I probably checked out but didn’t bother to sign up or just not interested. This is so annoying to find the notifications every time I open the app. God knows what kind of developers they hire 😡
Good service I’ve had a great time meeting people here. The only problem I had a man found me in one of the meetups

Pretty sweet Like the app! My only reason for not five stars is there appears to be a slight bug where if you have a comment in your notifications and you click to go directly to the comment, it will not load that page. Other than that, easy to use and navigate. Also, meetup is great! Met pretty cool people on here.

Great app for keeping social I have used this app for a few years and have been very happy with the app for the groups using it. My husband and I have enjoyed many different social experiences we would otherwise not have been aware of in our community.

Amazing I’ve lived here for a year now and only heard of this app a month ago. I have made so many friends during that time. We get together outside of meet ups and still go to a bunch together! Highly recommended for everyone!!! Great way to meet people with similar interests!

Very Helpful I love the app. Especially being from Boston, it’s a great and easy way to meet like minded people and helps to navigate your way in a new city (Like DC) for myself personally. I hope MeetUp keeps growing and creating different avenues to navigate our ways in different cities! Keep it up!😂

A positive app Meet up is a great app simply because you can pick your interests and meet with like minded ppl that can help you reach your goals. Also you get to discover new places and events that you didn’t know exist. I’m enjoying meeting new ppl, learning, and finding new places to go to.

Cool app I like this app a lot, it’s great to find groups of people doing activities you’re interested in, and have group discussions. I wish there were a calendar tab where you could see everything going on by day, but the event reminders are really helpful.

Great way to meet people who have the same interests I used meet up in the past to join paddle board events and met cool people and had a lot of fun. I am now a host for paddle boarding in Jupiter Fl. and look forward to having fun on the water with other paddle enthusiasts or those who want to try out the sport.

So glad I discovered this app! I am newly into the fetish and kink worlds, and had NO IDEA that there was such an active community in my area! I’m so stoked to be offered so many classes and seminars in my area that appeal not only just to that, but to my extremely varied interests. It’s the greatest & I tell everyone I meet about it 🤘

Great idea great app I love the amount of groups that are available. The notices keep me up to date with any new group formed, which makes it easy for me to decide quickly whether its for me or not. I still haven't had the balls to attend any of the meet ups, but im getting there. This app makes it easy for an introvert like myself find groups.
Meetup I have only gone to two Meet-ups but can say each were fun.  It was great having new experiences and being with a group of very friendly people who are interested in the same.

Good app It’s a good app to connect with local people with similar interest. I have given one less star because as organizer I don’t get access to all the features that are available on meetup website. So in Order to fully get control over to manage my meetup I need to use my laptop as it can’t be done over the app.

Good, but can use improvement I’d like to see a feature which helps users to understand any scheduling conflicts.  If I accept Meetups at the same time, on the same day, I’d like for this to be raised to my attention as an FYI.

Not very good on iPad On an iPad this is an inconvenient app. There is no landscape mode, and it has a poor use of screen space. Meetup “Badges” size is a poor choice, as screen width only fits about 1 & 2/3rds badges. It gives you the feeling of searching through a straw.

Great app for meeting people with common interests! I have joined a three meet-up groups, and within the first week, was able to enjoy three meet ups; drawing class, meditation group, and East Asian Studies group. You can even make public comments, or message other members of the meet-up group.

Events The meet up app offers a vast array of opportunities for me to meet new people and enjoy fun activities. Working full time from home does not allow me to have much friendly conversation and it is always nice to meet others for good, friendly conversation while enjoying some kind of activity other than work!

Great for travelers & entrepreneurs! Being in the military I’ve traveled a lot. It was a lifesaver when I discovered Meetup back in 2011! I was interested in connecting with fellow queens on their natural hair journey to get tips and guidance as well as hiking experts to explore the outdoors with. I’ve had some great experiences and made some wonderful connections thanks to Meetup!

I love the variety of events / activities I really enjoy this app . Whatever is your cup of tea,  rest assured you’ll find it here . Do you prefer coffee? No worries: there are lots of groups that make coffee , talk about coffee , meet at a coffee place etc . Meet all kinds of people . This side it’s actually very appropriate for introverts.

Easy to use I’ve just started using the meetup app. I’ve used the computer program over the years and find the app easy for browsing and checking my events. Much easier than logging onto the computer.

Great App, but Missing Key Features Both on desktop and on the phone app, it would be amazing to have an event automatically go live if you set a date and time that it should be announced. That way, you can set an event and forget about posting yourself manually if you don't have access to Internet.

Meetup Is an excellent app. that supports all kinds of meetings and events.   For regulars it is a way to always sign up.  And for those new to the event. They can find those that appeal to their interest or fields.  I have truly met some of the most inspirational, talented and heartfelt, creative  business and healing professionals at meetup events.

Great app, but no cigar The Meetup App works flawlessly. Wish I could say as much for their billing department. Have been trying to get a refund for several months double billing for over 2 months, with no success yet. Took me a days of emailing to break past their automated response barriers to finally get connected to a (I think) live person.

New to an area and finding active people The meet up app has worked fantastic as part of my relocation. Four years ago my wife and I moved halfway across the country and knew nobody. Attending meet up groups running some has helped meet some very interesting people.

Useful app I was shocked to find this app randomly in the last year. This is the answer to my need to find like minded people and activities to get me out. The first meeting i went to was gratifying as the people were inviting and easy to be with. I also enjoyed the activity. Thanks for MeetUps!
MeetUp great app to stay in touch with ppl who enjoy similar things

Making Connections Meetup is a great way to learn about activities and get togethers with people who have similar interests. It’s a great way to explore your interests, learn new things and meet people. If you have a friend or partner, it’s a great way to get out of the house together and experience something new.

Great way to meet new friends Meetup groups are a nice way to meet people who have similar interests.  A lot of people think it is a dating app.  There are singles meetups but there are many more meetup groups available.  I surprisingly felt comfortable and had a great time at my very first meetup.  Everyone was warm and welcoming.

Met great people! This is a great app to go outside and have fun and meet new people every week. To dance, talk, connect, eat, share, and much more! I highly recommend this app to make new friends and to just go out if you don’t want to be at home. I go out to meet new people by myself and it’s great.

Great app - give it time! I’ve had the app for a while and there wasn’t a nearby group like I wanted. Recently, a new group popped up that matched my interests and I joined immediately. The app has been great for pulling the group together, helping us to get started, and getting us organized.

Meetup app I love the app but only one problem I've had with it.  For over a month, it would just shut down immediately when I opened it.  I sent a message to have this fixed and it's working so I hope they found the issue!

Great way to meet people This app is better than the dating app. Usually people are wanting just to do things with. People aren’t alway wanting more than a friendship. This websites allow for alternative and various activities with people of same interest.

Great if you are having trouble meeting people because you don’t hang out in bars Just started, but found a lot of groups with different interests of mine. Looking forward to making more friends and perhaps finding that special lady.

Easy way to let them know you are coming I’m part of a volleyball group who meets once or twice a week. It is so easy to let them know I will be there with or without a guest; see who else is coming; and start a short discussion if necessary

Very organized You can look up meet-ups by group or date (very convenient given my varying work schedule), and puts the events you RSVPd to at the top so you know exactly what you’re going to and can easily select it to review the details. Very user friendly.

Puppy training with Angela This class was just awesome!!!!  Angela is amazing - so knowledgeable and informative, and she has a wonderful kindness toward both the dogs and their owners.  My little Winston loved it as well, and in only one class he already comes and sits very well. I highly recommend this company and Angela - just fantastic ❤️

Great for everyone! Great way for meeting new friends, new experiences, and new places! Due to my job I move around a lot, in the states and overseas. Was able to found great groups with same interest. Highly recommend for a traveler or someone who just wants to get out of the house.

Best idea ever! App is dependable Meetup is THE place to meet liked minded people and make new friends. ❤️ this app! It was recommended to me when I moved to a new area so I could get to know people. It has been 7 years now and we are still friends :) Step out of your comfort zone & Get connected!

Meetup app This is a user friendly app that helps with making real in person connections with people in your area with similar interests, goals. etc. increasing your sense of belonging as well as opportunity to improve the community in which you live in.

Great App for meeting & making new friends Love Meetup!  It is a great app for meeting and making new friends.  Just joined and already had a great discussion about art, collaboration, societal influence and more with fellow creatives, went to a premier of a new film not yet released, and have joined with other singles to help the homeless with food and clothing.

Hyped up on meetups I love the interface and functionality of the app. It makes it easy to find groups that I want to connect with and network with for future endeavors. I’ve met some pretty awesome people through this interface and it’s awesome to connect with like minded humans.

Perfect title Meetup is awesome in various different ways. Variety it brings to the table is unbelievable. I can meet group of people related to my profession as well as related to the game like Tennis. If you spend some time you can save lot of money for example going to boot camps etc .. I m enjoying it 😍😍😍

Went to my first meeting! I've had the app for a long time and never went because of my anxiety. Finally got the courage to just go and it was a great time. The app is well laid out and if you're in a city you should have lots of options for groups.

I wish I didn’t need this This is the worst, most glitchy app ever. I have to delete it and reinstall it EVERY time I use it. It is very frustrating when trying to keep a group of 50+ members organized. I once loved it when I started using it about 3 years ago. Since then, every update has gotten worse and becomes less user friendly each time. I actually have to give a tutorial for new members of our group on how to use it and they usually just give up. FIT IT ALREADY!!!

Functional but needs work Searches work most of the time, but sometimes they don’t and I have no idea what I’ve done wrong in choosing a particular search word or phrase. I recently added a comment that I needed to correct, but there isn’t a way to edit comments. There is no way I can find to change the announcing text of a Meetup I own for ALL occurrences, only one at a time.
Moved from New York I just moved to Houston from New York not knowing really anyone but my family. This has helped meet some incredible people here plus getting active in the community.

Great to find new activities and groups This app is great to find people outside of your current circle they have the same interests as you. Not only that you can find events, seminars and a lot of different activities that aren’t always easy to find.

Great way to meet new people I really enjoy this app. It’s easy to use and it’s a great way to meet new people with similar interest. As a Meetup organizer I find this app to be very efficient when’s it comes to setting up a meetup and keeping up with all the comments a details surround the meetup.

Meetup Great ap for connecting with likeminded people.  Whether you’re new in town or would like to find others to hang out with, go to a movie, or have dinner companions— this is the site to find out important info!  Check it out, there is something for everyone😀

Great way to make friends! The app is a great concept the only reason it lost a star is because the conversation piece on the app is really annoying. It doesn’t load new messages like a text, you have to exit the conversation, then go back in and scroll all the say down every time there is a new comment

Great Way to Organize Groups Meetup is a great way to organize a group of like minded people.  The organization and app are created in a way to secure personal information. After each session, you will he asked if you felt welcomed.  I really enjoy the group I found.  Thank you!

Great way to find fun things to do The Meetup app offers a simply way to find fun activities and or groups to hangout with. I use this app to stay connected with my current two walking groups as well as for looking into new groups that I might want to join.

Love This App! This Meetup app is very well-designed. Very user-friendly and makes life so much easier to signup for workshops and local events and allows one to get a glimpse of what’s happening in San Diego! Great way to meet interesting people who share your social interests and find like-minded friends.

James River Hikers Being new to Richmond my wife and I wanted to get involved in a group that would allow us to meet new people while learning about our adopted city. James River Hikers fulfills our needs, great groups of people that share our yearnings for history coupled with exercise and camaraderie.

Instead of walking up to strangers... I don’t have an issue walking up to strangers.  But sometimes strangers don’t like it.  This allows me to meet my next friend without having to randomly strike up a convo at the store - my kids are constantly reminding me to not talk to strangers. 🤔✌🏼

Awesome Can find anything you would like to do. The people in the groups I’ve attended are open and welcoming. The app works great and I’ve never had a glitch. You get reminders, directions and can view past, current or future events.

Great way to explore new interests The app is great because before joining a group you can see how many others have joined and how active the group is. I’ve joined two groups so far and enjoyed both. The app makes it very easy to organize events.

Great connections I have been met an amazing group of women that do various activities. So many different walks of life coming together enjoying each other company. I would have never made so many friends and experienced great adventures if it weren’t for the app!!

Kinda lame on an Ipad I guess it would be okay for phone-only use. Annoying as hell on an Ipad, because it's locked at portrait angle - so if you're using a tablet, especially one with a detachable keyboard, it's ridiculous. And locked at a phone size and ratio. Give people the ability to rotate the app, it's nonsensical to have it locked like this.

Easy to use Easy to browse for new groups, chat in events/discussions, and join events. Sends a moderate amount of notifications in groups which is kinda of odd. I use this a few times a week to look and for very basic use it’s great!

Excellent interface and notification platform Very nicely done app. Easy to you, change reservations, and note upcoming events. Also get notifications through Stock and G Calendar along with functionality for other planning apps.
Something for everyone This app is fantastic for connecting with people who share common interests. I check in every few weeks because there are always new groups and activities available.

Meetup helps me with opportunities As a woman I have been able to find groups for photography and outdoor activities that because they are out far enough, at dark, or in the depths of the city I might not do on my own. I have also met nice people with similar interests.

Meet up experience Thanks to meet up... I have met many incredible people and I have had opportunities to continue to grow my circle of like minded people and professionals. I definitely recommend you give it a try and experience something new.

Great This app is very useful and a great way for me to stay connected with individuals who share the same interest and mindset that I have. It’s been a great resources for me to find groups that fit my interest and I otherwise would have done hours of research to find. This is app is awesome!

Meetup is a great App for networking I found Meetup about 8 years ago and have used mainly for business networking. But it has been very helpful for other social events like the 2019 VegFest. It is an easy way to setup reminders for local events in my area. I highly recommend it!

Wonderful opportunity to make new friends! A great setup for starting and joining in on gatherings of like minded folks. If you have an interest, a hobby or activity you want to share with others, you’ll be sure to find a group within Meetup. If not , start your own Meetup!
Nice! So many interest! We can search for what we are interested in and join to meet and socialize with others with same interest.

Hiking I haven’t had a chance to go hiking yet but I like the fact that it’s offered. I do hope to start soon. I love to hike so I’m excited to start again. It’s wonderful that I have the opportunity to view the hikes that are available. I love the outdoors and nature. Thank you for this app.

Meetup App This app is fantastic. I am able to connect and network with different groups. It’s also helped me create many connections needed for my business. If your looking to network this is the app if your looking to grow your group this is the app.

Effortless way to meet people What a great way to meet others who share your same interests. Get involved in whatever you like and take a pass on the rest. So many options to choose from! Great for someone new to an area or recently on their own.

There’s something for everyone With the groups that I’ve found I’ve been able to connect with a network of individuals like myself; that alone makes it worth it! Wasn’t sure if there were others out there who like to do what I do but I guess there’s a group for everyone.

Great app for newcomers and branching out I am growing weary of social media, but not this app! Finally a way to get back to meeting in person for fun and social activities. This is the answer to our issues with the rise of the internet. So far it’s had no technical issues for me as well.

Finally! Getting joining a group with common interests is easy. Finally! I’ve been trying to get people together to play games I like for years. Now I can just join an existing group and not have to do all the work of getting people to show up.

Nice really nice This app gives you the privilege to meet people doing the same thing you want in your community I really give this app 100 stars. Because I moved to a new neighborhood and I had no friends or anything to do this app made it really easy to feel at home

The only reason I have friends I moved to a new town and couldn’t find a way to meet like minded people. Meetups helped me finally find friends and gives me an opportunity to learn from people who have been involved in these activities for a long time.

First time This is the first time I’ve used this app and I am very pleased with it.  I was a little unsure how the actual meetup would go, but I found it very pleasant.  The app is very helpful in not just finding meetups, but the added features of sharing and integration with my calendar is very nice.
Handy to Have I had problems with the app at first but I had learned that it is a way of communicating if I get lost!
Perfect Great app for group/events.  Easy to keep updated for events/gatherings.

Good idea I like the whole idea but downloading pictures is hard, too slow, you never know right away if it is happening or not. Later I can see if they downloaded, or not. I give 5 stars in advance hoping it will improve.
Good app but here is some suggestions It’s a very good app and i like it very much

FUN It’s a super way of meeting new people. Everyone is so friendly & kind. Discovering some great local musicians & food in the area. I’ve been developing some quality friendships through the different meetings. Lastly, I’m getting out & enjoying life more with this new set of friends.

Great way to network Started working immediately to improve my network. Found a bunch of nerds just like me who work in the same field and these groups have it going on! Thanks for making this such a breeze with your app.

Keeps me updated and provides new suggestions Great app to keep up with the intellectual arena in the city like Boston where there is so much activity and congregation around.  different interest areas.

Always a great meeting spot I have had great experiences through this app for years all over the US! I recommend it to anyone looking to stay motivated and connected. Just be safe and ask questions when you join a group. 🥰🥰

Perfect for meeting new people I just moved to a new city without knowing anyone. This app is a huge reason why I have a group of friends to hang out with now. Meeting people with similar interests as an adult is difficult to do, this app makes it a lot easier!

Great App! I love using meetup. I have joined many groups and have made so many friends through it. A few months ago I made a group for dog lovers in my area and have had many great experiences through that and not only am I making friends but my dog is too!

Good stuff! Wonderful way to meet like minded people and a wonderful way to get out, get active and most importantly, to not feel lonely!!! It’s great for both young adults, middle agers and I would think, perfect for lonely elderly people!!! So glad I joined meetup so long ago. You don’t have to live life feeling lonely!!!

Grateful Due to my job I have lived in 6 cities in 2 years. I finally found Meetup and have already connected with a hiking group of women and made new friends. Being in a new city all the time can be very hard but this has helped me have a social life.
Smart, intuitive and convenient I just heard from a friend about this app. From downloading and making my choices it was just a breeze.

Meet up I am newly divorced after 22 years. I love people but was married to a person who did not like to be around people   At 52 I find myself alone and wanting to socialize but not at the younger bar scene.   Meetup is a great way for me to meet new people and find my voice.   Thank you

App improved from before App improved over the years. I can do everything from app as Website. I am able to see the new and past meetups, rate them after attending, message others in meetup. Thanks for improving the app!!

Hopelessly in Boston! Been here for 3 yrs almost but this year started looking for venues to join. Meetup has been my life saver. Thanks to Meetup I am playing volleyball, met new friends possibly joining a movie goer group! Next adventure will be to find a spades game team of people. Thanks for adding a little adventure and excitement! ❤️

Indispensable app for professional education & networking I use the Meetup app all the time. It helps me keep track of the many professional activities going on in the Austin, TX area. I find it indispensable for keeping my professional development active, and I recommend the app to everyone.
Curious? Do you enjoy learning new things? Do you abhor boredom? ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Fun App ! Was looking to find some people to play tennis with after moving to a new city. Came across the Meetup app and found a really good bunch of people to play tennis and now we have become a regular bunch. Besides tennis and other sports, you can find wide range of groups to join depending on your interests. Also app is very easy to use.

Wonderful opportunities This is a really great way of getting out into the world and finding like minded people! Been to some amazing events and can easily find clubs, groups, and classes of things I am interested in. Wonderful passion people and fun things to do. Highly recommend!!

A strong start in a new city. I’m new to Brooklyn, it’s been less than a week since moving from the Mid-West. Establishing connections with local communities always takes time and can often be unpredictable. With this app, I’m looking forward to an LGBTQ support group, drawing classes, and volunteer work. The Meetup app is great for establishing local connections.

So far, so fun It seems pretty fun, and I’m enjoying it, but the app itself seems a little confusing because there are times when I reply and I get a prompt that says “invalid member” when I’m pretty sure I got “accepted”. Hopefully I’ll just get used to it and get better at it.

Makes Meeting New People Easier I like to call myself a homebody and introvert. When I discovered meetup I didn’t know what to expect. Each time I go out with the groups I’ve joined I have an amazing time. It makes meeting people easier. Everyone has been so welcoming.

Great App I’ve been using this app for about three years now. It centralizes and filters the events that are most relevant to me. I love that you can look through the attendees list and see if a familiar face is registered for the event. I also love that you can DM them. Its a great tool for networking.

Great way to get out and meet people Tons of groups and opportunities to meet people. It’s as effective as you are willing to step out of your comfort zone. So get out there and meet new people, find groups that you have common interests in and just show up. Easy as that!!
It’s good for a majority of people This is a great app for a vast majority of people.

Incredibly hard to navigate The information that this app needs to convey is really simple: A list of groups, the meetings associated with them, and the ones you belong too. It seems to have taken almost an intentional decision to make it so unintuitive to get around. Even when I get to places that are in theory where I want to be (the list of my groups for example) there’s no rhyme or reason to how they’re organized and There are always some that seem to be missing or somehow buried.

Pretty good but..... I like MeetUp. However, the current iPhone app does not allow me to Mark an event as not attending anymore unless I receive notification about it through email. Also I cannot decline membership to a group I run with an explanation. I have to use the full website to do it which is inconvenient if I have the app.

Intellectual Conversation Group One of the most intellectually inspiring group discussions available.  Great way to spend quality time when you can leave a discussion feeling empowered with more knowledge than when you arrived.  Learning is powerful and addictive.

Great for meeting people I have created multiple groups on meetup and they are all flourishing. The app is really easy to use and always functions properly. Highly recommend for people trying to make new friends with similar interests.

Great App Love this app for my phone. Not so great on my tablet as it has trouble adjusting for whatever reason. But the phone access helps out with navigation and messaging and photos of the event etc. Amazing! You can even find groups in other states And countries.

More Active Than Ever I’ve been wanting to play tennis for a while, I left my hometown and moved to a city where I was not familiar with any court or with any players. I found a group right away and was able to practice and enjoy a recreational time with some fellow aficionados! Love this app!

Meetup I have been a member for over 10 years. This is a great way to meet people with similar interest. Safe and easy!  Signup and show up is all it requires.  Met some wonderful people. I have used it to attend events throughout the US when traveling for work.

never had the feeling i was alone anymore This app has many benefits for everyone who has an interest in sharing experiences together, even someone as anti-social as I had been for quite awhile reap the benefits of small get togethers. I feel safe with this app.

Meetup is awesome! I love you that it categorizes groups based on your location and interests. I’m most excited about the types of groups that are even available! The messaging system opens up communication and you can create or join a group easily!

This app connects people! I am a member of a very active hiking group and this app has made it possible. The only reason I gave it four stars instead of five is that I am not getting notifications for when events are posted. I used to but for some reason they stopped coming a year ago.

APP BLOAT! Like many apps, Meetup suffers from app bloat. What once was a manageable download has now become a 342MB monstrosity. Developers seem to think that modern apps must be a Swiss Army knife of capabilities for all users. Focus on the core needs of 80% of users, let the rest of the features fall on the website, and get this thing down to around 100MB where it belongs.

Good experiences I moved to a new area and this has been a great way to meet new people with the same interests. The layout is good and I like that you can message through the app and not have to give out personal info until you are ready to.

Started with a 5 mile walk First 5 mile walk on moonlight beach with Hiking Addicts and it was fun. Large group came out, people were friendly, walking and talking the two hours flew by. Easy group to connect with. Looking forward to going on hikes and getting to know people.

Always Good It has been a great way to find people and activities to do in the area since my fiancé and I moved. We are not very extroverted people and just go out and do something random-we like having plans and Meet Up is a great way to have that.

Account Disabled, Meetup ignores my request for help!!! When I try to login to my account, I get an error message saying my account has been disabled. I have followed the steps several times to open a ticket and I have never received a response from Meetup Support. I am extremely frustrated that my requests have been ignored. Meanwhile, I cannot access any features on Meetup. Did all the Meetup customer support agents quit or something? It’s been two weeks and I haven’t heard anything.

Great for introverts! I don’t like putting myself out there with company I don’t know very well but this app has given me the opportunity to branch out to meet new people that at least have my same interests!

There is something for everyone! This is one of the best ways to meet new (or even old) friends whether you’re new to the LA area, or you’ve been here for awhile. Find something you like, or want to try for the first time, get out there and have fun!

Still the Best Meetup is still the best platform for finding your tribe. And, it’s easy to be an organizer and put out there whatever it is you want to find. I’ve always enjoyed events I’ve participated in and meet open, friendly people too.

Great App!! Perfect. Just wish I could attend the events more often. My work schedule doesn’t allow for me to attend of the events I’d like to on the app but is is still nice to learn about new places in Columbus to visit later. Great app for joining groups and for communicating about events.

Dope App. Great for finding things to do in your city whether it be business or personal! Grow your business, find travel buddies. Might even find some people to play dodgeball with in you’re into that kind of thing (Denver’s got a dodgeball club). Download the app. You’ll be happy

Not user friendly I wish I could click rsvp to see what it is I rsvp for. Sometimes I forget to add to calendar and can't go back. I have to click every group I'm in to check the events to see if I rsvp for them. Annoying

Amazing way to make friends If you are moving to a new city, I highly recommend downloading this app. It is perfect for trying new things and connection with people who share similar interests. 10/10 would meet up again.

So happy to have found this app I’m new to meet up but I am enjoying it and look forward to making new friends. My only critique would be that it’s difficult for us to ask each other questions and write back-and-forth but maybe I just haven’t learned how to do that yet.

Organized Great app, easy to use and understand.  Managing information is well done and ability to move in and out makes this app a great resource and way to meet people interested in the same things that I am interested in!

Networking Opportunities ! This app is amazing. I love all the events that I find on here. I meet AMAZING people. Learn so much new things! It great! I’ve only used it for one month and I’m constantly looking for events to meet up with new people to connect and gain more knowledge in topics that I’m interested in. 💙

Meet Up I love this app because it’s a great way to get yourself out there and network with a variety of people from different backgrounds and businesses. You never know who you will meet that might just change your life!!!!

Wont load After using the meet up app for months it won't load anymore. Only get a message saying “Sorry, somethings gone wrong. Please try again later.” Ive uninstalled it and downloaded it again on my iphone 7 numerous times. I messaged support on 12/14. I heard back in the form of an auto reply stating that the Community Support Team would be in touch ASAP. Nothing. Still cant access anything but I continue to get emails about events from my numerous groups. Totally lame.

Great for Connecting Meetup has helped me find people that like to do the same things I do. That made my move to DC so much easier; it is otherwise hard to find like-minded friends when one works long hours during the week.

Opens new horizons Never before would I have found the opportunity to see a free piano concert at the Austrian embassy.  That and so much more are now highlighted and easy to join, for low to no cost.
Easy to use and get started Downloaded the app and was already finding things to do and places to go within a few minutes. There was so much more organized to do in Charlotte than I thought!

Stay Connected I wasn’t knowing what was happening on meetup till I got the app! The App so easy to manage and find the groups your interested in and being able to join them. Get the App so you can make new friends and have a blast!

Great app but one improvement I love the app and what it offers the only thing I would like is a little better organization. It can be a little cluttered and disorganized to me. Maybe not a feed style but some other format. But that’s the only reason I didn’t give 5 stars but otherwise great. Reminders are great.

Great way to connect with people in a new community! I recently moved from the Midwest to the east coast and used Meetup to start a book club and a running club. It has been a great way to meet people in my new community. So glad to have this as an option!!

Buddhist teachings at AFA gallery in Scranton. Our teacher provides us with many new ideas for achieving a better life for ourselves and achieving better relationships with others. I have found ways to enjoy universal love for other beings as well as appreciating the idea of loving myself.

Incredible hosts! the two hosts were extremely welcoming and created a wonderful atmosphere. A very friendly warm meeting. The nakedness wasn’t really needed, because the personalities outshined the night. Was expecting a sexual experience and found something even more interesting

Long time user This app has been great. In my experience I have relocated to a few states for work and meetup has always been a great platform to meet new people. I highly recommend it if you’re looking for local groups and events.

Great app to find out what is going on I have to say that this group is fabulous! Letting me know where and when other like minded people are getting together. I have made friends, learned about others, and now have a full calendar!
Meet app A must app for any networker.

White  only no Meetup I have Apple SE I can not see  anything just  white screen no nothing.   Nothing to transfer to my calendar I am missing events  Baaaddd for me since I organize. Did you terminated my phone with all the fancy new updates? ?????New  up date still white screen.  Every time you up deleted white screen  new version will not load.  Now I have no Meetup HELP!!!!!

Great app It’s really refreshing to use an app that’s to meet people in your area! I’ll use this app to find an activity to get out of the house and to meet new friends especially since I just moved to a new state. You’ll be able to meet like-minded people!

Latest update took us backwards So disappointed in what was once a smooth running and easy to use app. Now I can’t log in and if I try to exclusively use the site via chrome/safari and want to send a message to our guests it pushes me back to the app and I can’t get it to log-on so end up not being able to manage guests and meetups. Wish they would work harder to get the glitches out if this version and make this once again a lm actual management tool.
Helps me keep up w activities I’ve been on Meetup for years now and the app helps me stay connected to questions/updates happening for individual events, or make certain whose coming etc.

Easy and effective I love this app!! I just moved to NY and found a ton of friends. I found a group for frisbee and softball a group for clubbing, a group for Chinese, and that was just 3 weeks! So easy to use and would totally recommend if you like doing stuff and meeting like minded people.

Good at making new friends! Really helpful in meeting new people. I just moved cross county and was looking for a way to meet new people outside of work and this definitely helped! There were a lot of groups for young people who had just moved so it was kinda perfect.

Unable to Edit Profile I created my account before my recent move to the gulf coast. Since then I have been unable to change my information to reflect my relocation so the app and service is completely useless to me. Anytime I go to edit my info the app immediately crashes and when I try to access via a web browser the  option isn’t provided to me since I’m accessing the info on a mobile device 😑. Come on. It shouldn’t be this difficult.

Great way to recharge your artistic self If you took a few art courses way back or if you are currently into art and need more practice this is a great opportunity recharge or expand your practice. It’s a chance to draw humans and be drawn by humans and improve or explore at your own pace

Great for Big Cities I used to live in a smaller city, and this app was all but useless. But find yourself a nice group in a major city and then it really shines! I’ve been using in for weeks nonstop now and I’ve met a lot of people and get to pass my free time with activities I enjoy.

Actually surprised I do not like social media or social anything really. One day I got over myself and tried this ap. I was pleasantly surprised to find so many others with same interest who just kinda wanna stare at you and move their mouths. I like it
Easy to use The app is easy to use and explore. Nice to be able to have events auto-added to your calendar and also to be able to directly upload pictures if wanted.

Meet up groups for dance Hi we just formatted a meet up group for salsa and hustle dance.. we gather once or twice a week in different locations... I am so impressed with the draw and support we get from this app. We have been able to strengthen and grow our dance community

Great place to foster new friendships Any interest you have it’s here.  You can join a group and go out by yourself.  The organizers are always welcoming and supportive of new members.  Try it!  Most are free or charge a minimal annual fee.  Any charges for events are advised beforehand and you can pay using PayPal.

Meet up has helped me When I moved to Florida three years ago I didn’t know anybody. Someone suggested beat up? So I went to a couple of events and I stood around in the corner to staring and not engaging! LOL. Those days are over I recommend it highly, why waste time!

Austin Drumz Community Drum Circle Excellent app! Highly recommend it for gathering folks together with special interests!very simple and easy to navigate and it really brings in the people! I really appreciate it a lot and feel it has been a great contributor in  building our community!

New to a city? This is your app I found this app when I moved to a new city and it has provided safe events around my interests. I’ve made new friends. I stay entertained with all of the options it offers. I also network and learn new skills. Love this app.

Great way to acclimate to a new city Have relocated twice from my DC base in the last year. Once to San Diego and the other to Mobile AL. Meetup has been invaluable in getting connected in both communities and finding people interested in the same activities and hobbies as me. Great app!

Meetup This is the perfect social app. I left the media part out because you actually use this app to go out! It's great. Whatever you're into, you'll be able to find a group or start one, that addresses your interests and celebrates them.

The Meet Up App works very well Helps me keep organized, find new events, sign up for them and remind me of the event and the details. Let’s you know who you will expect to see there, thus helping you know their name and ultimately getting to know them.

Great way to broaden your horizons! The app is very user friendly. You can check on any events happening in your area or check out only the ones you are a member of. It’s easy to send and receive messages with the app too. Love this!

Meet people doing the things you love!! I downloaded the app when my husband and I moved and it was a great way to meet people doing the things we love. We have met some truly amazing people and have had some great experiences we will never forget.

App keeps getting worse Everything is cached wrong. I get notifications about new comments or photos uploaded, so I click and see nothing updated. Oops you have to manually pull down to refresh, such a bad UX.

Meeting people with similar interests I really enjoy the meetup app. I was able to meet people that I normally would encounter online, in person. When I attend these meet ups everyone is  welcoming and positive. It’s a great atmosphere with liked minded individuals. Using the meetup app reminds me that I am not alone🙂.

Meetup is a great tool. My only issue is that notifications don’t update frequently enough, so sometimes even though the app is not showing any notifications from the outside, once I open it I find several.

Way better than the desktop version Whenever I am on the desktop version I am constantly logged off or told I cannot RSVP etc but so far the app is great and isn’t having any of those technical issues.

Very Happy Highly recommend MeetUp as a way to connect with good people, usually doing the same things you enjoy and/or exposing you as the user to new things, activities and events you wouldn’t otherwise participate in or know about.

Great way to connect interests to community. I just finished recommending it to a young man who is trying to find his way in Chester County. He mentioned that he likes to play Cricket and I thought, well if there’s not a Meet Up for it he could start one! I have found great satisfaction with the Valley Forge National Park Alliance Tuesday Trail Walks.

IPad, only works on Portrait, not Landscape? For this reason ALONE this app shows a lack of effort to be current.  App is obviously not actively worked on and if this is the case will drift into obscurity, which is disappointing as it had potential.  Still potential is a beginning and somebody will fill this space with app that is actively working on bringing groups of like minded people together on current devices that offer such basic functionality as flipping from portrait to landscape?

Inconvenient It's hard to get to future events. It takes a long time to get to the date you need or even to find the particular group you want to look up. There should be a search feature to let you look up specific dates.

Wish there wasn’t a fee For something as organic as new connections amongst people and human interaction, would be nice if there wasn’t a 15 dollar fee just to create a group. I’m thinking of just creating my own group on Facebook with the same concept since that’s free. Beautiful concept. The cost is not so much, maybe even if it was cheaper I wouldn’t rate it 3 stars. But hey it is what it is.
In theory In theory this is a great app - organizers form communities around various interests, and people meet in public to discuss or take part in activities in which they share a common interest.

It’s good way to meet new people Never heard of Meetup until I joined a group at church that likes the outsides. I have met new people and have done things that I hear people talking about. I am not someone who does not like doing stuff by myself. I like a good way get out there.

Great communication vehicle I’ve found this app overall easy to use. One improvement would be to include a link to the sender rather than have to go to the website to look up the info.  Maybe just highlight the senders name with a link to their email address.

Meetup So glad I finally got involved. The only way you can get out of your house (and your comfort zone) is to try something new—or something you already know you enjoy—with new people. Meetup makes that possible!

Great App!!! If you are trying to get out there and meet new people and see new places for little to no cost this app does exactly that. Its a very simple and easy app to use. In my opinion this is one of the best apps out there for people needing to get out of the house!

Poor customer service + “spam filters” make it impossible for use app properly I ran into multiple issues due the their “spam filters” erroneously flagging me as a spammer. I had help desk tickets open for literally 5 or 6 months. The only why I got a response was by repeatedly harassing the Meetup Support twitter account. When I finally did get a response, they acknowledged I did nothing wrong but that there was nothing they could do to override the spam filter. Ridiculous.

Meetup is Awesome I can’t tell you how helpful this app has been in my life. After moving to a new city, I quickly found like minded people for group outings in several hobbies! It is easy to use and there are a lot of others on the app!

Social networking I truly adore meetup.  It has served me well for 15 years.  It’s a great resource to network with people with similar interest and it has truly saved my life a couple of times that I can recall.  I encourage everyone to take advantage to this resource and help it grow.

Great service, mediocre app I love meetup and depend upon it. I’m grateful that it exists. The app and web page suffer from usability issues that continually frustrate me, an avid app user. It is slow to load and unintuitive. I do appreciate the apparent commitment to constancy represented by the slow rate of change in the app/page - this is not a backhanded complement - but perhaps major change is called for.

Get out and become something I’ve been to two great Meet-ups in my area.  If your struggling in trying to get your business start, being a new mom, deal with school it’s a meet-up for you. Your community is here to help you grow.

Failure to address inappropriate sexual message Very cool app and I’ve enjoyed the groups I’ve found on here. Will continue to use app. However, I recently was sent a sexually inappropriate message by someone in a group and addressed it with group leader and it was resolved in that way. I also emailed meetup about this disgusting incident and there was no response. About a week later I followed up again. Disappointed that they did not respond about this or address this issue.
Great meet and do! My wife has been using this app longer than I have, I’m new to it but have been enjoying the benefits of it through her.

Idea good app okay Location settings should be able to change more flexible on the app. Especially a change in the distance to places. Can I even change my distance from the app? Everytime I clicked on something I had to search all over again instead of starting where I ended. But I like the app besides that.

Good, but Notifications need tweaking I’ve had a great time using Meetup to coordinate with groups in the area. My only complaint is that I’m notified when new groups start, even if I only want notifications about the groups I’m currently in. It’s only a minor inconvenience, but one I think is worth addressing.

Works as intended I’ve tried three meetups and indeed have met people who share my interests each time.  Everyone is very open to newcomers though you do get out what you put in.  So be open to new experiences and new people who differ from you.

No calendar?? The app is still steps behind what it used to be in terms of functionality. Please bring back basic functions - like allowing users to search for events by date. If someone is only free 5 days from now, why would you make them scroll through all the days prior to find an event? Not user-friendly.

Very helpful I have found the MeetUp app to be super helpful for browsing meetup’s, conversations, and even some emergency communication on one particular meetup hike where we did not have peoples phone numbers but we were able to communicate via the Meetup app.

Magnificent Meetups This app is an invaluable tool to assist you in personal growth and relationship building. I have never had one single problem with this app as a user and it is widely used. I highly recommend you make it part of your event planning!

Great Way To Meet This app has been a great way to get out and meet local people of like minds and common interest. It felt weird at first, but strangers can turn to friends in a very short time. I have been so blessed to meet so many music lovers, thanks meet up.
Easy to Use I approached this type of app existing, makes it easier to meet locals with similar interest under one location. The simplicity in helping to find new things to try with other people.

Great app, works fine on my IPhone. This really is a great app. Enter your interests and search for groups of things you're interested in. Perfect way to find people to play sports, games, or go hiking with with; just about any activity. Highly recommended.

A great place to meet people that share your interests So far a great app for all kinds of activities and hobbies in groups whether it is photography, hiking, language meet ups, dancing, single meet ups. Not a dating app but you can meet people that share your interests

I’ve built a good business with this meet up app When I moved across country from Tucson to Atlanta I was starting a whole new business and it keeps growing every year and I’m finally doing my holistic business now full-time thanks to meet up.

Barter group friendly! Got my son a job! Our barter company uses Meetup and we love it. It’s a great way to invite members to our events. My family uses Meetup to learn about events too. Meetup is the reason my son met a recruiter and got his first professional job while still in college. Great app!

Wonderful way to form great friendships! I've been a member of Meetup for over 3.5 years now and cannot tell you how much fun we've had and continue to have ever since we joined. We've made lots of friends who have now become family ❤️ That's priceless!
Excellent App. Bulletin Board for activities. Intuitive function on the technical aspects of app. Very good software.

Best way to schedule! I have not made it to any events yet, however since downloading the app it’s definitely easier to keep up with all of the events going on! Also puts them right on my calendar so I don’t miss one I want to attend.

Great way to connect I’m a stay at home mom who just moved to a new town and this app has been a life saver when it comes to making connections. All you have to do is find the courage to show up and put yourself out there :)

Great way to try new things, meet new people! Really like this app because you can find things that you can drop in On occasion or go to regularly. Everything from arts and crafts to hiking to dancing! Or just hanging out with people of like mind or like age.
Much better than in the past Several years ago when the app was first available it had issue but is now much improved. Very convenient for coordinating meeting people.

Love meet up I never knew this app existed but am so grateful I came across this! This is an amazing way to meet like minded individuals or step outside your comfort zone and dive into new adventures that may be scary to you! I love love love these groups and these people that put themselves out there to engage in community ♥️

Love it!! I’m really enjoying the app. It’s easy to use and easy to find matches with certain groups. I definitely recommend meetup for those who just moved to new cities, like myself or those just looking to broaden their social lives.

Meetup app I am so happy to be in the loop through Meetup.  I have only been able to participate in a few events because I am in Oceanside and most of the events I would like to attend are in San Diego, but I hope to move this Fall and will already have a community to go to.
Good app. Just one thing..... The app syncs great on my iPhone, and it works wonderfully......but I wish that it would stay logged in until I log out manually.

Makes being an organizer so easy!!! Love the Meetup app!!! It makes being an organizer so easy. Welcome new members, answer questions, check RSVPS, upload event pictures. It does it everything you need on the go and is a great compliment to the desktop interface.

Make it happen I couldn’t find a group in my area for women in business, so I decided to take a chance and start one. This app has made it super easy to post events, communicate with the group, and invite others.

love it so much I thought this is going to Be just an average app, however, the range and diversity of interest blows me away. I love this app. Thanks, MEETUP, you are changing my life and I’m meeting all kinds of really cool people and exploring all of my new interests and my old ones too 😘

Great way to meet people I have met so many great people and made great friendships. I highly recommend it for anyone new and town or just wanting to get out and do stuff with like minded people. There are groups for everything. Best thing I ever did.

Great way to find things to do that interest you.... And to meet people!  You choose groups participating in your areas of interest and you receive a listing of events-if the group(s) are active. Wonderful people too!

Great for making friends and having fun. This app is great for people who want to make friends but don’t know where to start. I made friends from an event, before, I would not have known where to even find events like these. This app is a life saver! :D

Really changed my life I am a single empty nester and found myself wholes up in my apartment “existing”.  I heard about MeetUp but didn’t know what it was about.  Once I jumped in and started socializing with like minded people my life changed completely.

Hard to find IPad app but googled it and found it App is great makes it easy to use Meetup and safe details and upcoming events.  Like that I can favorite events without having to commit to attending and the app saves my favorites so I can decide later,  recommend!,

Great way to meet new people and communities! I have used this app to network for personal and professional needs. It has been a great way to learn and bond with people you may have not had a chance to meet otherwise.

Awesome! I was a bit hesitant to check the events out, but I finally did and regret not doing so sooner. There’s definitely something for everyone and it’s a great way to meet new people, do group activities, and check places out!

Great App Although I prefer using the desktop version, sometimes the App is handy to use on my iPhone.  I don’t love the App layout, because it’s so different from the desktop layout version, but the App works as it should / as it is intended.

Best of the rest!!! Sooooo much better than any other singles apps and gives quality individuals event planning which provides a better foundation for finding friendships (and/or more) with other quality people.

Meet up is great! I love there is a place where you can find people that have similar hobbies or interests. Or you can find people new to an area just as you are. I am grateful for this outlet. It’s hard to make friends and this is a great way to do it.
Love it! Great way to learn about fun events and connect with people, especially when moving to a new place.

Easy to use All my meetups in one spot, and it’s easy to set up events as an organizer. The only downfall is that the requests to join are not in chronological order on the app like they are on the desktop. Otherwise I can’t complain!
Search CRASHES the app (iOS) I’m not sure what happened. I downloaded the latest update to the app. Now when I select the search icon (magnifying glass) the app crashes.

Great app that could be more widely utilized. I like the app a lot. Would be great to see it more widely utilized, and to see more diversity of groups on it. For instance the religious Meetups all tends to be New Age, the political Meetups all tend to be progressive. It is strong for tech Meetups but these seem to only be well attended in large cities.

Recently just moved to a new state Recently just moved to a new state this was a great way to network learn grow and meet fiends possibly all in one the app is sophisticated and extremely informative I love the integrations between syncing ur calendars and giving reminders and alerts

Excellent Social App This is an app that doesn’t try to make itself appealing by adding too many extra and unnecessary frills and features. It’s simply a way for you to find local things going on in the area and it’s easy to use and lovely!

Meetup: Great App for a Great Service! I would not have been able to manage my professional Meetup activities nearly as well with any solution other than this wonderful Meetup app. This mobile app has become my primary dashboard for Meetups in the New York City area.

Great way to meet people I’m rating it as a 4 star right now just because I’ve only started doing this. So far I like the ideas behind it and definitely a great place to meet people whether for friendships or trying to find your best friend. I am looking forward to attending more future meet ups.

Great app, have attended lots of events Love the idea of local community members coming together through common interests. Have gone on lots of hikes and kayaking trips through this app. Was especially great when I first moved to this state and didn’t know the local places to go.

Great way to expand your social circle I moved to Dallas two years ago and immediately got on this app to meet new people and network. At one event I networked with someone in the same industry and I was able to find a job fast and meet new people.

It’s a good idea but.. I just moved across the country and was hoping to use this app for events I could go to to meet new people. I wish there was a way to chose the furthest away I’d want to drive for an event. I live almost 2 hours out of Atlanta and would really like to not see events from there. There’s so many from there it’s hard to find the closer ones.

App is great but back end needs work UI is very well laid out , but the back end needs a LOT of love.  Searching for a group is painful.  Am speaking as an organizer of DFW Data Science with over 3000 members - despite the back end problems.

Great! I really like this app! It’s great for people who are new in town, looking for new people that share the same interest, or want to try a new hobby. The app is easy to use, and it will add events right to your calendar which is great. Definitely recommended!
Meeting people and having fun The concept is amazing. I wanted to start a group but it was too costly on a monthly basis for me. Thankfully someone started a group that I wanted to.

Easy, fun tool that brings people together I first joined Meetup to meet new people, and now I have started my own group. I love how easy it is to use the app. There is no other tool that can reach so many members of my community together in such a simple way.
Very useful platform I just started running two groups, made such a great connections! My group members getting helped making businesses.

Definitely recommend this app I joined this app a few years ago wanting to develop my skills in photography, meeting new people, and other networking events and I love the results. I really recommend this app for pretty much any hobby or event!

A great tool! I’ve been using the Meetup app for years. It’s a great way to find groups to join that match my interests. Very convenient to keep up on what events my group is having, sign up and communicate with others in the group.

Great app. Could be better I like better recommendations. There are also some strange limitations that seem unnecessary, like having to search for morning, afternoon, or evening, rather than giving my own time. Otherwise, meet-up is great.

Awesome App! I live that this app has introduced me to groups and people who share similar interests to me that I would never have met otherwise. I found events I love to attend that I might have never known existed without the convenience of this app. Thank you

Enjoying the friendly outings This site has allowed me new friendships and I get to choose from the area, the age group and the like of the inside or outside events. Never a dull moment and like the new adventure and friendship that I have made

EASY TO MEET NEW PEOPLE I love the Meetup App! It makes it so easy to meet new people who share the same interest. I was new in town and didn’t know anyone. Didn’t have anyone to go out with. After using this app I’ve gone out and met new friends that I now hang out with...

Need to find your people or people to help you out? I’ve found myself with time on my hands recently. MeetUp has been excellent in getting me in touch with the right groups and individuals to help me put that time to its greatest use!

DJnojoke Great app. I have made several new friends and found several local groups with mutual interests. These are local people and local groups that I have met in person, not just an online thing like most social media.

Great for networking and learning MeetUp is a great way to get involved with your interest groups for both networking to better yours and others lives together, as well as learn about various subjects and ideas from those people!

Meet up The Meetup tool and app is an awesome tool. The ability to get your groups together plan your tour groups or any other social events. The app works very very well it keeps everybody notified of what’s happening. I couldn’t say more about how great this app is, thanks.

Nice Ppl, Nice Activities I basically only use for one activity and we all communicate through the app. You can schedule the meetings and see who is going. I love it and has helped our group stay in touch and share things in common.

Didn’t realize how much I missed it! Perfect way to meet new people, explore passions/hobbies and try new activities. Gets you out of your head and changes your energy, if needed. I’d been gone a while but so glad to be back!

Love this App I had been wanting to join volleyball for years! Since I graduated! I really just wanted to get out there again and play! I couldn’t find any adult leagues but found the meet up app! I am so glad I did and I could go back to playing volleyball

Great Way to Integrate into a New Community Meetup has been great in helping my husband and me find activities that have connected us with new friends who share the same interests.  I love how easy it is to use and how it helps to get and stay connected.

Meetup Review I recently moved to Austin, TX and had no friends at all, after joining a couple of LBGTQ groups on meetup i love it here now. We meet up for dodgeball games or late night coffee hangouts. If your looking to make new friends and socialize, this is the app to download and start your new journey!!!

Meetup app great! Nothing that has not been said many times but this app covers a wide variety of interest and helps me find like minded people to participate in activities of all sorts from trying new restaurants to hiking catching up on new technologies. What’s not to like!

Meet up I’m impressed so far by the sheer number of people that use this app. It’s popularity makes socializing with large groups of people a constant. The last time I tried a social app there were 2 to 3 people showing up at events and they were usually the same people.

Easy peasy Quick push notifications (I organize two groups), group messages go out and members respond. Easy to post meetings and collect RSVPs. You can lead up to three groups with one membership; easy to toggle back & forth.

Love this app! It’s easy to use and I love the features it has (adds events to your calendar, notification reminders for events you’ve RSVP’d to, etc). Plus I can easily connect with local people with similar interests and make new friends. 😊

New to a City? Try this app What I like about this app is because they always make u feel welcome when u join a group. Someone will great you! So many things that you might be interested in. Like going to try new restaurants, meditation, yoga, entrepreneurs, dance, etc.

Last update (bug report) After the last update a couple days ago I haven't been able to get the app to run. I start it up, it gets past the initial "Meetup" logo screen, then it crashes and closes as soon as it begins to open the next screen.

Referrals! Since I am in the beauty business I come into contact with a lot of people. I am CONSTANTLY tell them about Meetup! It is an amazing site and way to either network on the social side or just to explore new places, events and friends around You!
A Forever Fan I’ve always enjoyed using meetup. As someone who travels/moves around a lot, I enjoy seeing what social groups are in the area!

Updated UI Easier to Navigate I have been using the meetups app for a few years and have had some great experiences through Meetups that I wouldn’t have had otherwise. I don’t know which version it was, but the UI has improved noticeably within the last year.

MeetUp A great platform to stay connected.  We as human beings are unique and one of our abilities is to socialize.  Through socialization we form relationships.  This is where MeetUp bridges socialization and relationships. If you’re fortunate as I’ve been,I’ve able to incorporate exercise and healthy activity

Awesome App Allows you to easily navigate through different interest groups selecting as you go. Gives you the ability to effortlessly connect with others in your local area based upon common interests.

Great App! I love this app! It makes it easy and simple to accept invites and to find out about events that are coming up. I also like that it’s well organized and give directions to the meet ups! Definitely a must have app!

Love meeting new people! I really am enjoying the meetup app. What a great way to meet individuals from all walks of life! ❤️ Sometimes it is hard to locate a specific group within the app, but keep trying, they eventually pop up! Use the EXACT name. If you use just a portion of the name it often won’t work.
Easy to Use Easier to use than any mobile apps that came after their parent website. I think it may even be easier to use than the desktop version.

Good fun Good People If anybody ever says in life they are bored —they have to be crazy this app makes it so fun to connect with people of all ages for different reasons from sports to hanging out and having some wine to hiking up a hill get out live life have fun this app makes it possible!🏃🏻‍♀️🙏💪🏼🏋🏽‍♀️🍷👠🌊😎💃🏻🍾🏄🏻‍♀️🚣🏼‍♂️🎤🎯🎳🎸

Slowly Improving It has gotten better than when this new app came out as far as looks and format but I like the old calendar better, don’t care the way the new calendar is set up and the pictures on the meet up is very slow moving when viewing them and when uploading I can only do one pic at time.

Really great app I have really enjoyed finding things to do and people to meet on this app. I’ve met a lot of great friends and had a lot of great adventures. I recommend this app to everyone. Every type of person in every type of situation.
An activity to please everyone! I am in multiple groups and have found one for everything I would like to get out and experience. Met some very awesome people who have become close friends.

Want to Get Out of the House This app delivers exactly what it promises. I have found multiple communities full of people who enjoy the same hobbies and projects I do. From outdoor adventures to niche programming languages I have found other people doing what I love.

Great App I have gone to several types of meetups that I would never have known existed if it wasn’t for this app. The app is intuitive, The variety of things to do is amazing and when you RSVP for an event it automatically populates in your calendar.

Very much useful Found a nice meet up group that catered to my needs. Was actually very suspicious of the app but turned out liking it a lot. Can be a huge tool for people that want to go out and make new experiences. Meeting people is the icing on the cake.

Great way to connect with ppl with like interests I’ve enjoyed most events I’ve attended, though there are a few inactive groups with recurring events... not fun to show up somewhere and no one to be there. Hint for users: make sure you’re not the only one who RSVP’d! Suggestion for meetup: remove/disable inactive groups.

It won’t let me make an account This app was recommended to me and I was excited to try it but it seems not to like me.  When I tried to sign up with Facebook it didn’t work, constantly shuffling me between the same screens.  When I tried to use my email address it said that address was already taken.  Strange.  Now I have no way to use the app. I couldn’t even get to a help page because you have to log in to see that 😞

MeetUps! Especially Glendale knit n natter! Great way to hang with like minded people and share ideas and get inspired and just enjoy doing something productive, creative, social, AND fun, with people who know some what of many things to share and learn together. Crochet and knitting, by the way!!!
Great alternative to events and adventures Better because you don’t have to pay so much to socialize and you’re able to have a variety of options. It just depends what you feel like doing.

I don’t know about you... But this app connected me to others who share my faith and really... a whole world of new possibilities. I probably had this app for a couple of years and tonight was the first time I actually went to a meetup. Grateful. Glory to God.
Great experiences & wonderful meetups I've had some profound experiences & participated in wonderful, fun meetups.
What a great thing… I’m not a big apple person as I would usually prefer to use the website however this app is very easy to use and saves me time over using it through a browser.
Meet Up Loving the app as far as its purpose. It functions well. After a little bit of navigating the app gets easier to use.
Keeping up to date with meetup Meetup times and places may change last minute. Having the app gives access to up to date information.

Meet up meet expectations I’m newer to the “meetup” community but so far so good! I’ve been able to connect with others who have similar interests and am starting to make a few connections. Wish I’d have found this sooner!
Great way to connect with others! Great app! I use it locally but have also found things to do while traveling for work.

Great app with lots of groups to choose from Helpful tools like the maps/address feature to easily find where you're going (especially if you're new to an area like me, this is really great). Promotes good conversation and good environment.

I love this app I live in Dubai and this is a great way to meet people , although I don’t go to all the events . Nice to have a option if you want to go out and have fun . I am glad the explore button is working now too , now I can find events in LA ! Thanks

Not full featured and awkward to use It’s somewhat hard to navigate and sometimes notifications don’t work properly. I may indicate that I want to receive no group updates from a forum, but I still get notification on my phone.

Better to improve communication function Great app! The only thing I think that should be improved is to develop more communication features that we can chat with each other or groups without such FB, WhatsApp or whatever you call them.
