Try it! Right now! There’s some discussion going but not as much expected cause it’s the lack of active users maybe but if everyone could use and put there inquiries and infos on this app, this can get big! Guys try it and make it big so you guys all can make it useful for you by yourself..

Meetup Review This app has come along way. It’s easier to navigate, join groups and it gives you updated reminders of upcoming events. It also informs you of new groups that may interest you to join or attend a meeting.

Solid Networking💯 I think the potential this networking app is of great length! I’m still learning the roadmap of the community. So, I can’t quite speak of all in detail. However, the set up is fantastic! Messaging, calendars, and schedules are convenient. And the categories are vast and broad. There is something here for all preferences!

Great app! Just joined Meetup and downloaded the app a few weeks ago. Can’t believe how many interesting and fun events I’ve been notified about via the app. It certainly makes it easy to ask the event host a question or reply to join the event.

Great app to join different groups! I love how many opportunities meetup creates for someone who’s new in the town to join different interest groups and learn new things! My experience with the meetups were so far great, respectful people and everyone’s friendly.

People with same interests....what could be better? Have found several groups with great people that share the same interests.  So glad this app exists.  Don’t know how people did it in the past.  Great nights of gaming from these meetups!

Meetup review Great app. for finding others with the same interests. 4 stars because I’m receiving a couple group notifications from groups I haven’t joined and I can’t figure out how to stop those notifications. I’m sure there’s probably a simple way to do it but I haven’t figured it out.

Limitless possibility Time and time again meet-up has brought me to finding like minded individuals & amazing groups of people. There are an endless amount of group that I would have never had known existed. I am extremely grateful for this App!

Really bad organization This app drives me nuts, I really loathe having to open it. It wants to show me all sorts of information about other groups and other events, instead of letting me view my group’s events alone and separately letting me browse other events. What are the silly icons at the bottom? What’s the major difference between the search and the M logo? They both appear to be browse/search pages. Bad design.

Good Service I like the service it provides. But if I haven’t committed to an event and want to insert a reminder on my calendar, transferring the information isn’t easy. There is no cut-n-paste option. I have to flip back and forth between apps as I type the content. I’m just saying that it would be an improvement to have that option.

Great way to meet people I have only done one activity so far but I really enjoyed it and it is so nice to know that something like this is out there where people can get to know people in their own community and surrounding areas.

Addicted to Social Activity I’m new to the whole Meet Up scene. After relocating and leaving behind 18 years of friends and networking groups I decided to try Meet Up to connect with like minded people and start growing my new social circles. Best decision made since my move!
Need an online manual Meet Up is a fantastic community organizing tool.  I have finally found a way to really met interesting ppl who challenge my POV in a civil and collaborative setting.

Great app I’ve been using this app for sometime it’s given me the ability to meet up for activities such as hiking etc with like minded people both locally and when I’m traveling to other areas of the country
Good but still needs bug fixes Every time I search for something I get no results unless I manually change the distance filter to a specific value, best match returns no result by default.

I LOVE the concept and website but the app doesn’t let me sign in I cannot log in through Facebook or even create a new account on the app. It keeps going through loops of pressing log in with Facebook, opening the Facebook app, going back to meetup app, then back again. I really want to use the app but it won’t let me log in. I really hope someone gets back to me on how to fix this.

Endless Opportunity Got on meetup two years ago. Best thing ever. I haven’t maximized the platform but I think the value this app can bring to ones life is infinite and should probably have to pay for such an app like this

Bridging the Gap Between Online & In-Person Meetup has a terrific structure for getting people together, as well as, using an online presence. This app is excellent compared to so many that are too minimal compared to desktop versions. I’m happy to have it. GoodOnYa, Meetup❣️

Keeps me active This app helps me find new things to do. I can be sure it is a quality event and all of the people I meet are welcoming and share common interests. I would be home doing nothing without this app to motivate me to get out!

Exactly what I have been looking for I am living away from family and is new in this side of town. Going through meetup has enabled me rekindle my passion by meeting like minded folks with similar interests like mine. I am enjoying and appreciating this media.
Wonderful concept It’s a wonderful app for people who are new to the area and want to find people to hangout with
Really great way to check out cool things happening around you! I love that the app has a variety of things that are happening and it allows you to explore anything that you’re interested in!

Love the reminders and simple to use This app is very user friendly and a great way to stay in touch with people from the groups. I love the reminders as they are very helpful. The layout is easy to understand. Very intuitive.

Very Intuitive & Clean Design This app is easy to use and has a beautiful interface. I like how easy it is to find and join groups. It’s also nice that they make it so easy for you to start a group as well.

The things this app enables are simply amazing I have been able to meet and connect with people who have the same unique interests as me. I feel less alone and feel like I have more resources because of this app. Thanks Meetup!

It’s Great! Meetup has been a great resource to meet new people and have new experiences. I’m very introverted and find it hard to get out and do things, but with Meetup it is really easy to find a social activity or group that I feel I can fit into.

Meetup App The meetup app is user friendly. It is easy to sign up for events and easy to change your status to not going if necessary. You can access all pertinent info for the events, how to get there and who will be attending.

Excellent Way to Meet New People The Meetup App is an amazing way to meet new people that you would not have ordinarily met. It’s refreshing to get a different opinions and takes on topics in which you already had somewhat of a steadfast belief towards.

Great experiences From outdoor get togethers to late night parties and most things in between, this app has allowed me to meet a bunch of great people and have a lot of fun I otherwise wouldn’t have known about. I highly recommend this app. The more the merrier

Fun at your finger tips. What could be better than an app that helps you find every kind of social group known?  Whatever your interests are, this easy app will help you find like minded people to hang out with. Easy to use. It’s a winner
Ease of use! Awesome UX! I am a UX Designer and so I am passionate about the user!

Apart from . . . . . . a clumsy approach to message handling (sometimes you can’t find the new message the app says you’ve got, other times you can’t find a message you’ve already read . . .), MeetUp is a marvelous way to interact with others over time. But I can’t WAIT for an upgrade.

Great app! I just started using this app about a month ago and it’s awesome. It gives me so many options to meet new people. I participated in my first meet up group a week ago and it was a blast. Can’t wait for my next meetup this Thursday! 😁

MeetUp app Interest in making some networking connections is easier with this app. Allows me to connect, ask questions to the organizers, add events to my calendar, and hear about new groups each week.

Such a great way to meet new people Meetup is is such a wonderful site to meet new people and attend fun events. I highly recommend it if you’re new to a area or just looking to meet some new people and engage in fun activities. There is a meetup for every interest.

Great App for meeting people If your new to the area, have a distinct interest (hiking, dancing, wine, etc) or what to Network or learn business skills (marketing, sales, communication, etc) then MeetUp is for you. The app works well and there is lots of meetups to join. I recommend it!

Easy to set up and navigate. Meetup is very easy to use with a great UX.  It took a matter of minutes to set up my profile and join groups.  I would like to see additional profile information on each user to help understand who you are meeting with.

Easy I’ve been using Meetup since 2005 as I move around around our planet. It has made me less a stranger in strange places. Though there have been glitches along the way, the app has been easy to navigate.

Meet up I moved to an area I hadn’t really more then a few friends to connect with. Meet up gave me the opportunity to meet the llama Walters. What a fantastic group of people and Lorene was an awesome guide. I’m so happy to be a part of this group and how Lorene was patient in instruction and teaching the way of the llamas.

You Can Find Anthing I love that you can find anything you are looking for & I like the newer version where Pinterest send similar likes from others as well as personalize your own Likes & send them via email

Meet up I love this app for learning how to dance and meeting new people.  It’s such a smart idea and way to meet others and make friends doing the things you both love doing or curious about.  It makes everything more exciting.
Great app Enjoying the meetup app
Best app to stay in touch with the community I use this app to find all of my real estate education near me!

Good events , app search feature needs work I’ve enjoyed participating in the MeetUps I’ve attended, but finding other groups that interest me is challenging. The search feature seems to be either quite narrow or overly broad. This is the only issue I have with the service.
Meet people This app does exactly what it says; helps people with like interests meet and spend time. In just a week I’ve have several invites for events that I’m interested in.

Easy breezy I love this app. It’s easy to navigate and I’ve never had any technical issues. All of the events have accurate details and the search engine makes it easy to find the different meetups I’m looking for.

So far, so good Have not been able to actually meet with any groups due to my schedule, but the app itself is great! It’s easy to connect with groups of interest and the organizers of those groups are very good about planning events frequently. Hopefully I can get out to one soon.

Make the social experience accessible It loads the date of event in my phone calendar; it allows me to see other responses in real time.  It will send you reminders via email of the upcoming event; most importantly provided the opportunity to explore the city while learning about new ppl.  Ty for this app!

Meetup us great! I use Meetup to keep track of my groups’ upcoming activities, as well as to see which other members are attending. It also helps me to schedule upcoming events on my physical calendar so i don’t schedule duplicate appointments at the same time. I love the app!

Great app - helped me get connected I have been using this app a lot since I moved to a new state/area and didn’t know anyone when I first got here. I have never had any problems with the app. It is very easy to use and a great way to connect!
Temperamental and frustrating!! One min the app is working and the next it’s not

Great app! So far I’m liking the groups. However even though we can’t physically meet up right now some of the groups are doing alternative ways of meeting up. Like using Zoom and video chatting meet ups.

Happy Hiker This is such a great way to meet up with people and experience things you wouldn’t have normally have. It keeps you in the loop with the groups you choose and activities you love. I love it!!! The set up of the app is get too!

Great group! My first experience with this group was so warm and inviting. Even though we were reading apart, I still felt connected. They made me feel right at home. The sharing at the end was the icing on the cake!! Thanks for having me. 😊👏🏾

Nice way to meet people Before the recent shutdown for health reasons I went to a few meetings and got to know some interesting and fun gamers. Looking forward to resuming once the current crisis is not so urgent. Good way to learn new games before buying myself as other guests share their collection with me and the meetup.
Wholisticyoutohealth I get my notifications quickly therefore I am able to respond in a timely manner. I also like the notifications for other meetups that I might be interested in.
Great way to meet new people. I’ve joined many activities through Meetup and have made a couple of friends through it. I can quickly find places to engage in various interests with others.

Great way to see events near you We are new to the area and I was looking for a way to meet new people. Great suggestions and easy to use. Can’t wait to get out there and do some of the activities I have customized my app for.
Good; but more of a web wrapper The app is handy. It provides the needed functionality. The reasons for not giving 5 are:

Phone app is limited (App)It’s better on the computer than the phone. Learning how to navigate through can be a little exhausting. It’s completely different trying to work from phone, but I prefer it, but I might need to stick with a computer.

MeetUp connected me to awesome friends! I’ve been on MeetUp since their launch. I travel a lot for both work +fun. The largest MeetUp event I attended was over 600 strong at the DC Tech MeetUp in a synagogue of all places but hey, they expected a crowd! The UI has not disappointed. I’ve seen pics of the MeetUp HQ, totally cool!

CONNECTING GOAL WITH PEOPLE It’s a great medium source to connect  people , meet and make some good friendship , hang out , attend some good events , enjoy , laugh and dance .especially to the one who is very to new to that city , state or country . Hearty congratulations whom so ever made this app . Biggg thank you for understanding people’s need .

Crappy Search Function I am stuck ONLY being able to search for activities within my groups... WHY?  Have you thought that if I could search for activities within ALL groups that I might find other groups to check and join?  No, you haven’t.... Fix your search function so as to allow ME to decide where I search for activities....
Needs an update. it moves so slow and doesn’t load stuff sometimes. notifications doesn’t even come through sometimes. just emails. other than that. it’s good! 😇

Good for Finding& Planning Things To Do It’s a great way to find things to do with other people, no matter what your age or interests.  There’s no limit to the number it kinds of groups that you can join to engage in your eclectic interests.

Meetups are usually wonderful Meetups are where we can recognize anew people or make acquaintances with those we have yet to meet. It’s a website that continues to try to offer all outings for whatever you can imagine. There’s a lot to learn from the meetups and website.

Mid-Atlantic Hiking Meetup Group Outstanding hiking group that offers a extensive range of hiking options led by trained folks who know the trails, point out interesting things along the way, and are prepared if first aid is needed. I recommend them highly and without reservation.

Life after kid is gone I really appreciate this app being that I have a difficult time meeting others...do to my job. This is a great app for individuals trying to find themselves after their kids leave for college.

Great cryptocurrency group! This group is run by two very knowledgeable guys who are extremely patient and willing to help with questions elementary and advanced about Bitcoin and other cryptos. I have learned a lot from them and really enjoy the conversations.

Awesome way to meet people I work a ton of hours so don't have a lot of free time to get out and make new friends. Meetup has given me the opportunity to find groups that have similar interests to my own.  I recommend it to everyone

A great way to get out! I joined meetup so I could get out and meet other people that liked doing the same things I like.  There are so many groups to choose from and you never have to do anything alone!
Finally! Finally! FB groups have become so cluttered and unauthentic and now I have a real space where “algorithms” aren’t censoring out my actual interests!

Great App - well done This app does just what I want. I select the events I want to attend, it adds the event to my Meetup calendar, then adds it to the calendar on my PC.  Directions are easy to each event. I also like the feedback feature to events I attended and the ability reach out to other attendees.

Social butterfly This app allows you to become that social butterfly that is inside of you in a very fun and easy way. You choose your likes and boom...you’re connected with others that also enjoy what you do. Try it!

More social, less media Whether you want someone to go skydiving with or if you’re looking for a book club, you can find them. I’m still new to the app but, I am blown away by the diversity of interests and activities I’ve found here. Absolutely worth a try for anyone.

Life changing! It’s amazing how many people I met and how many new things I’ve tried from joining meetup! The best thing is that you have an opportunity to try things you normally wouldn’t an meet people with the same interests.

Great App to find activities in your area The app works flawlessly.  I have already found a few groups of people and activities to do in my area.  It’s pretty easy to use and not very complicated.  No bugs so far.

Meetup is great! I love meet up! It allows me to find venues to do many things I otherwise would not perhaps know were going on. I get to meet lots of wonderful new people! It’s really an amazing and wonderful option to have in your life!

Great app Through this app I was able to find an awesome mountain biking group in my area. Could I have met them any other way? Maybe... but who knows how long that would have taken. I have been riding with them for years now.

Very impressive This is a great app for those who likes to socialize and find groups to do things with. It reminds you of up coming events and gives options to connect with others.  I’ve thoroughly enjoyed it.
Second Time Around! I had the app some time ago and got rid of it, not user friendly enough, not very intuitive to use.

Great way to meet other people I have been using this app for almost a year. It is fairly easy to use, I have made some nice connections with people. I would recommend this app to anybody who wants to meet new people.

Great Website I love this website, and belong to many groups. It’s great for finding people with the same interests as you. For the administrators, however, it’s a commitment to collect the money and keep the members informed of upcoming events. All of the groups that I belong to, the people have been very friendly.

Recommend to all my friends and family Love this app. It’s definitely a must have in your phone. Thanks Meetup for making it possible to network with amazing and safe people around the world. It’s like magic.
What's not to like Thanks meetup!

Crashes and fails to load anything This is one of the worst apps I’ve recently used. It fails to load any recent information. I frequently have to uninstall and redone load the app to load new info. When I recently joined a meetup group, the app notified me that I had been accepted but after opening the app multiple times, it would still show that my request was pending. I had to delete and reinstall it to get over that.

Meetup needs an iPad App You guys need to put in the work into making an iPad app, the whole scaled up phone app is very lazy. The amount of money paid to have a group is hundreds of dollars and you could do more to improve the service, implement feedback and add features to the app. Or even if you can get your best minds on it, fix the “discussion” character count and make it more like a group wall where discussion can take place.
Great for hang outs I wish there was more variety to choose from but the groups they have already is pretty good. Could be better with more people and more groups to choose from though

Meetups..... Well it's a great place to meet people that n and around your area with like interests. The only problem I've found is there is a lot of catfish on here, I get at least two a week. So make sure you know you're chatting with.
Review for Joyce Felt very welcome in Joyce’s home.  She is a very gracious hostess.

I am a big fan of meet up Meet up has many tools that help in inviting other prospects to programs that I am interested in and allows me to join others that I respect at meetings that they attend, as well. Keep up the good work meet up!
Highly Recommend! I don’t have the desire to date but still miss having a buddy when it’s convenient of course...this is a refreshing social site where you can meet and make real friends

Makes connecting with others easy I love this MeetUp app. Great for finding people with my same interests. Wonderful messaging system too. I like being notified instantly when there are new messages or meetups.

Great App for finding new friends Love this app for meeting new people and finding groups with common interests!  We moved here from out of state. I no longer work.  This has been a great way for me to meet new friends and find my way.

Great way to start out in a new city MeetUp is great for people that have moved to a new city. It’s sometimes hard to know where things are that you enjoy doing and with Meetup App the events are listed to make life easier.

Meet new people I recently joined a group, went to my first event and had a great time! Everyone was very friendly and welcoming. I already signed up for my next three events! What a great opportunity to get out and meet new people!

Modern Networking This app provides a platform for people to start, follow, or join groups that range from business, art, health, and much much more. I’m a Financial Advisor and this app allows me to meet great people who become not only clients, but friends.

Finding my kind of people MeetUp has helped me find like minded people in my area. Travel is my passion and I was able to connect with groups that have my same interests. Bonus: making great new friends!
Meetup app Someone recommended the app when I said it was hard to find people to play cards with anymore. I have now used it a few times also when I’m traveling for and been very pleased.

Unable to add profile pic This app seems ok thus far,  but to join some groups you have to have a profile picture. I have tried to upload a picture about a dozen times, trying a diff pic every few times and when I hit save the picture defaults back to the “no photo icon”. It’s annoying!

Event organizer The app works really well for me to create and edit upcoming events. I can keep track of who is coming and send and receive messages from them ahead of time. Add pictures and survey their opinions on things. Good!

I have met many great people I have met many great people through meet ups in the Phoenix area which is a very large area and yet I have developed last friendships with many people with common interests from all over Phoenix.

Nice way to meet new people I married someone out of the state I grew up in and relocated to be with him. This app has helped me find groups and meetings near my new home. I hope to form new friendships, but thank you Meetup for having a platform like this!

Great app for connecting with people! Since I moved to a new area, I have used this app to join a few different groups now and it has been very successful. The app is easy to use and very useful when you don’t have phone numbers for your new group of friends yet.
So convenient! My favorite feature of this app is automatic calendar events added to my phone. Very quick and convenient, and there are so many different events and groups to join!

I love MeetUp! What an awesome way to make friends with similar interests!!! The people I have met are just wonderful and friendly. I’ve been wanting to get into hiking for a while but I just didn’t know how to get started and through MeetUp I began hiking and I’m loving it.
Great and Pricey I love Meetup. I’ve been a member since about 2005, when a friend the founder told me about it. I’ve been to tons of events.

A great app This app provides a great way to choose from lots of groups to join which provide activities In a wide range of areas. Men’s groups, women’s groups, Coed groups, groups by interest, groups by age. What a great way to meet new people and experience new adventures!

I Really Like Meet Up I haven’t been able to go to any meet ups in a long time encause of work.  The times I used it, it was great. I met really nice people. The App is easy to use. Hopefully I’ll be able to start going to meet ups again.

Building community After having a kid and changing locations I’ve using meet up to find Friends and families that share values and interests. Not once have I been disappointed or weirded out buy an outing or it’s attendees. In case your worried about :P

Meetup is good to find out events of interest to you I have enjoyed meetup to stay up to date with the groups I have joined.  At first chose too many groups but have selected ones I like and now enjoy those reminders

Great Way To Find New Opportunities I’ve used meetup several times, and find it’s really helpful for finding groups of people with your same interests especially after a move. Just moved to nyc and have already found a couple of groups to meet up with!

Having fun with Meetup I’m new to the area and don’t know anyone.  Meetup helped me find a dancing group, a couple of them actually.  And I found some other groups that look interesting.  It’s a way to get to know someone with common interests.

Easy to use I am new to the area and looking for people who share my passion for golf to play in a casual setting.  Meetup was just the app to aid this goal.  It was simple and easy to use app which connected me with others who share my passion.
Meet Up Just moved to Dallas 2 years ago.  The Meet Up app has enabled me to pursue my interests, meet interesting people, and make good friends.  I appreciate the opportunities it has provided.

Pretty good All in all...meets the need. Not fancy but functional. Enhancements could include orientation flip for tablets and moving most recent conversation comments to the top of the feed instead of the bottom.
3 points of power I run and coordinate a lot of groups as a VA counselor for combat vets; here’s a quick, clear review:
So easy to use! This app is so helpful.  It is easy to view and manage the events I have assigned up for, and view comments/messages directly in the app instead of having to fish through emails.

Great app to find people with your same interests. Easy to use and to navigate finding people who are interested in the same activities that you like. Whether it’s a sport (tennis, hockey, soccer), dance, learning a language, cooking, yoga, or more, it’s all on this app.

Great app. I have no complaints with the app itself. Some of the groups and its members aren’t that great but that has nothing to do with the app. This was a bright idea. Very helpful for people moving to new cities and is interested in new things.
Great way to set things up Only complaint, push notifications are slow. I see them a couple hours AFTER they’ve been posted. Sometimes, missing the meet.

Fun and easy The app is easy to navigate and is not annoying with reminders etc (unless you want it to be). I have never hosted through the site, just attended groups. Great for finding new or old hobbies and some very nice strangers!

Great to make friends!! It’s been a great so far. I’m having a issue with message which somehow my messages showed sent 2 times sometimes and I can’t fix it. Except this I like this app and makes me easy to make friends!!
Do Something! You never have to be without something to do! If you can’t find something that interests you on Meetup, then you’re not trying! (And if you really can’t, start something new!)
Meetup Groups I am just starting to join some of the groups that Meetup has to offer, I am excited to explore the groups that are of interest to me and also looking forward to meeting new friends.

Easy to use, keep us connected to activities. App is quite easy to set up and use, and it helps us discover similar groups to one we already attend by providing notifications and pings. We like knowing more about what’s going on in our area!

Overall Good 4 stars just because it can be a little hard at times to find the types of groups you want in the precise area you need. Maybe a map that you could then set the parameters would be easier to manage?

Love it ! I’m happy I found this app what a great way to meet people with no pressure no commitment and the ease of creating new connections with great people in the process. I use this when I moved to AZ and worked from home and wanted to make friends !

Meet up to meet people It’s a great way to find the specific interest group you are looking for, to meet people and make new friends.  Anyone who needs to get out and socialize in a casual environment, a meetup group is for you.

Great App and way to meet new people I was worried about the failed IPO of WeWork and its connection to Meetup. Thank goodness the CEO sent out an email reassuring everyone that Meetup is not going away. I don’t know what I would do if it did. I love this app and I highly recommend it.

Review of MeetUp Meetup has been a great experience for me. By hosting meetups I met really great like-minded people who share the same interests and passions and are close by.  No need to travel very far unless I choose to. I continue to find new meetings to attend that are in my area.

Review Salesforce Saturday is good platform to discuss the work you know and learn more about new stuff and unaware of. It’s a great opportunity to get answers for the business questions you are struggling with and to help others with your pragmatic experience.

MeetUp I find this app fairly easy to use when you review your events for each group. However, when you try to message others or review comments, it’s not straight forward. I hope this aspect gets a bit better.

Meetup is the new way to socialize. I moved to Jacksonville years ago without knowing anyone here. Through many of the local meet ups I have met some wonderful people and there is always something to do.

Great app for NYC!! This app is perfect for living in a big city! I’ve never used this app in a smaller town or city but it works great in NYC. I’ve met so many people through this app and gotten into the coolest groups / clubs / meet ups. 10/10 recommend using

Great for Meeting New Folks The App is a great facilitator for groups and meeting new folks. My one caveat is not enough groups stay around enough! Overall, I highly recommend this to people seeking new hobbies, friends, or interests that they’ve never explored.

A great way to explore interests I’ve only been using the app for a little while, but I’ve already found a few new groups of friends to enjoys some hobbies with. The wide array of groups and interest last is awesome!
Easy to expand social circle The app makes it real easy to find groups and sign up for activities I enjoy. I enjoy getting to know people and can choose who I want to connect with further.

Meeting new friends Great way to meet new people doing new interest. Retired, no kids, needing an escape from home and being bored with mundane same things. Meetup shows a wide variety of interest with people with similar interest, win win.

Useful app to keep track of my meetings I belong to several book clubs. The application allows me to see my schedule, the books discussed and the attendants. Once I sign up, the application allows me to enter it in my calendar.

Love Using This App! This app has been a wonderful tool for exploring social activities, networking events and making new friends. Highly suggest for anyone to use if they want to enlarge their circle, learn something new or explore their area.

Meetup I really like this app.  I get frequent event reminders (which I need); I can see how many people (and who they are) are going to various events; I can comment and email; and I get notifications about new events and Meetup groups.
Pretty good app so far So far I think the app works well for me. I’ve only used it for 2 or 3 weeks but it’s definitely easier to use than having to login to the website, plus faster!

Certain things don’t load in the app When I tap on a notification (in the app) I sometime get taken to a screen saying the content isn’t available. I just tapped on a notification about someone replying to a comment and it took me to a blank page. Please fix this. Also, I should be able to search for events outside of my groups more easily and with just as much granularity as searching for new groups.

Very fun, very educational! I’ve had fun and learned quite a bit! Great if you have niche hobbies, are learning a skill, or like pickup games. It’s also great if you don’t have any plans and just want to make friends or try something new.
Great activities I love to do walking tours and there is always a meetup to areas I have never been or history I never knew
Inspiring Today Jill worked with two of us today making each person got what they needed from the class. She is patient, loving and incredibly knowledgeable. This is a wonderful place to learn art.

Meetup problems I loved this app initially and all of the new opportunities to meet people. It was awesome However when I attempted to create a group I ran into so many problems that I can’t even state them all here. I would run out of space. I have attempted many times to reach out to customer service and the promise to solve my problem w logging back into a group I started that I can no longer access. Don’t even want to give it one star...
Great Ap The meet-up site and the app are incredible.  You can do a few more things on the website.  But having almost all the group management features available in an app is great.

Easy to use! It is much easier to use the iPhone app than online. I can navigate between groups I am a member of, confirm my attendance , and message easily with others that are in the group. Very few snags or hang-ups.

Keeps me moving from state-to-state While traveling I join different meetup groups. It helps me to stay active, social, healthy and happy. I have used it primarily for biking and hiking groups. Most recently in Oregon and Arizona but have also used it California, Idaho and Nevada.

Meetup helped me find two great Equestrian buddies. It is difficult to juggle work and ranch responsibilities and still find time to ride my horses.  I found two kindred spirits with schedules as crazy as mine that will be flexible and forgiving when we can’t get together all the time through Meetup.  Very grateful for this app.

Meetup App & Invites This app is so amazing w/something for every age group. Frequent events, get together’s, active sporting teams, dancing, art events, writers groups, mediating & yoga groups; just to mention a few. If u r new to MKE as I was a couple yrs ago or just sick of not being social;  MeetUp is the perfect solution!😊😎☺️💞

Meet up group. I found this app meet up to be a really good way of getting to meet other people and joining another type of social club to make new friends and stuff. I recommend this app to other people if they want to meet other people thank you

It’s great! If you want to meet people like you that are open to making new friends than this is the app for you! Went to my first meetup today, and I seriously had so much fun. Can’t wait to go to another event.

Very Useful I wish EVERYBODY in my Meetups would use this app; it's very handy for finding each other, letting folks know you'll be late, etc. It's frequently buggy but they usually fix it pretty quickly. I get badge notifications so I don't know what that one reviewer is talking about.

Great app and easy to use! I absolutely love this app. I moved to a new city where I didn’t know anyone. This has allowed me to get out explore my new surroundings and meet wonderful people. It is easy to use and connect with others!

Meetup simplifies socializing I began using this site to get out of my apartment and meet new friends.  So far I’m really liking it and have met some cool people that I hope to build good friendships with.  I’m an introverted person and this helps me to have a social life.

It’s 2018 and I can’t filter by time? I’ve been suggested meet up often by a lot of people but none of them work night shift. Obvious daycentric bias exits in this app. Why can’t I sort for morning only events or whatever time works best for me?

11 years and still using it. Thanks Meetup, you have sequentially improved the site and app since the beginning and our soccer club has has an organized backbone due to the App.  Keep up the good work!

Find your oeople Meetup is one of the best ways I know to find people with similar interests; everything from nutrition and fitness to creative, philosophical and social connections can be found, even
Find your people Whatever you’re into, you’ll find others on meetup who are too, and they are already hanging out without you, so quit waiting and join them.

Great app I think this app helps people to make new friends and to MEETUP with people in your area. It’s great to be able to talk with other people and the activities are great also. Never been yet but looking forward to.

Making new memories Meetup allows folks to take that step in making new friends. There are hundreds of groups to join and many are interwoven with others, so it’s nice to see familiar faces at new events.

Feature enhancement I live downtown St Petersburg, and I wish there was a way to view all the meetups walking distance from my current location, either show by map, or limit search to 1 mile or so, I think that used to exist, I can’t find it anymore.

Meetups Great way to meet people. The people who organize the meetups are very good at what they do! A good variety of activity, sports, dancing , music, hiking, arts & just about anything you can think of. People at the events are friendly & easy to talk with.

Career Pivot Meetup has been instrumental in my career pivot.  Being able to quickly and easily locate a plethora of groups and events that share my passion for all things product and digital marketing has been a lifesaver.  Thanks, Meetup!!

Meet Up Sitw Love this site. It allows for an individual or group to post a meeting or event and for members to easily attend. The host gets updates and can quickly understand how many plan to attend.

Tulsa Backgammon Club My partner and I really enjoy this group and have so much about the fascinating game of Backgammon from these interested and interesting people!  Thanks for the app which made it easy to find the group and its location!

Best way to find friends Best way to find new friends quickly. Find a meetup with regular meetings of a medium size. If you can’t find what you want, make it. People will show up when you have regular events.

“Meetup App” This app is very handy if you go to a lot of Meetup activities! It will remind you that your next event is coming up! Tell you about all the new events in the future and gives you good resources on how to find them.

Great way to get out to do the things you like Meet up is fabulous.....every time I move to a new city, I find new friends, and a ton of activities to keep doing (bowling) and new ones to try (from kayaking to new restaurants).

New friends Excellent way to meet new people that share similar interests and activities.  It is often difficult when we move to a new area to meet new friends and the Meetup App greatly aids in meeting new friends.
Meet Up app I am very happy with ease in joining Meetup groups, that I feel led to do so with and I encourage others to reach out to see if they have the same, great experience that I have had!!
How a mobile app should be Provides all the functionality of the website as a member and has no bugs. Great app. Also a great example of how an api should be functioning across all platforms

Solid Experience I’ve been using the Meetup service and app infrequently but somewhat consistently for years. I feel like I’ve taken it for granted almost. The app has continued to improve and it seems easier than ever to find groups to join.

Great app, easy to use and good for networking. I have been using this app for 1 year now. Easy to use and great for networking. A good tool to have especially if you travel often. Also good for starting your own meeting.
Cool but glitchy Love the MeetUp concept and the app has decent functionality, but it crashes a lot (very frustrating when I need an event address and the app won’t stay open long enough to get it).

The best app to extend your life circle Because of this app, I made lots of new friends. If I want to do something but I don’t want do it alone, simply use this app to find people to do it together. This is the best app to extend your life circle. I like it a lot!
Easy way to stay connected For its purpose, which would be to stay in contact with your meet up group up until the time of meeting, this is a very easy app to navigate.

Meetup App Great if you are new to the area. Advice join multiple groups of interest to you, so you have the opportunity to meet lots of different people around you. Then make sure you get yourself out and go.

First pole class with Terri I had such an amazing time tonight! I will definitely be back next week. Terri really helped me feel confident and comfortable with myself to the point where I was doing techniques and skills I’ve never done before!

Great Selection of Various Groups Only complaint I have is the over communication with announcements. I’m sure it can be changed in my settings its just a lot more than the usual. Could have something to do with the amount of groups you subscribe to or interests.

Maddening app I had this app years ago in Florida and it’s still doing the same thing 6 years later in London. Won’t recognize that I DO in fact have a profile photo up and I can’t join any group I’m actually interested in!

Highly recommend Meetup Whether you’re new to town, or established In any area, Meetup is a remarkable way to connect to the community. There are so many interesting groups we can join or promote an idea of your own. Thanks Meetup ....I’m a BIG fan!

Like minded people I enjoyed meet up bc it allows me to go out with people (who are now my friends)regularly or on occasion, and I get to experience these people and places that I would not have necessarily gotten a chance to.

The Cleveland Candle Co. I found out about this through a friend. I had a wonderfully time meeting new people, and creating my own candle. The people were super fun, friendly and helpful. I highly recommend this group and fun night out!
Great way to meet others alike I move very often as part of a Military family. Looking at groups in the area, is one of the first things I do when moving to our new location.

Great App! Love the ease of use, notifications, and calendar features to keep up with all the activities in your groups. I like how the app recommends different groups that will be of interest to me. Highly recommend this app.

A way to stay safe and enjoy life As an only child this is a great way for me to enjoy local offerings, without the safety risk of traveling alone. Unfortunately, you still have to beware of the groups formed by people that are control freaks.

Appreciate the communications I have watched several groups and their different activities. I am now making the effort to attend the activities and meetings per personal my schedule. I am glad the procedures are simple and direct.

Amazing Food was beyond my expectations. This lady’s are the most lovely people. They are just amazing. Recipe are easy and ingredients are not expensive. The taste is just wonderful. The group it was so charming. I totally recommend this meet up. Please join them you will be delight... 🙂

Great way to make friends! I have met people I never would have been able to without this app. I have met friends that I plan to keep for a lifetime. Do yourself a favor and attend a group of like minded people on Meetup! You will not regret it!

Trish Meetup is a very useful application for me to meetup with people who have common interests and have fun or get exercise. The organizers so far do a wonderful job of providing information and details. I am new and joined to groups so far. I really like it.

Same great website in an app form I love using Meet up for joining hiking groups and meeting new people. The app is as convenient as the website. Especially love that you can message people without needing to exchange phone numbers.
Great app for finding groups of similar  interest I’ve attended a few meetups and it’s been a great way to network in activities and common bonds.  The app has been very easy to use!

Love it I came in to Virginia a new member and I have no idea how I was going to make friends. I researched different groups and this one had a lot of great reviews. I’m glad to say that I have found a lot of forever friends. Thank you meet up app

Totally awesome dudes and dudettes! The only thing I would change is adding a like button instead of having just a heart. It’s awkward when I’m talking to a woman whom I’ve never met and have no romantic interest in and I have to hit a love button

My go to app! Hate running by myself so when I moved to a new city I used this app to find a new local running club. Found a club in my city right away, now I have that extra motivation I need to keep running👍

Needed a friend Very cool! Just wanted to do something without expectations of anything other than doing something fun or meeting new people. Cool to have a place to go find like minded people when you don’t have many friends :)

Meetup App Very easy to use. Has resulted in bringing together hundreds of thousands of people. Would give it five stars for promoting community and helping people make new friends and discover new talents.

Fabulous way to meet people and learn I belong to several photography groups, and can join in on shoots during my travels!  I love sharing knowledge, experiences, and ideas with such a variety.  I belong in Florida and in Western North Carolina, where I visit my granddaughter frequently.

Feels like a Community I didn’t know there were so many things to do and so many people who liked similar things in the area I live in. It’s perfect for me as I work a lot and can plan to attend meetings in advance.

A Blessing Making the transition from husband of 52 years and caregiver to widower has been challenging, but the Meetup app has helped to smooth the way by literally getting me out into the world again through hiking.
You never know how the next person you meet might change your life. You never know how the next person you meet might change your life.

Works well I like the layout and it is easy to see groups and events. I wish the app had more functionalities that the website has, especially in terms of updating my account and group info and photos.

Awesome It’s been really easy to find things to do that get me out of the house. Plus it private! So I can find and join groups that I may not want others to know about. A really great app! Keep it going!
Great app! I wanted to get involved in some IT groups but didn’t know where to look. I found this app and after attending a couple meet ups the app suggested more.

Yeahh Meetup's been really helpful as an option. Winter with it's seasonal depression doesn't pull its punches, but seeing something's happening while I'm wrapped up all cozy helps me get out of the house. I'll meet more fools this way, and I like it that way.

Love it so far It kills me when apps ask you for a rating two days after you’ve been using it haha but here goes. It’s great so far. So many groups to choose from. Even a nudist group which I’m so here for. I love it!!!
Best networking I network quite a bit for my career but MeetUp has helped stay connected to my passions, too.

Easy to use & diverse Meetup allows me to connect with different people/groups all over my city & the world. I love that it is diverse and inclusive of all types of groups. I look forward to starting my own group soon!

Great resource I am enjoying finding out about new groups that I can get involved with. I’m in a transition in my life and enjoying being able to explore and find new social interactions and things to do .

Great for Networking We have met a bunch of great people who are interested in investing. Everyone at the meetings is like-minded and we all get along so well and learn from each other. I really am enjoying utilizing this app for this purpose!

Great Networking This app is great for connecting to like minded community! Not just for work but personal interests too. The only thing that keeps it from a 5 is the ability to easily update my interests from the app. I find it a little challenging to navigate as a user.

Sharing Positivity In a world that likes to stay in their phones, one can now see where to meet other humans in real life. It shows the community who the natural born leaders are and allows so many to grow and connect.
Great for trying new things This app helped me consistently find things to do around the city. While the search functionality could be better, once you get going it’s great

Great app for people new to an area. I moved to a different state and was having trouble meeting quality people with similar interests. I found hope by joining meetups, and have made a few friends in the process!
Hard to find a group or an event I tried to find a specific group, and my location is not set to the group’s city (but still nearby city), it just didn’t show up!
Easy and convenient It’s easy to look up the events going on in my Meetup groups and convenient to look up times and dates whenever I think of it verse going to my computer.

Useful and accurate app I'm a participant not a group leader. This app allows me to get precise locations of hiking trails, advance reminders and cancellation notices of hikes and events.   I can pay  my dues online for groups that I've committed to stick with.  I’m a happy camper...hiker....art and science enthusiast!
Great way to find things to do In areas you have interest in. I really feel like this app can answer the age old question we all face over and over again — What do you want to do?
Just joined I’m just trying out to gather a group of professional singles from my background and ethnicity. So far meet up is doing great to execute this idea.

Great app!!! The Meet-Up app is a great app to create events.  It does take getting use to the navigation.  I use the mobile app the most and maybe the desktop is easier. I think I created duplicate events and I can’t figure out how to delete one! Great app otherwise!!! Pro user!

Just Do It You won’t regret downloading this app if you take the time to join groups and participate. I wish I would have downloaded this when I first moved here. Every group event I have been to is so inviting and fun.
Great way to be active and meet people Played soccer only a few times since high school . I’ve been running but that gets boring. This is a great way to stay fit and have fun!
Great for newbies! If you’re new to a town or even just wanting to explore more options where ever you are, this app has so much to offer and do! There is literally something for everyone!

Meetup Great place to find like minded people and lots of fun things to do and to choose from. I highly recommend for anyone trying to find different and unique things along with people to do them with!

Met such nice people It’s hard finding friends in a new place. Meetup gave me a chance to meet similar people who enjoy getting together. That first time, I was nervous but the more events I attended, the more comfortable I became. Have lots of fun with my group.

New friends Like many adults I find it hard to meet new friends, but this app has given me a chance to meet so many awesome and fun people, I can definitely say that I have met some new friends and it’s a great feeling!
Convenient & easy on the go Great way to check on new groups and keep up on the events you personally have going. Easy to check if you have new attendees or to send messages! Thank you!

Meet Up Very user friendly app.   Easy to tag events you’re interested in and keeps a calendar of meet-ups your going to...haven’t found the way to save events to my Apple calendar- if they don’t have it yet, it  should be a priority to get it added to app.

Great App for Community Offerings! This app is one of the best for getting all of us networking in a positive way around our communities. Thank you for an easy-to-use, simple, yet effective iOS app that’s a regularly used favorite on my iPhone. 5 stars!

Lots of groups, good people & easy to use The app is stable, a LOT of groups from a very wide variety.  These groups meet up regularly, not one of those apps that groups meet once a month type of thing.

Started a group.... huge turnout!!! I’m a work at home numismatist who was tired of not getting out during the day. I started a meet up called the work from home retreat. One day in, 19 members! I love this app/site and will recommend it to anyone!!!

Availability for over 50 I’m very please with this app to get people over 50 to get to network. Thank you for making this to app to help us be active. I recommend this to every one who wants to be active.

Wish I had the app sooner!! Simple, clean, intuitive to use. I finally see messages quickly now so I can stay on top of events and meetups. It’s also great for seeing  new groups I might be interested in!

Great way to find people with similar interests This is a fabulous app for finding groups who share one’s interests.  It also makes communication with group members easy.  This app is invaluable for people new to an area.

Great app for people who are looking for friends for Fellowship or more. I love Meet Up because it’s like a shortcut thru the city and community. It’s very helpful in helping you set up your goals, meeting new people who are likeminded. Like I said, it’s a great tool to have.

Social App It helped me to find groups specific to what I seek whether it is in real estate, social groups for my age, activity sports, local events, etc. It allows you to connect with like minded people who actually want to take action.
So far so good App seems to be almost flawless this time around

Great app! From connecting with local and likeminded people to great notifications on upcoming meet ups. This app is not one of my top favs. It does what it’s suppose to do and keeps me company my back to check in to see what everyone is up to. Great app!

Great app !! Have been using it for the last 5 years and moved to 3 different cities and always used this app and met a lot of great people and made good friends  thought it ! I definitely recommend it !

Love MeetUp MeetUp has been a great addition to my business tools. It allows me to network and to continue my education as a filmmaker. I’ve had the pleasure of growing relationships with people I would have never met otherwise. Thank you, MeetUp.

Best way to meet new people Meetups provides a place where people with similar interests and connect. But beyond just connecting online, the intention is to meet and do stuff together! The best way to do awesome stuff and meet cool new people while doing it!
Easy to make new friends This app helps a lot when you move to a new city, or maybe don’t know many people with your same interests. Easy to find groups, easy to join.
It’s a good app Downloaded it yesterday and already met with a group. I like how people actually use the app and make the meet ups happen. Feels great actually getting out and doing something again.

Great for groups and making friends This app has opened up a world for my son who has ASD and needs help making friends. It allows great communication to know when,where, who, how an what is happening and streamlines the com. I love it!
It’s a great idea and beautiful app The only constructive criticisms I can offer are; add an “edit comment” feature so users can correct typos/grammar, etc.

Legit groups with potential to impact I like this app bc it’s automatically added a sliver of hope inside of me, looking forward to a gathering of that group here in a week or so. Connecting and interacting with spiritually focussed beings is vital for my personal growth thus strengthening communal cognition, understanding and effectiveness of how best to carry the message.

Great app!! I’ve been using this app to find different tech meetups near me and they’ve all been inspiring and educational. Very easy to browse and find events that were relevant to me in the app and to get in touch with organizers and other members afterwards.

Rickski I think it’s great to be able to go out and actually meet people. Instead of just texting online. It’s hard to get to know somebody‘s mannerisms through texts, no matter how many emoji‘s they create! :-)
Way better than web version Web version is hard to navigate and post. Messages are laggy. Meetup was made to be mobile
A cure for isolation! Can also invite spying though. Great app but with unexpected changes and some crashes. I go with the flow. Been an organizer only since 2017.

Great apl I’ve used this all in Washington state for many hiking trips. I was accompanied by a friend of mine so it wasn’t all strangers since that will be dangerous for female solo travelers. But all the trips have been amazing and I’ve met many new friends through it!
Great to Meetup! I move around quite a bit and meetup has been a wonderful way to meet like minded people doing things I like to do. Highly recommend if you’re new to a place and don’t know anyone.

Good app, people are the variable The app and the idea are really actually pretty good. If you can join active groups, and the ones where people participate, it can be great for getting out. It does seem like people lose momentum often. But the app is easy to navigate.

Excellent communication app This app is wonderful to find groups of your interests. Especially when you are I. A different community and don't know to many people. It's a great way to meet and build relationships.

Like the Meetup app It’s nice to have groups I’m interested in come right through the app to my phone on the days they are meeting. That way I can decide in the morning if I want to go to something. I’m glad I have it.

Wonderful app The app itself works great - I can view my calendar and find new meetups super easily. And Meetup itself has been a wonderful way for me to get out and do the things I love with new, friendly people.

Life saver I love this app! In a short space of time I’ve met so many brilliant people, and made some great friends. I highly recommend it to anyone looking to expand their social circles for whatever reason! Thank you!
Great place to meet people I have found this site very interesting. I like it I can do whatever I like and enjoy myself while doing it and meet different people which I love getting to know people.

Love the app, hate the new rating feature Absolutely love this app. Makes organizing and keeping track of groups so simple. But please, please, please get rid of the new feature that asks you to rank every single event you’ve ever rsvp-ed to. Or, at least make it an optional feature.

Easiest and safest way to meet new people! I moved to a new city about a year and a half ago and didn’t know anyone. Meetup made it incredibly easy to meet people with similar interests and get acquainted with my new home!

Love the app I love everything about meetup. I gave it one star instead of 5 because I wish I could customize my notifications more. I’d like to only see reminders about my RSVP’d events instead of all or none, that’s my only complaint. Otherwise it’s great!

Great app! Great connections! I’m new to the app, yet loving it. Very user friendly! Lots of interest groups to join. Or, you can start a new one. I’m enjoying finding out about new things happening in my area. 5 stars from me!
This app helps to make a happy person. One’s social life becomes active with many activities to choose from too. I have a social life now that I’ve become a member to several groups. Life is a blast!

Fantastic way to get involved in a new community I’ve used meet up to join photography groups, language meet ups and yoga classes. Meeting incredible people with like minds is one of my favorite things

Great App for those that want MORE!!! I love this app. What Better than to be able to meet like minded people or be inquisitive about something you’ve always wanted to do and meet those that can show you the ropes!
You have no reason to spend another boring weekend alone! It doesn’t matter who you are or what you like, you’ll find people who share your interests through the Meetup app.

Great App This app is great for finding people in the area sharing the same interests as you. I would recommend this app to everyone.I just wish there were more variety of groups available in my area but I guess that will come with time.

Great way to find groups; app needs work MeetUp is a great way to find groups of like minded people. I had no idea how many groups are in my area. But, I have had problems with the join feature (sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn’t).

So useful Absolutely crucial for people who are new in town and looking to meet people and find fun activities. People are often disconnected these days, and this is a great tool to help you meet people and make friends.

Meet up app I like the app so far. I got into Meet Up before there was an app when I moved abroad. So far, I like the functionality of the app and the groups that have been recommended to me have been spot on my interests.

Stay home or G The options are endless and the choices are ours. What do you enjoy? What are you curious about? Join a group. Stay home or go? Tried it or go again? Leave early or stay longer? Easy peasy.

Yoder saw mill tour It was a nice trip to Amish country visiting the saw mill.  We were able to see a tree get debarked scanned for metal.  The tree was squared off and cut into 1” boards. The boards were cut so fast impressive. Boards were sorted stacked and stickered and stored in a kiln till air dried. Thanks for inviting me to the tour!

Meet up While I just went to my first event I have to say I most liked the casual stand everyone I met was very nice. I would definitely recommend this site to anyone new in the area or for people like me just trying to reconnect with people in a manner that’s not stressful

Great lil app!! The only thing is you actually have to go to these places in order to meet people. So many times I schedule them and I don’t go. Then when I finally do go it’s such an amazing experience!!!
Meetup Works Meetup is a very well designed, functional, and reliable app. It’s easy to navigate. If you have a question about location or purpose of a group, the answer is easy to find.

Wonderful idea! This app has allows me to quickly find new, exciting, and local things to do: from dragon boating to a French book club. I’ve met some very interesting and kind people through events I found on this app. The app is a tad glitchy, but not terrible

Great for making connections I first experience meet up when I was contracted to do photography for a meet up in DC. Now I use Meetup to meet with new potential clients and small businesses. It’s great for marketing my services to everyone.

Meetup Easy to use, diverse groups, reaches all the different areas of my interests - people doing amazing things right in my own town. It's one of my go-to's for personal interests and making professional contacts.

Adventures and Frienships This app is easy to use. It seems bug free. Don’t know about s it’s cyber security. The best part though is the people I’ve met through this app after moving to a new city. It’s almost as good as my AA meetings in Delaware were!😸
Meet Up App I love it. It helps me find the activities quite quickly and when I need an address or  information on the day of for something I have signed up for it’s easy to find.

Great at managing my meet schedule This app is great at managing my meeting schedule. One thing I would like though is edit/add/remove/update my interests. I haven’t seem to figure how to that or it isn’t available and it should be.

Useful It is pricey to run a Meetup when you don’t charge a fee, but I keep meeting interesting people from around the world. Even if it is brief, it is interesting. I have also been able to get to know great locals.
Meetup app Great way to stay connected with groups in real time. Maintains most of the website ‘s features and has an intuitive, mobile-friendly interface.

Stay connected This is a great app for finding things to do in my city. I just moved to Buffalo and I could be a little bit lonely. This app makes it easy to find stuff to do and I’m really enjoying how it works.
Cool way to meet people while you’re doing what you like! It’s awesome! It’s a nice way to do stuff you enjoy and share that with other people and be able to meet them and connect with some of them!

Wonderful way to stay connected. I love getting so many interesting invites for fun activities.  I’m not able to participate in all of them but it helps to know there is always something fun out there to do!

Awesome platform to meet likeminded people I have been using this app for 4 years and I’d Been learning and growing meeting people from all over the world, especially when I’m traveling- best way to understand local culture.

Tonya S. Amazing staff and readers at Crystal Fantasy. Unfortunately, I wasn’t able to meet with healers, perhaps another time. Remarkably, tarot readings were clearly interpreted and relevant to my journey ahead. I left feeling inspired and energized after 14 mo. of self-reliant soul searching. For that, I am truly grateful.

Great way to make new friends when traveling I especially appreciate international meetups when I travel.  I’ve toured art installations in Barcelona and played chamber music in London, just to name 2 fun activities I’ve enjoyed away from home.

It’s great! It’s great to have so many choices of things to do with like minded individuals! It’s impossible to not have a good time when you’re doing things that you enjoy. Kayaking, hiking, biking, tubing, skiing, concerts, dinners, etc. etc. etc.! I’m having a blast!

Meet up was here b4 Tinder I love the app and I have used it from the very beginning   It is a great way to know what events or activities are happening in your community. Great way to make long lasting relationships with people with common interest.
Nice app for connecting with new people. I’m enjoying,  joining different groups for different purposes.

Great Resource I’ve found the meetup app to be a great resource for finding other like minded people and to try new experiences (art class, spiritual development etc..)An opportunity to step out of my comfort zone. Easy enough to use, but some format changes could be tweaked.
Great way to stay connected Easy to use, love the notifications of events (not too many like some that bombard you). Great tool to stay connected, find social events and make new friends.

Facilitator for 11 years~ I had a successful meetup group from 2007 until 2019 and loved every single aspect of this app. Only stopped facilitating because life changes made it impossible for me to keep it up. Long Live MeetUp!
Easy to use This app is incredible. It’s simple yet effective, and you can do some much with it. So many options to customize it to your liking. Highly recommend!
Fantastic app. Great way to meet people to do activities with. Highly recommended. This app is great for almost any interests you have. Join others who share the same interests and make new friends.
Excellent way to keep up to date with Meetups groups and events. I like the app a lot. It is easy to use and has everything I am looking for. The search function is really good.

Great way to find interesting... People and things to do.  A wide mix of interests, locations - free stuff to do as well as meeting at ticketed or paid events. Its nice to have an app that makes it easy to find people who are interested in things you are interested in too

Great way to find events in my areas of interest The app is practical and useful to find meetings in my area and to see who is attending and what comments and photos there are after. Thank you Meetup!
Great way to connect with people you didn’t know you had anything in common with I love this app. I have joined groups that I had no idea were even a thing! Can’t wait to meet everyone
Very helpful especially when moving to new city Great place to find ppl who enjoy your hobbies and new friends especially when moving to a new city that you don’t know anyone in.

Go to App for Meet ups for outdoor exercise with group My husband and I use this app for hiking and biking events I the local area. We get to meet new people who have an interest in. I biking land hiking or trail running. Easy to use and understand.

Creative Discussion with District Creatives To me the event provides an xcellent way to get insights from multiple disciplines/ professionals within the Creative industry and also way to share your thoughts, ask questions and practice public speaking.

Meetup group San Diego Movie Group The group is a good way of meeting people from all over and you get to have dinner with some of the group and enjoy up coming movies and get a chance to discuss them among each other.

Great Opportunities This app is great if you are new to Charleston or just want to join in on activities around the tri-state. There are so many groups for all interests you may have. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking to meet new people and have fun along the way.

Love Meetup App I’ve been able to meet people I wouldn’t normally get to meet stuck at work. Similar interests and hobbies and also very positive and motivating people who have helped me inspired me to live with passion and fulfill my destiny! Very appreciative of the app!

Meeting Great People Went to two events today and had a blast. Everyone I met was so kind and welcoming. I learned a lot too and am very grateful for the opportunity to connect with such wonderful people. Thank you Meetup.
Great app! I have found so many groups in my area of like minded people using this app! It’s very user friendly and has had no bugs or issues. Have recommended to many people!
Making great friends Actually have a social life now! A lot of options to choose from. There’s something for everyone. There are spammers but where isn’t there.

Doesn’t upload profile photos. From within the app it doesnt upload photos to your profile. You can select a Picture from your photos and it temporarily loads it to your profile. However when you hit save and it starts actually uploading a photo and goes back to the main screen you just see the default gray black picture where your photo should be.

Great App! User friendly, easy to see events and new groups in the area, and it runs very smoothly.  It’s easy to RSVP to each group, and it’s simple to find your groups and what you have RSVP’d to.  Runs smoothly, minimal issues, and I have had a great experience with this app.

Great app for meeting folks in urban and suburban areas I have really enjoyed using Meetup to find things to do around town when I have time to do so. It’s great for quick one-off events or longer ongoing meetups, too.

Great first experience!! Just joined our first meet up last night with my husband and we had a really great first meeting! Looking forward to attending lots more and meeting many more people!  Thank you!!

Meetup changed my life in one day! I had the most wonderful thing happen by running into a couple, who are a part of Meetup. They invited me to join a group. I downloaded the app in 15 seconds and suddenly opportunities abound!!!! I love the Meetup app!❤️🌟⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️❤️

Love it A social media app that enables in person engagement. The app is intuitive and easy to use. The UX so simple I don’t have to think about it - the hallmark of a well designed experience. MeetUp is the answer to online group experiences.
Easy to Navigate It’s easy to navigate and scroll down to see what’s happening. I’ve been able to message someone and see their response with no issues.

App is solid. And meetup is a great service Simple app that does what it needs to and has no bugs I’ve seen. More importantly, the service that meetup provides in helping those with similar interests meet is amazing. Thank you.
Thankful This app helped me find events otherwise I wouldn’t have known of while giving me the opportunities to have conversations with other app user I would highly recommend

Starting life anew I recently moved to San Diego and meetup has been a great way for me to plant my roots and branch out in the things I love and have always wanted to try. The low pressure meetups and friendly faces make it easier to abandon the existential discomfort of social isolation 👍
Connectedness Technology can be isolating, however Meetup, and it’s easy to use app has been quite the opposite.  It has really helped expand my social circle and improve overall quality of life.

Meetup review Have met new people and shared fun gatherings. You pick which ones you want to attend and ignore the ones you don’t want to attend. This is getting me out of the house,  and I have gone to local places that I never knew existed. Love it!

My experience Meet up is a great app that has helped me find groups in my area that I had no idea existed. I would highly recommended to anyone who feels like they have no one to share their hobbies with!

Find people with common interests This App works well. You should be able to find a group you’re interested in or start one yourself. I started using this app to find new members for an already existing group I joined. We got some new members from it.
Friends Met a couple friends from meetups so far. Takes the awkwardness out of making friends when everyone is trying to do the same thing.

Fun and easy I love this app because there’s no pressure. It allows you to get in touch with your community by finding fun events near by. I’ve told everyone I know about it in hopes that it will help people build connections.

It’s good! The app is great! Only issue I ever have is, sometimes I don’t get alerted for the notifications. Sometimes, I’ll go to my home screen and see the red bubble saying I have a notification. Other times, I’ll go into the app and I’ll see that I have notifications.

The meeting was so fun They have the video playing re how to thread and everyone was supportive. I got to use the sewing machine and practiced right away straight stitching. But time flies when you are enjoying it. I need to make my own curtains now and Hemings.

Things that make you go hmmmmmm 🤔 I believe this app was better a few years ago. I purchased membership to create my own events and no where am I able to do so. I have been to every option on the page and I don’t have the option to create an event. I’m so boggled at the moment. Someone please help!!!

Pretty Awesome This app is really well organized. It is very easy to navigate to all the various meetup functions (groups, events, etc). Honestly, I find the app easier to use than the meetup website. 5 stars!

Meet Up App I like the app as it makes it easy to keep up with what’s going on in the groups I belong to.  You can talk to others in the group through the app if you’re not ready for private friendships.

Parting is such... We know how it ends, Meetup brings people together.  A social medium, Meetup’s user friendly app is a wonderful tool of discovery.  Finding events, movements and your passions has never been easier. If the real thing and real people are your thing, Meetup can make it happen.

Keeps me connected while collaborating I really enjoy meetup app it’s easy to use while finding like-minded professionals. I can also be in the know with events that are similar to what I enjoy doing and learning.

A great Way to Meet People Found some great ways to spend my time through Meetups! I moved to a new state and found a group of people with a similar passion for Volleyball. I love that I can pick up the Meetup App and find a game whenever I want!

Wonderful way to explore and meet new people. The app works great with the suggestions all the way to the nice reminders.  Have really come to count on it over this last year.  Thanks to the developers.

Murray chamber networking lunch This was an awesome event today. For those that missed it, the presenter was keep it marketing and taught us a lot about how to do the correct type of marketing. I love how we get great tips like this free just for being at these chamber events!!

Wish there were more local meet-ups The ap is very user friendly, Great Job in creating it.  I wish there were more meet-up groups then just book clubs in my city.  I joined meet-ups in surrounding cities, but most of them do not have any events planned.

Greet for those who are new to a city My friend recommended this app to me since I just moved to a new state and I like it so much. I had anxiety about meeting new people and this app helps with finding like people with similar interest.
Great app for connecting Great app for connecting with others that have your same interests. First week of joining already had several different events to go to. You won’t be disappointed.

Generally works and Meetups are great I love all the options out there for Meetups. The real life events and networking that occur via this app is what’s really wonderful. The app itself it alright. It generally works and if you can’t find what you’re looking for here go to the website and your group connections will show up in the app. All okay.

Meet up I absolutely ❤️ how it reminds you of your groups and places that on your calendar to remind you, confirming is great also so the group knows that you will be there thank you meet up app absolutely ❤️ it Scott

Great way to be more social Instead of sitting at home alone and lonely at night, finding a group is easy and inexpensive way of meeting people and getting involved in so many things. I really like this app.
