Nice app As an organizer, I wish the “glad to see you” was available when you are in the app. If it is, I haven’t been able to figure it out. Overall, the app is great to check notifications, messages and quickly see who has RSVP’d.
Great way to try new things and meet new people! Finally went to my first meetup and had a great time! An easy way to meet new people doing your favorite activities- or trying out new activities!

Fantastic APP This is a fantastic APP and I use it daily with my toddler to look for events and activities. The app have the option for alerts and messages to communicate with the event hosts. Very easy to use and search too. Thanks :)

I LOVE MEETUP!! I’ve met some wonderful people, some now my close friends, with the help of this app. Whenever I’m off an feel like I want to find something to do, I just get on the app and search for something interesting. It’s really great!
Real social media With most things, the people you meet can contribute greatly to the quality of an experience.

Nice way to meet new people in new cities My wife and I moved to a new city and this was the first way we found out about new groups and activities. The app is a great way to accelerate meeting people and having fun experiences!
Great way to make new friends I had to try out several groups to figure out which ones would work best for me. Now I am so grateful to have found friends with similar interests.
Great App To Explore Started using this app and really like it. If you’re new to an area this is the app to find out what is going on in your area as well as your interest or trying something new.
Great App I enjoy being able to find people with the same interests as me through this app! The reminders and feedback option after each event is awesome!
Very helpful I am somewhat new to an area and decided this would be a good way to meet people finding out what there was locally to do. This app worked very well to do both keep up the good work

Helping me to get out. I suffer from bad depression and this app helps me to find a reason to get out and interact with others. I can’t say that it has stopped me from isolating but it is a step in the right direction.
This app works This app works and is user friendly. What more could you ask for? I’m sure the content varies depending on where you live, but there is a ton of stuff to browse in my area.

Useful Have used it at home and while traveling abroad. Great way to meet people. Dropped one star due to technical glitches, but overall, this app has been a keystone for me in my nomadic life. I have met so many people important to my life through this app!

Great way to meet people and get a good work out. I have been using this app for about 4 years and it has been great. Good way to find people who share a common purpose and want to get a good workout.
Wonderful way to connect Meetup is a great way to connect with other people who share your interests.
Really good way to find people or groups doing activities you’re interested in Excellent way to find groups of people doing activities you are interested in

Meetup app does it all I belong to a number of meetups which could become confusing.  But this app sorts the groups and makes it easy to send messages, photos, remind myself of particulars.  It’s what a terrific app should be!

Useful Service Very useful service. Navigation can be a bit challenging but it’s worth the minor frustration to have access to do many communities - especially if you’re trying to get established in a new location.
Excellent App It’s worked really well for me in finding other photographers like myself who want to share interest and information. Can’t wait find other topics to meet up on.
Great to find active folks Easy, intuitive, not bogged down by obnoxious suggestions or notifications. I use it to find local dives.  Already used it to join in on meetups in 2 weeks. 👍

author_name: Awful, Looking for a new app
review_body: Most wonderful and engaging Meet-up. I have never Ben disappointed Most wonderful and engaging Meet-up. I have never been disappointed and have taken out of town guests who felt the same! Thank you.

Now I Know! Had no idea there was such a simple way to connect with people and events centered around things I love to do! No more excuses for boredom or neglecting that old hobby or talent- get out there and meet up with folks who love what you love.

Try it out Surprisingly, good people and turn outs. Of course, have to still screen people, but there are decent people that participate. The thing is to join like minded groups to get like minded people.

Love this app I recently moved to a new city and had no idea how to find like-minded people and events. Found the Meetup app and have discovered some terrific groups, classes, and people. How wonderful to have this resource readily available!

Meetup and the app so easy to use! I love Meetup - I met my husband in a hiking meetup 😍 - and the app is super-easy to use. Say ‘yes’ to exploring new hobbies, getting back to your old favorites, learning new languages or skills, making friends, having adventures and fun with Meetup!
Great way to meet new people I just made a big move to Colorado and already found new friends along with professional contacts for my small business!
Recent improvements Meetup app has recent improvements that I like, you can now star events you want to attend to save for layer and is now even easier to find events in your calendar.

Easy This is a fun and easy way to get out of the house and meet people.  Broad array of interests covered, and the app informs you of other things to do in your interest profile and also in your geographic area.
Much better UI and features Much more functional than previous versions, with helpful features. I've also not had any crashes

Wonderful! I was referred to MeetUp by a counselor when I felt isolated during graduate school. MeetUp is a great way to find like-minded people, which I believe is theoretically one of the best ways to make new friends, network or find a significant other.

Great app I really enjoy the variety of groups available here.  Everyone I've met at the events I've gone to have been very warm and inviting.  Great way to meet new  people and try new experiences.  I tell people about it often.
Great way to expand your horizons! Love the opportunity to not only meet new people/try new things, but also the opportunity to be able to start a club of your own. Fantastic Apple!

Super App I love the Meetup app on my phone as I belong to couple of meetup groups. It nice when I need to let them know if I am participating in the activities and I happen to be out and about. It lets me know when there is an event coming up!
Great app The app makes it easier to join groups and you feel as if you know all members of each groups do to all the information given.

Great, easy to use and necessary! Love how easy this app is to work, how smooth it runs and how useful it is! It’s how I keep my kids active with local groups and how my hubby and I can find cool things to do! Great app! Highly recommended!
Very easy to use It’s intuitive, easy to find the things you need. It’s really luck of the draw whether there are cool things near you, but the app makes it very easy to find them.

Meetup is a great way to meet new friends who have similar interests! I really appreciate the meetup app. Being new to the area and retired, it’s difficult to find “like-minded” people. Meetup highlights the opportunities to meet new friends and enjoy a great time!

Great app for keeping track without marking your own calendar down Tells you is coming,where it is held. Who’s the host and gives you different topics to join,you want to meet new people and do things in common with someone......this is the app

Easy to use, mostly I’ve been part of a few meetups for a couple of years now. Have made some long lasting friendships. I took off one star because there’re more options to find groups on the computer.
Everything in one easy to use place. User friendly and all my meet ups are available with a single click.

Meetup is amazing! I love that I can connect in my community doing activity’s and things of interest and find new friends to do them together. You got to sing up for this app meet some great people in your area!

Embrace your inner social butterfly It’s great! I always thought I was a boring person who prefers to stay at home, but with meet up I found out I was actually very outgoing, I just could never find events I enjoyed beforehand!
User friendly App User friendly app. Allows people to Meetup. When planning it allows you to talk about the upcoming event before, during and after. Highly recommend !

Everything Under the Moon and Stars This is a great group that’s well run. There’s a variety of interesting activities. I’ve come to expect great food, folks and fun. A Big Thanks to Sky for bringing it all together time after time.
Great app when new in town!!! When you move to a new state, you have discover all things and like minded people in your new home. Or, if you find yourself in a rut and want to try new things!!
Useful Reminds me of upcoming meet up’s, offer suggestions on upcoming meet ups, easy to use and useful, Izzy interface. Overall a good app can’t really think of anything I change at the moment

Love it I truly love this app, it’s all about connecting people with events while making ideas alive! I truly appreciate what meetup has to offer! Looking forward to take my life to the next lever of a friendship success 💜

Pretty Cool! This app helped me adapt to my new home after relocating from Michigan to Florida. I met new people and got familiar with the area, and even met the man who is now my husband at one of the meet ups. I can truly say this app has changed my life I’m happy!

Meetup I am glad I discovered the Meetup App. If you would like to do fun and interesting things and meet new people this is the app for you. I encourage anyone to join especially if you like to be active and be surrounded by people who share your same interests and likes!

Excellent This app has helped me get in contact with a lot of people and opportunities that I otherwise wouldn’t know how to find. It syncs with my calendar seamlessly and with Meetup it couldn’t be easier to ... well, meet up.

Use it all the time! I use this app for all my networking and event hosting. It’s a great platform that connects people with common interest together. I’ve met so many great people and learned so much from them! Thanks for developing a great app Meetup team!
Perfect for on the go So far I am quite happy with the app. It is simple and functional. I enjoy being able to interact with my groups from my phone because I am always on the go.

Easy to use & know what’s happening Love being able to see activities targeted to my interests. I don’t go to a lot of the meet ups, but when I do take the time to go out I want it to be something I’m truly interested in, and this really helps with that.

Thanks for making sure I received important business meeting information. You guys are great. Thanks for making sure I received important business meeting information.  You guys are great.  Have a wonderful productive workweek.  P. A. Charles
Customer service number? I paid meet up so I can meet people in my community on person. I want to cancel my membership and want to be compensated for the fee I paid that I can’t use now.

Please make more user friendly! I love the concept of the app but trying to edit anything is such a pain! I wish there were just simple “edit” buttons instead of having to google search how to edit my profile because I cannot find how to (I’m 25, very tech savvy).

Meetup Interesting groups, some groups do you have to pass something to join don’t understand that so much because it doesn’t say there requirements to join. And not sure if these men sending messages to date are allowed I didnt think this waa a dating app even though I want to met new people?🤷‍♀️

Good but not great The app is good but could be better.  Not sure why I can get to the calendar to pick a day and see what’s going on that day like you can with the web version. Also not as intuitive as could be.  Took me awhile to figure out how to go back from pictures or profiles.

Love this app! I’m a Meetup Organizer. Been using this app for the past 3-4 years. Love it! It’s so convenient. The customer service is much faster now and better at getting issues fixed. It’s so easy to use.

First time user I hesitated at first but finally attended a meet up and enjoyed it very much. The app is helpful in filtering events that meet your individual preferences. Great tool for expats or anyone looking to connect with different people and experiences.
Meet up It’s very easy to use & has really been useful to getting connected with things that interest me.  I’m impressed with the quality of facilitators and the content.

Great App To Connect Been using this app for a while for personal interests and will now utilize it for business.  Highly recommend for people who move a lot to get acclimated to a new city and likeminded people.

Where has this app been my whole life!!!! Moving from NYC to LA was hard on me leaving my friends behind. I am so thankful for this app. I’m now able to start over and I’m looking forward to new friendships.
When you are new or existing this is the place to go I recently relocated to Florida and was told to join this app and so far I’m loving it. People are nice and you get to go places you’ve never been

Meetup Review I’ve been looking for like-minded people and decided to use Meet-Up. It’s been amazing how many people like me enjoy the same things. It’s been great finding like-minded people in my area. Definitely enjoyable.
Making friends The app is so easy to use and there are always so many meetups to chose from! I’ve made some good friends already after going to 2 events :)
Love the app Using the app makes it really easy for me to stay tuned with the groups and community that I am interested in being a part of. It’s easy to setup and use. I haven’t had any issues.
Great Site Like the ability to connect to interesting groups and people.  Just groups before joining. If they haven’t met in a while, they may no longer be active.

This app is great I’m new to Meetup but been have been impressed with the app. What a great way to meet new people and try new things! It’s been an awesome experience so far and I’ve had no problems with the app itself.
Easy to use app! I like the desktop version better for setting up events and approving members, but this works well for selecting meetups to attend, checking notifications, and messages.
Search is too clunky Search is too clunky. I should be able to “explore” by technology meetup groups in one or many nearby cities.

Love it! A great way to get out after learning a whole new way of socializing after a divorce or loss of a spouse.  There is so much to choose from, whereas I’d be lost as to what to do or where to go at this point in my life.
Use this app often. I use this app often since I live in a small town, but close enough to a large one that I can find out what’s happened there and go to events I want to. Love it.

A great resource to meet new people! I was new to the Bay Area and dreaded trying to find new clubs to make friends, but meetups makes it easy! The app is intuitive and simple to use, and I love that it adds my meetups to my apple calendar!

Great app Me and my friends group use it all the time to create events. Instead of having to send invites or texts and wait on rsvps it’s all there on the app for them to take care of themselves. Very convenient
Like minds need to grow together I have been looking for people that share the same mind for quite some time now. I finally found it. I’m grateful for finding them thanks to this app.

Love meetup, hate the app The app interface is horrible. Specially the search. Ridiculous that you can search and get better results on google about meetups than in the app! For such an old and loved community with a great backing this should not happen.  On too of search there are other app specific ux issues that make the experience frustrating

Great App This is a great app to get connected and manage easily for information about various events to engage with others. The app allows the opportunity to explore by the touch of a finger on a phone. Thanks!
Meetup The Meetup app makes obtaining info quick and easy.  So much better than going online to Web site. Also notifies you when someone leaves a message or comment.

Cool application Meet up is a great way to connect with all types of people with similar interests.  It’s great for busy people who just want to do activities also like go on a hike or sit with folks and learn about something

Having a good time with Meetups The Meetup app has proven to be very useful for social, business and employment reasons.  I would strongly recommend it for people who want to meet people rather than sitting at home doing social media on a computer or similar  device.

Please fix the latest update. Worked well for years. Not now though  When I click on “more information” from my email alerts. Connects to Meet up but says this content unavailable. I’m still listed as a member of these groups so I should be able to see more information from Meetup group events I receive emails From.

Great app! Your imagination is your only limit with this app.  So many groups to get involved in and if nothing interests you then you can start your own meetup. The only downfall is if you live in a small town.

Great idea! This is a great way to meet people! When all your friends are married, it’s refreshing to be able to meet men and women that just want to go out and have fun without feeling like the third wheel.

Best way to meet like minded people I’ve been using meetup for almost 10 years and have always had a good experience with the meetups I attend. It’s a great way to meet others with like minded interests and activities.
Many groups and so many like minded interests! I enjoy this app because of the diversity of groups and because it’s so cool and fun to meetup with people and do fun activities.

Great for networking with people with common professional and personal interests Meetup has not only helped me network with people with common professional and personal interests, but has also helped me develop new interests

Meetup is great! It’s a great way to find activities to do to save you from boredom. You meet a lot of great people that quickly become good friends! The organizers are great!! The app is super convenient when you’re on the go.
Best app ever! I wish I would have found this years ago! Meeting people with similar interests and age has never been easier. Get ready to make lots of good friends in a matter of days!

Great Plagform I love this app. I have met so many ppl that have been great connections to my business and industry. Also my social life. There were so many things in my community I was unaware of, such as restaurants and even hikes. I love this app

author_name: the real mickey not the mouse
review_body: About the app This app is pretty darn good. If you’re moving to a new city, looking for community, or to deepening skills within the work force or what ever,this app has what you need. Some groups may cost a bit tho.
Betty Ford Meet-up I had such a great learning and meeting experience today. Thank you for being so open and warm. The program is amazing and I will be using this resource immediately.

Love it! I am not into social media of any sorts. As much as I enjoy the freedoms of being free from “photo posting” addictions, I often miss out on various community events. MEET UP is the perfect solution! Plugged in without being over-connected. Yes!!!

Great App! I love Meetup! It connects ppl with the same interests. I love playing volleyball. I moved to a new area in July and I knew most of my happiness was going to rely on my ability to find new friends with a common interest. Meetup has helped me find just that!
Excellent site! Meet real people, many groups are free, just show up when you feel like it. The notifications don’t overload my inbox. This app got me off the couch and back into the real world.
Great way to meet people I'm always looking for fun things to do and this app if a great way to find people to do things with! I use it when I'm in my hometown and when I travel. Highly recommend!

Good but could be better For me, it’s a little hard to navigate. There are too many options for such a simple idea. Sometimes I just wanna look at the chat in my group not have to click around to get to it
Meetup app lets me manage group easily I can easily make changes and updates to my group, Oh! The Horror!!!, from  anywhere! It is simple to navigate and has everything I need in one place.
Worth it As adults it’s so hard to make friends day in and day out this app helps you connect with those you can click with for whatever your interests
Very organized! I like this app because it gave me a chance to play volleyball after I couldn’t play club anymore. I didn’t think that there was so many meet up’s as much as I saw on the app.
Such a great way to meet people. I am new in town and found many interesting groups and people through Meet Ups. Great way to connect with others with similar interest.

Great way to connect with like minded people!!! Social Media is the way to expand your interests & connect with like minded people for business or hobbies. Meetup provides the Social Media connections no other platform offers! Love it!
A great way to meet people I have used this app during my last two moves across the country and have found it extremely helpful in meeting like-minded people on the area. I love it!!

Meetups attended Love the app. Fairly easy to navigate. Once in awhile I get mixed up within it... that’s just me! Some groups are “clique-ish!” Beware! The women can be catty sometimes, so just avoid those groups. You’ll recognize them! Otherwise awesome app! Met some great people, new friends! Enjoy the events and outings!

Hiking I mostly use the app in search for hiking and backpacking groups. It’s so easy to use and thus far, there have been great folks I have been able to meet. It’s a great app to connect with people of similar interests!
Getting connected I have moved to different states twice in the last few years and meetup has helped me get connected and find groups with similar interests.

Excited to meet new people! I just started and I was very excited to see how many different groups there were in my area! I’m very eager to jump right in and start meeting some new, great, interesting people!!! :)

Try it out. You will love it This is a great app for ppl who just moving into a new town and want to meet new friends or ppl who want to find something to do. I use this for when I’m traveling and local events.
Great App! This is a exciting new service for me and this app makes it even better! Get notifications, event details and message group members; everything you need to connect with new friends.

Limited but good It’s fun to see what’s going on. I wish it showed me everything that was going on in my area even the groups I didn’t select. Maybe I wasn’t sure what the group consists of. But it’s nice that the groups I did select keep up with the site 👍

Awesome app and great way to meet people with similar interests I love that you can join a meetup group or start you own.  Organizers can create an event and invite group members via the app.  Such a fabulous way to meet people with a common interest!

Meet new people. Explore a city. Try new things I love the meetup app. Every time I go to a meeting I am always so happy I went. It shows you things that are going on in the city that you normally wouldn’t know about

Meet up ap is a downer Since I’ve downloaded this ap I’ve had nothing but frustration. User friendly it’s not!  While trying to organize a date for the next meet up it asks how frequent are meetings.  And while our meetings are every month, it doesn’t necessarily fall on every 2nd Saturday as the ap keeps scheduling it. So I schedule the next meet up and it automatically schedules the next 5 or 6. Ugh!! Please fix this.

Great way to meet people My husband and I have used this ap to find groups to go off road or with. We have loved it! Made new friends and great memories. It is a great way to meet people with the same interest.

Very valuable. An essential for introverts & extraverts alike Meetup is very help for anyone from all walks of life. Whether you’re visiting temporarily or here to stay Meetup is a great way to do interesting things in the city or your area of choice with like minded people

Great app! Love this app! So easy to use to see all the great meetups in my area! Amazing way to network with people whether it’s for business, social events, meeting new people and finding people who share a love for hobbies.

Founder of The Ultimate Breakthroughs I’ve been a member for many years and have always recommended to people looking for like-minded connections and expanding their networks. I’m grateful for this long-withstanding group.  Thank you 🙏
Meet Up I like this because now I don’t have to go to my email to find what’s happening in my meet up groups, and I can see my notifications right away.
Cincinnati medical cannabis group!! Everyone is so friendly and helpful!! Whether you’re a patient, a provider, or interested in more information- these are the folks who can help! Thank you!!!

Meetup app I love this app to help keep me connected to people in my community who share my interests. I have met many great people and have had the opportunity to build valuable friendships with the people I’ve met.
Excellent way to meet like minds The concept of Meetup is so bright!

Building community I’ve received regular emails for a while but every time I actually attend an event I’m pleased to be doing something of interest with people of like mind.  It’s a great way to connect people

Needs a little improvement The app is great and I love finding new events and people to meet. One complaint is that I wish I could access more of my profile in the app instead of having to get on the big ol’ laptop.

No landscape mode on iPad = EPIC FAILURE Cause, you know, it would terrific to actually be able to USE the app. Not everyone is a hunch-shouldered, squinty-eyed, monkey-fingered iPhone addict. Some of us will only accept apps that don’t require us to be one.

Honolulu Have been using the meetup app over the last  couple of weeks here and it’s been great!! Couldn’t be happier with the connections I’ve made!!! Lots of variety of activities and great people!!
Great way to meet people. Whatever your interests, there’s a MeetUp for that!!
Best way to meet new friends We move every few years due to my husband’s job and every time the Meetup app helps us find our new community of friends and chosen family!

Meet up makes being social easier With busy careers it’s challenging to meet like minded persons to attend various social events with.  Meet up has allowed me to meet really awesome groups of people.  Thank you Meet up!

Options The app offers a variety options of activities related with your interest. I already tried couple and I’m super satisfied. I’m a member more than 2 years and not so active but it really give you options. I’m happy

Love it!!! I joined a mommy and me play group for the first time with my daughter through the Meet Up app. Not sure if it would of been as organized and easy if it wasn’t for the this particular app!!

Fun app I’ve moved to a new town and decided to connect to the community through the app. Instant results.  Looking forward to making new connections with people that share similar interests. It’s great
Not what I expected Gone to two meetups with different groups and both groups were very inviting and fun. So far loving the experience and being able to meet new people.
Only used it for a day so far I enjoy it! I found two meetups to attend and made quite a few friends already. Hopefully it continues to improve my knowledge of my surroundings! :) Great options!
Greet people to meet up with Only draw back, the app is a little slow. When you get a notification, it might take you to the feed but not exactly where the notification is from

Keeps improving I’ve gone from complaining about the user interface to liking the app a lot as it keeps improving with every update.  Now I don’t know what I’d do without Meetup. They’ve been very responsive to questions, too.
Found community This app is great for anyone looking to get out into the community and meet new people, and experience new things. I have found some great places, experience, and people.
Great way to connect For two different groups I created this has been a great place to find others interested...I recommend it to many people.

Easy to use app The app was referred to me by a friend since I just moved to the area and didn’t have any friends. This app is very easy to maneuver and find out what’s happening in in the local area and surrounding areas as well. I think this app is here to stay for me.

Awesome app! Very handy This eliminates the need for checking on the computer/laptop. It saves a lot of time RSVPing on the app itself. Another bonus is the ability of the app to create a calendar event for each meetup.
Terrible Customer Service The app is designed to make it practically impossible to deactivate your meetup to prevent automatic billing.

Still glitchy Still have trouble with opening the browse section and viewing comments from the notification page.  When I click the comment notification it opens up the event but with a blank space below it.

Introverts lifeline I’ve found so many meetups that work for me, that help me get out into the world and do things with other people, share space, learn, and heal. It has been a good thing. I’m glad this exists.
Fabulous There will always be a reason why you meet people. Either you need them to change your life, or you’re the one that will change theirs. ❤️🙏🏼❤️🍸

Thanks Thanks meetup for allowing such a social enjoyment of all interest. Fee is a little high to host meetings but very much enjoy the platform. Search features could be a bit better. Not ideal but still fantastic.
Meetup Updates and discussions in your pocket The Meetup app reminds me of upcoming events, gives me directions and new details for each event.

Ultra meet up fun Just searched for an event today and wow found a networking meet up met so many great professionals !!!! Recommend you going, take a chance shake some hands and above all be a good sport making new good friends!!!

Amazing I only just joined so I don’t fully know how it works or much about it but so far it is really neat! My boyfriend & I are able to discover new hobbies, places to visit and events. We’re excited to meet new couples and friends through this app. All in all, it’s really cool!

Great way to find people and events that fit your interests I love Meetup and have recommended it to friends and family. I’ve found local groups that are into French, chess, mototcycling, and other interests of mine.
Meet Up App This app is amazing because there are so many people out there who are alone due to various reasons. It’s difficult finding friends with like interests on your own.

Meetup great Nice to have means to meet new people that share your interests and since meetups can be found across USA, you can find groups in any area to sign up to learn about new places and share activities.

Great way to connect I attended an event that I found on the app. The outing was fun. I enjoyed being able to do something new with a new community of people. I wouldn’t have found the group outside of the app.

Review Good way to meet people. I know very few people in this area. This meetup gives each of us an opportunity to choose 1 or more group(s) to try and see what is to our liking. Great idea whomever started this app.

Found Friends Just recently moved to Vegas as an actor and had no clue where to find my group the thespians and even other circles I enjoy outside of my professional life and I found ALL of them plus more on MeetUp! I love this app.

Awesome way to meet people I find this app very useful in helping me find things to do and to meet new people. The only downside is that not manny people show up and for my age there needs to be more options.

UX is terrible and confusing I wish I knew how to articulate what exactly is wrong or how to fix it but this app is just...not intuitive! It’s hard to find new groups or understand what I’m looking at. I really don’t know but the whole thing just needs to be re-designed. It’s terrible to look at and now I can understand why so many of the groups haven’t been active. It’s sad. Make the app clearer and easier to use. 🤷🏽‍♂️

Useful app This app runs smoothly and it’s not a headache to figure out. This, u spend the time using the app for its original purpose rather than spending your time figuring out its functions. No complaints here!

Great way to find people with similar interests! I’ve made some great friends through this app! I will be honest and say that I was super leary in the very, very beginning - but that  was quickly dispelled. I love meetup. I use it in AND out of town. Great app!
Makes setting up a meeting simple! It’s so helpful having my meeting info/notifications for the group I started plus announcements for other groups so easily accessible!

Take a chance Great way to meet people, but you must be willing to get out if your comfort zone. Low pressure environment. It’s all about finding your tribe. Some cool people and some maybe weird to you. Good luck and enjoy!
Found my perfect group I finally decided I wanted to find a French conversation group.  I joined meetup, found my group within minutes, went to my first meeting the next day.  Thank you!
In the know on the go Easy way to stay connected and up to date on events you plan to attend, while “on the go”. I haven’t had any problems with using the app.

Great App Meetup is a great app because it uses modern technology to bring people together in person which is more rare in this age of computers and media. It’s a great idea to create social events for like-minded interests that helps build community and encourage growth.

Where is my Meetup group. Two days ago, I started a Meetup, and it is not visible to any of my friends on the Meetup app. I can see it, but no one has gotten emails stating there is a new Meetup. I picked all the relatable "topics" to get new members but nothing. I have emailed tech support and two days later, still waiting. Why is there not a number. This is so frustrating, and the app is in the MySpace age. Shouldn't have to use your desk top to use Meetup. I'm so over it!

Frustrating This app has never worked properly. I continually update it when there are updates available but it never works. I can’t even get into my messages, meetup groups or search for new groups. I’m getting over it and thinking about deleting my account completely. What’s the point of it if I can’t get it to work ever. Please fix your app or I’m out as well as many others I’m sure.

Usability I like the Meetup App. There are some “Usability” tags I wish were available. One is I wish the app had the ability to delete notifications so after being read I don’t have to see them again when returning.

Something for everyone! I got this thinking there wouldn’t be much offered along the lines of my hobbies, but there is so much! I love finding like minded people in my area 😊 thank you to whoever created this app it’s awesome!
There is always something to do Looking at this app it’s hard to find a day when something is not going on. I would, however, love an option that would just show weekend content.
Great way to find like minded people! Made great and worthwhile connections that I could not find anywhere else.  I expect to use for years to come.  Of course the mobile app is a must have!
Great way to see local events This is such a great idea! Local people sharing local interests! I can’t think of a better way to explore your area if you are new or been here all your life! Thanks!

Keep up the wonderful work! Just wanted to give a quick shot out to #meetup for providing the great service of connecting people and creating a relationships. I’ve gotten to experience and participate in a lot of awesome meetups! 🍻
Advanced dog training Although it was first class in a long time I always need that extra reinforcement and I pick up new tips n tricks all the time. Good class looking forward to next week.

Like Minded People Finally It doesn’t matter if you’re new in an area or searching for like minded people to converse or go out with, Meet Up is the place to find fast friends, acquaintances and great event!

Uploading photos. I have been a longtime member. I belong to a drawing and painting and have an extremely hard time uploading photos other members also have too. I get an oops something went wrong try again later.

One of my favorite apps / service As a Sales Exec in Cloud space striving to up my technical chops MeetUp app allows me to effectively find great events to attend and build out my personal and professional network and help my clients

Great way to meet like minded people Since I moved to this new town/state s couple years ago I had no idea how I’d make new friends. This app has led to several great meetings and possibly mutually beneficial relationships as well.

Cool Way to Meet Like Minded folks Meetup works really well and definitely is a different way to get involved and social... like real in person social!  Plus gives you insight to similar events and hones in on your interests.
Takes the Awkward out of socializing and Networking Appreciate this for finding a way for adults to get out and meet other adults as well as network!
MeetUp Review Like walking your dog on Tuesday afternoons while drinking coffee, I’m sure you can find a group to match your interests. If not, you can easily start your own group.

So easy to find genuine like-minded friends I joined for investment info and then moved to learning Spanish. The Spanish meetups are great.  All very helpful people that have become friends quickly.  Pick a group and join!
Site for meeting people This site allows people to meet others with common goals. For example, sharing activities together with others in public, there are groups for that.

Good for making friends. It’s a great app for finding friends with similar interests, especially if you’re new to an area. Also it helps to get you going on that adventure you’ve been meaning to take but never have.

Carderock I could not stay at the same pace as the group, but I did go and I’m proud of myself! I walked almost a 5K. It was an easy hike on a beautiful day. Thank you, I will do it again. I had my snack and my binoculars to watch the birds.
Great network Such a wonderful way to get out, learn something new, try something new and meet new interesting people because all the old stuff is so yesterday.

Best way to connect Best app for connecting w/ others w/ similar interests, discovering new things to get involved in and knowing what’s happening in your city and whatever other city you find yourself in.
Enjoying it so far Just started using it but can definitely see the need to help meet folks with similar ideas to have fun and spend time together.

Resource What an amazing resource to connect with like minded people and build our community. Thank you so much! I referred many people to this website for whichever topic is their passion or they need a support group in.
Many Different Options I am looking to meet some new friends with similar interests and this has some great ideas and groups. Easy to navigate the site too.
Organized The fact that this app allows you to join events by the click of it, and is easy to read and use the app is super great
Great way to connect! I love meetup because it gives people a chance to easily connect doing fun things they already enjoy. I tell all my clients new to the area to try meetup to get to people.

Connection Meetup has been a wonderful way to explore new interests in a safe environment. I have enjoyed meeting people interested in the same things. There is no pressure to be heavily involved. Enjoy your new adventure!

Downtown Dabblers Michael is an outstanding event coordinator. I can’t believe how many meetups he hosts. I’m enjoying getting to know everyone. I just moved to OC and it’s nice to have something to look forward to even during the week. Fun!

Horrible - Meetup does not deserve even one star I used meetup for several years. Initially I loved it. When the app was updated, the new UI was horribly designed. Most of my meetup friends stopped using meetup as a result. I also experienced many meetups that were poorly organized with a lot of people attending that were quite rude. I stopped attending and using meetup. I am just now writing my review after not attending meetup for a while.

Excellent male massage exchange group. While response times are sometimes slow among this group, the people in it are excellent, serious about Massage, but also without an attitude regarding their own level.

Excellent This app has been instrumental in helping me meet the wonderful like-minded people in Bend, my new home. The app itself is so easy to use and it’s integrated into my iPhone calendar as well, which is super handy! Love it.

Getting me with my peers I’m usually on the go so having an app that has me in the know is awesome.  The meetup app is just that.  A quick browse of where the next thing is happening with people like me.

Great app My only complaint is I want to stop getting notifications for the comments made in meetups I don’t plan on attending. But meetups through this app has really advanced my modeling career. A lot of great people on this app.

Great app to capture new audience I am using to start a new social action group. Super effective means at reaching a new crowd of people. We provide opportunities for military, police and fire and their families to be more active and healthy both physically and socially.
Meet up The meet up app is easy to use and is a quick way stay informed and communicate with members not only in my groups But also new meet up groups that interest me .

Cool app! This is a great app if you’re trying to meet and network with others, expand your friend/associate group, etc. I have a busy work schedule so I have yet to find something I can do that’ll work with it but I love the variety of events!
LOVE This site makes me feel connected.
Easy to Use Type your interest into the search box and find related groups. I’ve found two through this app.

Great for people who have moved Get out there and have fun! This app is great for connecting people of like interests. I’ve used it twice - once when I moved to Nola and once in Austin. Both times have been so helpful!
Great social escape for travel people I use it often and specially when I am traveling for business or pleasure. There always a great program to attend and socialize with think-like people.

Wow worth it I was really nervous about using this but I’m glad I did because I really found my group of like minded people! All it takes is to get out of your shell and a world of opportunities is out there! Love this app!!
AN APP THAT BRING HAPPINESS BY CONNECTING PEOPLE WHO LOVE THE SAME IDEA When I’m sad I just open up the app and find soccer dudes and go okay and have some fun

Great one stop shop I love this app I just more people knew how resourceful it is and can be... but it requires more people to use it to make it better... I am not affiliated with the meetup app... but I am a developer who understands the hard work that went into its creation... thank you meetup

No websites Don’t try to send websites through MeetUp such as the exact location of an event, information on upcoming events online, or anything like that. In fact, don’t even try to send your email. They get blocked every time. They miraculously let phone numbers go through, though. 🙄
Easy to use It’s a good app, helps keep track of upcoming events and even adds them to my calendar for me. It’s less customizable than I’d like to see, but I’m overall enjoying it.
Great This app is pretty great for people who looking to try new things or have more a social life!
Meetup review Recently moved to a new area! The app has been super useful for finding other people in the area interested in the same things.

Great app! A great and useful app! You can easily search for meetups in your area of interest and in your specific location. A great tool for those who are new to any area and want to make new friends!

Meet up app I tried the meet up app for a card  making group and it was so much fun meeting new friends for a delightful afternoon!  I love the idea of this app as we are new residents of Florida and we are looking to meet new friends!

So easy to use and easier to get to meet ups! I was looking for some unique gaming meet ups and the only platform that supports these groups, happens to be on this Meet Up App.  The BEST tool to meet new people, with shared interests.  Feeling blessed

New community, new friends This app has been great for helping me get out in my new community and experience local restaurants, bars and events as well as make new friends that I wouldn’t do normally.
So helpful! The app is super easy to use and navigate, much better than online which was always slow. Posting an event is also fast and easy
Great way to stay connected! Fun, easy to use.  Had a glitch getting my confirmation email.  Problem quickly solved by customer service (Ross).  Loving staying informed about our group.
Safe simple and reliable It helps keep us home bodies off the couch and on the go.
Works well Doesn't crash, some issues uploading photos time to time. Smooth experience most times I have the app running. Keeps me active and social
Always trying to make it better‼️ You are always striving to make the app more user friendly. I like that we now can take attendance directly from the event. Thanks for all you do!
Brings people together I’m a stay at home mom and have a 2 year old. This app has let me join free mommy groups that just want to make friends and have their kids play and socialize!
Easy and fun to use The Meet Up app has made finding events in my new town easy. It makes it easy to find groups and makes suggestions based on your interests.
Just love how easy it is to meet I like everything about this app. Built in payments thru PayPal or your credit card. Finding events is easier than ever before. Thanks
Meetup is a great app Meetup is a great app
Meetup App is great I recently started using the App and have found it a wonderful way to connect to groups with my common interests.  It is easy to use and I have had no issues. Love it!
So useful especially if you are from out of town Or if you want new friends.

The Goodyear hiking group. This is a wonderful way to get exercise, meet new people & share  your life with people, who obviously have the interest. I feel safe with our team leader of Goodyear fitness, Jim Rafferty... it’s a wonderful way to get to see the beautiful views of the our valley.
Literally a bit of a life changer If I want to find something to do next weekend I’m sure to find a cool meetup with just a quick search. I’ll leave it at that.
There’s everything for all interests I love MeetUp. Being new to a fairly large city gives you the opportunity to meet people and make friends who have similar interests.

Malcolm Turner I’ve utilized MeetUp to grow my knowledge on my field of business. I’ve acquired so much business by word of mouth through MeetUp’s. Thanks for growing my business and most importantly my business bank account.
Seems to be a little slow, it could be so many things but It’s there’s a way to speed up the messages and etc that would be helpful for sure otherwise loving it!

New to the game I’m fairly new to Social Media and being recently divorced, I must say that this app has provided a tremendous amount of opportunity to stay busy, get involved and get the positive support I very much needed.
Easy to use on phone I logged on via a laptop and you don’t get the same acceptance button. View on computer or laptop reserve on phone

Awesome Amazing app that helps bring like minded individuals together that you would not necessarily meet/see on a day to day basis. Helps build strong relationships that are healthy and worth your time. Thankful for this service.
Convenient way to access Meetup quickly I’ve been using this app for a while, and it works pretty well. There are some functions you have to go to the full Website, though.
Great Idea! I love the ease at which I can choose to join groups...so much easier than before the app. Very organized and helpful! Great experiences so far! Wish I had thought of meet-up.
Easy least I can browse a wide spectrum of opportunities and easily respond.  If I find that something comes up that prevents my participation, I can change my response.
Meetup makes me better Attending meaningful events is such a crucial part of career development. However, finding out about them is challenging. Meetup solves this pain.
User friendly and so convenient! Simple to navigate, does what I want an app to do-tasks for me! Everything in one place so I can see what is coming up, who is attending, messages...love it!

The app is great for group activities! It can be a little glitchy with notifications and asks for a review of every single event (I do Tennis meetups 4 times per week), but I’ve met some really great people through the app so it’s definitely worth a download!
Easy to use Interface is easy to use. Haven’t come across any glitches and it is aesthetically pleasing. The variety of groups available and app functions are awesome. No complains here.
TamThom I love Meetup because it gets me moving when I would otherwise not!  Thank you for the opportunity to meet new people and join activities I wouldn’t want to do alone!
Meetup I like the way the App interfaces with my google email. I can read comments, know when photos have been added and link directly to the app.

New version, same problem This app just crashes constantly. I had this problem on my iPhone 8 and now again on my 11. I can use the app one time and the. Whenever I open it the second time, anything I try just errors out with “Oops, there was a problem” Horrible coding and exception handling. The only way around it is to uninstall and reinstall the app, and then it works once.
Sweet Adeline’s Omg, the most beautiful experience, woman empower and united by acapella singing.

Love it! Such a great way to find events and get togethers! So easy to connect with groups of people who share similar interests! Found a Dachshund group and recently connected with a Husky group! Give it try! 👍
A great app to meet people & learn I enjoy the variety of events and the up to date listing a multiple activities all over the metroplex. I especially like that I can find dozens of events near me!
How to make friends It’s easy to make friends when you find people who like what you like. Meetup has unlimited opportunities for expanding your mind or your circle of friends
Great Activities I’ve been meeting up with new people, going to new places and finding out about activities in my area. This App is a great way to meet new people and get out of the house!

Meet up is great for unique events in the city I had an amazing time meeting people from all over the world who spoke German at our monthly Stammtish dinner with Goethe Institut. Will go every time there’s a meet up opportunity! What a great concept.
MeetUp is Great! I am flabbergasted at how easily and quickly I was able to set up our group. We almost instantly had people join and sign up to attend our first meeting! Thank you, MeetUp!

Super great! Easy to use to find events from where you are at to where you are going. I have used Meetup for years. It helped me to settle into Austin. And now I’m back in Houston Meetup is helping me kick start that too.
Great App This app has allowed me to find like minded people who share and teach each other. Without this I would probably had to stumble and search for weeks on end .
Easy to use Super simple to use in accomplishes everything I would want to in an app especially let me know when you events are happening.

Great events, pretty easy to use I’ve already found several groups that should add to our social life, personal pursuits, and personal happiness (!), all in the half hour or so that I spent time checking out the app.

Crashing - 8.1.2 Excellent app usually, but the 8.1.2 version is making it crash. Touching the ‘explore’ button makes it crash. Please update or hangs it back to the older version which was working fine.

Great opportunities Meet up offers an opportunity to meet with other with common interest. Moving from out of state meet up was a great way to meet new people with the same passion and interest as me.
Meetup rocks I have found many groups of my interest. And they meetup once a week or so. I truly recommended even if you’re not new around. You can get to know colleagues or just have fun.

App is not displaying photos for upload Getting an error with latest app that can’t select from recent photos. Items in all photos album are not showing recent photos. Have to use the website to upload.
Profile pictures need to UPDATE throughout site Profile pictures don’t seem to update on messages, or invites, they stay the former profile view, outside of this everything is fine.

Needs some fixes I love the app but recently I’ve experienced some bugs. Some of the member profiles aren’t showing up. When I click notifications and select a message it goes to a blank screen. I’m also not able to save my updated account info like age.
Great App I’ve used this app for a while, and sent a couple of years as a consultant moving around.  It’s been a great tool to find groups and meet people when in a new place!

D&D Nights In these modern times, especially with this “tabletop renaissance” It has been amazing to find a Dungeons and Dragons game with a full time work schedule. Now I wonder what other activities I could discover. 💁🏽‍♂️👍🏼
Love the app Glad I uploaded the app to my phone for quick access to find out what’s going on at any given moment. The app is very user friendly and I have never have delays, pauses or hiccups.

Pioneering Concept in Need of Updates Everybody knows that Meet-Up revolutionized the virtual world by permitting online relationships to take place in real life. Years later, however, the platform needs some serious updates for functionality and æsthetics. Still, it is reliable and a useful resource.

Convenient Great App for Meetups b/c it’s convenient to check, have reminders and directly message. Meetups are great especially if you starting over in a new place. Not much of lots of Apps, but this is one I use a lot.
Personal recommendation I think the top portion of this which I put on the wrong line will suffice because I don’t have the time to re-write right this second thank you love the app.

Helpful Resource I love using the Meetup app to stay in touch with what’s happening in town, and to meet and connect with people. Highly recommend if your looking for a way to stay plugged into your city scene.
Love it I really like having this app so when I forget whatever is going on (which is everyday now!) I can just look it up.  Ronid doesa great job keeping everything up to date.

Nice way to meet people like myself Within the first day of installing the app I have started talking to several different people and arranging meetups with a couple different groups. Thanks for the app guys!

Not working right Great app but now there is an issue where sometimes you click on a meetup and you see ‘no content available’. I removed the app and reinstalled and no fix. I reporting it but no response. Please fix this. It was a great app before this issue. Now it’s very frustrating.
Meetup app is great! The meetup app is so good because it organizes the many groups you may belong to and gives you a heads up for upcoming events and even has a list view to speed your navigation.

Meetup’s are great! The power of meetups can be life changing socially, economically and spiritually all in a matter of what you are looking to do. Great people and opportunities are only a meetup away. Use this great app to empower your life both going and doing!
Opens up a world I didn’t know existed Excellent application. I really didn’t think these type of meet ups were available to me like this. Smooth working and not an overly complicated app.
Great app to have in the road I travel a lot for my job and i love thAt i can keep up with what’s going on in my groups while I’m away, and know what will be going on when i get back

Great way to meet new peeps! Moved from Boston to Atlanta and had no connections in my new city. Happen to ride a motorcycle and joined a few riding groups and made instant friends. Meet up helped make my transition to a new place fun and easy.

MeetUp Asheville Project Finishers Absolutely love the concept of MeetUp!  So many to choose from that no one should ever have an excuse for not being able to be a part of a group to share similar interests.

Like this app! Very friendly to access. Constant updates in their part making it better and better

Awesome experience What more can you ask for? You guys did a great job at introducing yourselves to the Jacksonville community, the event host were extremely pleasant and greeted us at the door with a smile. Looking forward to the next meetup.
Life Changing! In less than a year have had many adventures I wouldn’t have been able to have before, and have new lifelong friends as a bonus!

My first time I just joined this weekend and will be joining a group this week. So far everything has worked very well.  The organizer has been very good about answering my questions.
Works great Found a great group of people for playing board games. Group is solid and been running a long time. If there’s a hobby you are looking to enjoy with more people this can really help.

Fantastic! I love this app because I am in touch and connect with people.   I  spend my free time traveling and this app has opened my experiences where ever I go.    The app connects me to activities and like minded people.   Thank you

Great way to connect I finally found a group of people I’d been trying to locate since I moved to south Florida.  This is where you find the events you’ve been looking for.
Love this app! This is such a great app for getting involved in different communities. I would highly recommend for someone who just moved from out of town to see what’s going on in your new city!
Phenomenal The Meetup app has been such an amazing way to link up with people and groups in my local area, as well as outside areas that are near! I have recommended the app to many friends!

Meetup is very user friendly in all aspects Meetup is very user friendly in all aspects ... setting up the account, paying the small fee, signing up for activities - it’s really nice and easy; even fun!
Awesome! I really like how it’ll show the price for things if you’re unsure like the yoga meet ups. I also really like the detail and the smooth transition from screen to screen in the program.
Great app This is a good way to learn about activities nearby and to meet new friends. I’ve been able to connect with many folks with common interests, especially in art and hiking in Switzerland.

The Jam! Best app ever. If you’re looking for a way to meet new friend and break out of your routine and not have to be based around alcohol, this app is the one for you. It’s easy to use & I have had nothing but awesome experiences.

I love meetup I’ve really loved being able to not only network but to socialize with women in my area. I’m new to San Diego so it’s nice to be able to go out and meet people with similar interests! It’s an easy way to make friends.

Great way to share interests Meet up provides a method in which to meet individuals with similar interests. It is wonderful that so many are willing to create opportunities for people to meet and share ideas.

Love it! This app has changed my life...I’ve met so many great people through this app! Without Meetup I wouldn’t be working where I am now...I wouldn’t have the business partner I have now! Thank you!
YOLO I’ve found so many activities of interest, some that wouldn’t even consider trying, but did , and best of all met many good people that I consider friends using this app!
Great way to meet new friends I moved here and was looking for a way to meet and make new friends. I have been able to through this app and wonderful groups.

Meet up helps create friendships and relationships. I joined meetup two years ago after my relationship ended. It was a great way to get out of the house and meet like-minded people looking for adventures.

Great introductions to several different interests I have been to several different meet ups, have met people and have done/found interests and activities that I enjoy ❣️
Events’ list I really like the way I can view a comprehensive listing of all of my groups’ events.  It’s so much easier than going in and out of each group.

I can’t believe you guys are not fixing known flaws and bugs in this App. As an the group owner and main organizer I can’t even change any group settings. I get notification of a new event but content is not available. Too many bugs to list.
Great App This app presents a great way to meet people and interact with people that have similar interests.
I Always Recommend to Others Always always recommend to people that feel alone in a new city or feel the need to nurture an interest and to be nurtured by like-minded souls

Great for finding local groups I just moved to a new area and Meetup helped me to find sport groups to practice and meet new people. The app is intuitive and easy to navigate around. Great idea and great product!

Big thumbs up for meetup! I have just moved to a new area and have found meetup to be the outlet I was seeking to meet new people with similar interests!

! Great app! Would be great if it was easier to search groups vs just events. Would also like to be able to be friends with people or at least connect in some way. Overall love this app.

Best  way to meet people with similar interests as yours. This site is very productive and we were able to gather 25 people within one month sharing the similar interest

Love this app. This app saved me when I was in a deep depression and had become a hermit. I was able to reconnect with people and find things that reminded me of the things I love and the person I am again.

Love it. Everyday I sit home and do nothing, no friends to talk to and not experiencing anything in life but this app is going to change that for me. It's going to help me get some wonderful memories and hopefully a friend it two.

Great way to meet people There is such a variety of activities and groups to join. I recommend it to many of my friends that move new cities.
