Social group The best app to use when you are new to town, or just seeking new connections, if you’re wanting to be more social, and if you enjoy meeting new people from all walks of life!
Great app, lots of fun activities Lots of fun activities to get involved in around your city! I love it! Just beware, some groups sound fun then they’ll ask you to join some “pay to hang” side group

Meetup I love my Meetup groups. When I moved to a new city, I was easily able to meet people who have things in common with me. Although there seems to be room for improvement with the app itself, the overall concept of Meetup is great!
Great App with “Apple-esq” type feel I’ve been using this app for a few weeks now and it super simple to navigate, which is a plus!  Highly recommend!
Very good app I think the app is great and no less valuable than its desktop version. Easy to find and sign up to groups, use chat and rsvp your place. Off to next meetup!
Easy to use and very convenient The app is very easy to use and quite convenient for letting the club know that I’ll be attending and for going back on and saying the meeting was great.
Great way to meet people with similar interests We’ve been using this service for 9 months now. I don’t feel like my data is being exploited.

Mobile app broken You download it you sign in with Facebook then understandably it asks you what are some interests... then you get to your profile and you just keep hitting next and it stays on the profile screen. You close it and repeat the cycle again and again and again and again and again and again. Not sure how they have users.
Works great in so many cities Whether you’re new to an area or just want to explore new things in your city, Meetup is a great app to get connected to new people, places, and activities.

Happiness 101 I really enjoyed today!! Met some great individuals and learned some good key points to not just knowing about how to be happy but how to apply them to actually become happier ♥️ I’ll be back for sure!!!

Good This is great app is good way to just get out of your everyday chores and meet people! Am getting a couple bugs lately though, like not getting email notices from all my groups or “good to see you” notices. Checked my prefs and they are all on.

The good, the bad, and the format. I like the address link to maps to see where meetups are.  I would like the ability to group meetups in chronological order. It would also be nice to be able to rotate vertical to horizontal on tablet.
Great for connecting with people We all want connection.  Without MeetUp, I wonder how we could find folks to connect with. You can find almost any group with your interests.
Meetup Helps to Connect like-Minded Folks Have enjoyed using MeetUp to make new friends. Helps to make real life connections in this age of social media where it is difficult.
Great app Have been using it for only a week, so can’t vouch for bug fixes or changes. However it’s been user friendly and easy to navigate!
Easy to use I had a meetup over 10 years ago and this app makes it so much easier to organize and stay in touch.
Wonderful app for meeting people I love all the variety of groups to join. An extremely user friendly in app experience as well. Super grateful for the opportunities this organization provides.

Great for finding like minded people I enjoy meeting with people this way doing things as an informal group with a similar interest. Sometimes the app is a bit confusing but it usually works out just fine.

Great way to connect ! After moving across the country, from New Jersey to Northern California, this app helped me connect with like minded hikers and music lovers. I learned about the best trails and where to find the most fun music venues. Thanks!!
Almost perfect I would love it if the app had more ability to manage my meet ups. As an organizer I'd like to be able to edit my meet ups add hosts and other things that are available on the website.

Cool enough app, but there’s barely any groups where I live Title says it all. I wish I could use this app, but there’s only a few groups in my county that are a long drive away (and I just have a bicycle). So I just don’t use it, since it’s not helpful.

An amazing way of connecting to new worlds! I have moved to new cities, towns, states and countries well over a dozen times in my life. Meetup has been the best way to reach out, connect and join into my new environments.

Great concept. It is what you make of it. Like the opportunities it presents but ultimately it takes effort on your part too to make group meetings work. Also find it is common for people to say they are going and not show, so just keep it in mind.
World Class app This app is amazing.  A must have if you like keeping the communication going between you, family and friends.  Keep up the good work and thank you.
Great app and easy to use. I like the ease of use and the level of detail you get using this app. It is not overdone and gives you what you need to make an informed decision about a group.
Amazing app! No matter what your interest, you’ll find other people to share it with!  Great way to meet others who have things in common with you!

A needed app! This is is such a great creation coming out of the digital age! A place where we can connect. So many people like to say social media makes us individualist but this app proves otherwise. I love it!

User Unfriendly :-( While there’s some pluses in terms of messaging and easy access to a calendar of events and search...however, the app doesn’t allow you to edit your email address nor double click on profile messenger photos to access a person’s basic profile page. It’s 2018 and the app behaves like its 2008.

Decent This app is a good one to find meet-ups near me. There are a few things that could be improved to make it a little easier to find information relevant to me and help me find my messages easier.
Palm Beach can so boring Thank God for meet up when you got nothing to do you get always depend on meet up to get you something exciting and wonderful to fill
Love it I use it all the time, when you need to connect but don’t have a group of friends to call on or don’t want the mess at your house, this is the answer.
Meet up I think meet up is a good alternative way to meet like minded friends and activity buddies. With today’s busy lives meet up gives you a chance to socialize.

A great way to find your tribe Have an interest or hobby you love but no one do enjoy with? MeetUp is the place to find like minded people to expand your community to do what you love and do new things too.

Simple love this app I love using this app to find things to do. It’s the most helpful way to get out the house and find events, while meeting new people. So much better than joining dating sites. I love it

Effective way to invite people with similar interests I used to use conventional way to advertise activities; posters, leaflet, etc but I find meetup offers another effective way to do so. Thanks to the Meetup team…

Just started using Seems to be a good app. No crashes or hang ups. Notifications are good. I get a bit lost when a lot of people comment on an upcoming activity. Have to hit “read more” a lot to see it all.
Love this app It’s very easy to use and it’s easy to communicate with people on the app forInstance when you are running late you can just shoot them a message.

Some questionable architectural decisions For an app with a mobile website, it baffles me that when I log in on my browser, I immediately am forced into the app. I don’t want to go to the app, because this app has no way of editing my interests. Three stars for a mediocre user experience.

Great tool for building community Ive been using Meetup since it’s start, it has been very, very helpful in gathering communities of practice in areas I wanted to learn. Thanks for creating it Scott Heiferman and thanks WeWork for continuing to improve it.
Meetup Meetup is a great way to get out and socialize with other people while doing fun and interesting indoor and outdoor activities.
Great app Making new friends is very difficult for adults. This app is the best solution I’ve found. Meeting likeminded people has never been easier.
Keeps me updated on daily events Very useful and great to get last minute updates from hosts etc. and as an organizer, it’s Easy to create events in seconds.
Love Meet Up! I’ve met so many wonderful people through Meet Up.  I’ve made friends, learned many new skills and explored opportunities I wouldn’t have known about without the aid of Meet Up.
Great App and Service Wonderful and an easy to use way to find new friends with similar interests.    I am new to the area and have found this app invaluable to meeting new people.
Love the app and the network App easy to use, the network of events is great. I only use it for real estate investing and business, but it's become a major tool of my business
Great app - does what it’s supposed to Honestly not much more to say than it works. Which meet-ups you choose is up to you. This app works well to display and remind and keep me in the loop.
Meet up is super helpful The meet up app is super helpful for me.  I like that it provides reminders and keeps me up to date on the groups that I enjoy connecting with in my area.
Love Meet Up Very organized.  Extremely helpful to find exactly what I’m looking for.  It’s a must have if you want to keep in touch with people you want to connect with.👍👍

Great social app I have no complaints. This app is exactly as advertised and they do an exceptional job of delivering their product. Highly recommend it to anyone looking to expand their social circle.

Great app This app is great for meeting people in your area that share the same mindset you have or is looking to increase their knowledge on the subject of matter. All in all it’s a great way to network.
Bitchin’ This app helps me try new things, meet new people, and just overall feel more adventurous. It’s like I go from having no plans to plans just like that.
Meetup App A must have to find out what activities are happening and with a group of people you would enjoy experiencing those activities with!!
No way to search for groups? It’s very strange that when you search for groups, let’s say Photography, you see a list of events but NOT a list of groups.
Good app Everything is great about this app,I just wish they'd add the planning stuff more into the app.

I think everyone should try this! This app has the ability to help anyone who is sitting home alone on Saturday night, again. As well as, those people who are looking for knowledge about a large array of subjects
New to area I forgot about Meetup. I used it a long time ago and used it the other day. I’m new to the area and want to meet people. Now I’m able to meet people doing what I like to do.
Meetup I have been using Meetup for about 5 years now. It is a great way to meet people interested in the same social or physical activities!  I’ve only had great experiences while attending Meetup.
Functions as expected Application is smooth and I actually prefer it over the website.

Nothing close or interesting I tried your app. Nothing interesting without a multi hour bus ride each way. Got it down to just the stuff in town and nothing of interest there either. App was recommended by someone as a way to make friends and meet gay men with similar interests. Absolutely nothing. Lots of booze meet ups/ hook up meets for kids. Garbage app for me. Deleted and will never recommend this app to anyone.

Great App Great way to get connected to whatever interests you may have - rather it’s swing dancing, photography, or just hanging out. The meetup app has it all. Join and start enjoying what piques your interest and/or talents.
Great app to explore your city Have enjoyed this app, recommended it to friends and they have enjoyed it also.  Lots of interests, things to do and easy to search for your interests.
Good way to meet great people A great way to meet like-minded friends, safe alternative to dating sites, excellent way to network, find people to work out with... get out of the house and meet up!
Genius! Meet others sharing the same interests Expand your circle of friends, while doing what you enjoy!  Learn and grow while exploring new activities !
FB for meetups I like that the interface is simple and easy to use. Everything I need is there. Notifications. About upcoming events are convenient and don’t bother me.
Meetup The very good friends I have made since I have been in Chattanooga for six years have been through meetup. So many wonderful things to do with wonderful people.
Civil engineer Love the option that there’s always something to do. I wake up motivated now knowing, whether I have plans or not, there’s something interesting and fun I can be doing nearby.
Something for everyone I love this app because no matter what your interests there’s a group out there for you and they make it so easy to find.
Easy to use Well designed, organized app that makes it easy to find people and events you’re interested in.
Many groups to choose Meet up is a great application to find groups and activities that you are interested in. No need to sit at home alone anymore!
Great way to meet people I like all the options of common interests and how friendly everyone is. I hope this is available everywhere.
Excellent customer service I am a group facilitator that Meetup helps. They are great with how involved they are with making sure the group is as detailed and successful as possible. Thank you.

Best adventures! I have used Meetup for several years in a couple of different states - I have meet so many great friends on several awesome adventures!!  Couldn’t have been possible without Meetup!!!!!
A platform on productivity and fun If you happen to be in any city all around the world and want to have a nice time, meet new friends and learn something new, this is the right platform!

Hiked and tree enthusiast Not always easy to find a specific group because the app is confusing when it comes to searches. But I love an app that makes meet up groups available. Nice to have it on my phone

Meetup Have used this app in multiple cities. Always a good way to connect with people.  Fun to try new interests or stick to those that I know I love. Have met great peeps, learned helpful info and had a good time.

Fantastic Seminar A weekend packed full of information. The room was full of people who genuinely want to help others. This is a great group to join to network and learn the business of multifamily investing.
Great app. Much improved!! Keep up the good work developers. We love the ease of use. The ability to respond right away to public comments has proven quite useful. Thanks!!

Great for getting out and doing activities with like-minded peeps. Meetup is a really great app as it helps me find group bike ride’s and other social activities that I would otherwise have no idea about.

The Continental We met up to listen to some Jazz. It was my first MeetUp and it was a great experience. The venue was beautiful! I have driven past it for over 11 yrs and never knew the place existed. I am looking forward to another event!
Great App The Meetup app works very well. It lets you easily find groups you are interested in and once you have joined a group it keeps you informed about the group’s doings. Very easy to use.
I’m a better me thanks to this app! Let me start off by saying I love meetup! I’m a person who struggles to find political people. Now I have so many chance to connect and get to know people like me!
Great way to meet people of a like mind! I had people join my group the first day and within a week, we had a meeting of people all looking for similar help professionally! It was great!
Great app to meet or enjoy activities! Works better in the city but only because there are more people. Lots of activities and friendly people!

Master of Vacation Rentals The Meetup app is an awesome on-the-go way to keep up with the Meet up that I host. Meetup has been a great way to launch my platform, publicize my book, and create a real community around the topic of vacation rentals!

Need more meetups in local area I like the meetups but some are not active or responding to any inquiries I have been sending to the organizers. Others not bad. Some things I can afford some I cannot. It’s worth the chance to save for it too.
Excellent Excellent tool to use , to find what interests you. I found several different meditation classes to participate in. I would not have found them with out this site/app.
Love this app Meetup is a little tough to use at first just because most page look a lot alike. Once you get use to it it’s great for finding thing to do in your area.
Lots to Offer Meetup is an excellent app...many options to get involved around your interest. A wonderful way to enjoy what you like doing & meeting great people at the same time.
Frustrated with not being able to create meet ups Meet up used to be so easy to use.

Rat Race Rebels 2 We have tried cancelling this site but I notice it is still on there.. how long does it take to remove? Susan Jung is the organizer for Rat Race Rebels and I , Anne Kuroda is the person with Rat Race Rebels 2 , co organizer to Susan.. Susan has attempted to contact  guys to cancel Rat Race Rebels 2.... I have already opened up my own page called Rat Race Rebels II.. so please take out Rat Race Rebels 2 ASAP!!!!
Meet Up Meet Up has been a very user friendly App and great for meeting new people
Meet up app This app is great! It’s so nice to be able to schedule activities with our group and see who can come. Definitely would recommend this app!
Why pay! Meetup has spent a lot of time creating and upgrading their platform. I never thought I would create my business from a online connection platform. But I did ! & its GREAT!
Love Meetups I follow 2 groups regularly and like getting notices for other groups; the app has functionality for groups that is much better than email lists
Basic App, 3.5 ⭐️ Pros: runs very smoothly, easy to find groups and send messages

Manifesting... Daniel provides great information and visuals. Then, he opens the conversation to allow people to share a multitude of expressions about their experiences on the topic. A great learning and sharing experience. Thank you Daniel
Reliable This app is very functional and streamlined.
Great event! Great program! Absolutely amazing event with very intelligent and smart people! Tons of information, very well organized, super positive atmosphere.

Great APP New to area and has meetups for any interest you could possibly have. Rating four stars only because I haven’t had much time to evaluate the security. Love the concept and keeps me informed of activities throughout my area.
My meet up app review I’ve been using the app since last week, and overall, it works really well. The only issue is that voiceover has trouble reading events in the explore section.
I found my people!!! Really enjoy this app as it has helped me find people with similar hobbies and now I have fun things to do with new people who are also becoming friends! LOVE IT!
New to the City Moved to a new city, started using meetup, met friends! The app makes it so easy to find things you’re interested in doing with other people.
A great place for those with similar interests ! From the beginning this was a great concept for those who want to quickly join a group of like minds.
Learning I would give 5 stars if the app was a little more user friendly when searching for groups. Most of the time I get a response with nothing to recommend around me.
Put yourself out there!!! I love meet up group it’s such a creative and easy way to get involved with like minded people in your community and is great for people of all ages and backgrounds!!
Fun! There are so many fun options of things to do with all of the different Meetup groups that if you somehow can’t find something you enjoy doing, I’m sorry...
Amazing App Such a great way to see what is happening near you and join in! Also to keep a head count if your leading a group! Love this to stay connected as well!
Amazing way to meet new friends Love this app, it makes me go places, meet people and challenge myself exploring things I would think to do otherwise.

Really glad I joined I’m spending a month in a new city and in order to become acquainted with the area I joined meetup. Love the programs and activities. And I love the convenience of the app. Highly recommend it.

Piezi Great information. A lot of insight gained from the meetings on starting over in life and getting past the loss of a partner. Focusing on what you need and want for your future in life and in a new relationship.
Love this app! I love using this app when I travel around the world! I can find a meetup anywhere I go! I meet new people and have a good time! What a wonderful way to bring people together.😊

Kim Johns It’s pretty cool to have an app like this. It’s a way for people not to be lonely and deal with all different types of issues. There is a group for every area of life and every activity out there. I love it!!
Can find anything and everything here So many random groups, can always find new cool stuff to check out
Nothing short of amazing! I love this app, it makes it make things very easy to find a group that I’m looking for! And when I shower up to these events it’s what I expect!
Simple easy In love that I can be anywhere in America and open this app and find like minded people and always safe... So far... And I've been using meet up since 2011
Best way to find people with like interests nearby I never knew so many people so close we’re available at the touch of a button
Great way to meet up with people with similar interests and do fun things! So easy to use. Events go right to my Google calendar.  I would have loved this years ago!

Very convenient! The app is very user-friendly and easy to navigate. The one thing I have not figured out yet is how to edit my new Meetups in the app. If there is a way to do that, it’s not terribly obvious to me. But other than that it’s a great app!
Meet up app: It’s a great way for people to connect with other people and their community they might never come in contact with but have similar interests.

Good but little sticky It’s design n purpose and flow is good. But I don’t know if it’s apple issue or the app.  It doesn’t always work well just how it’s meant.  However that could also be my internet connection or phone carrier
Pretty good app I’ve been able to join some groups and meet some people playing interested in the same kind of events.
My social calendar In the day of antisocial social media, thanks for making it easier to meet new friends by creating an app that allows me to get out into the real world!

Girlfriends in paradise What a fantastic way to meet a variety of interesting women and do so many fun activities. Whether we meet st the beach or meet for a delicious dinner, we are guaranteed to meet women looking to have fun and make new friends.
Super user friendly The only thing I would say is this app should advertise more. I love it though so much that, that is why I wish more people knew about it

Not a Hook Up APP! Love this app and all the wonderful fun I’ve had meeting people with similar interests as myself.  It’s not another cheesy dating app either.  Just cool fun people who meet up and get to know each other.
Meet up Lots of wonderful information and many things to do, many people to meet!

Not correct location After I signed up and log in, all I see are the groups in Washington when I live in Oregon. Non of the groups appear in Oregon where I live. The app never asked me for my state nor there is option to change location. This app is useless for me.
Much improved!!! The app has improved ten fold! It can still be glitchy and a wee bit delayed in new activity/email info, but over all it is great!
Awesome App everyone should have If you’re trying to network or find friends in a new state or a new job, whatever the case...everyone should utilize this app!

Love Meetup! As an event host, Meetup works well for organization of events and I love how many people find me without ever having known of my events before.  It’s been a great way of growing my audience and allowing new leads to find me.

Genius I’m in love with the whole concept!  The functionality and the beauty of Meetup is great.  Only complaint is the messaging portion is slow and needs a few tweaks to improve seamless communication.
Many choices Love MeetUp.  So many groups and activities to choose from.  Have really enjoyed the events I attended and the people I have met.  I mostly do the hikes, but may branch out soon.
Something For Everyone No reason to feel left out of things with this accessible app.
Great, safe way to make new friends. It’s hard these days to make connections with others with similar interests. Meetups solves that problem!  Try it- you’ll like it!
Not bad. Overall good I do wish it had a better search feature and if you had private message from someone, know what groups you have in common with them.
Great User Experience. It always has the info I need at the right time in the right place, making it the kind of seamless usage that feels like magic. Great job team.
Amazing I have such a better life now! I have met new people and do fun exciting things I wouldn’t have done otherwise. I am new to the area and Meetup helps me think outside of the box.
Meet Up So far I have only been to one event.  It was very friendly and social.  I made 2 new friends that I will see again.  Looking forward to the next event.
Just what I needed. Who knew.  Never thought I’d be able to find something like this.  So easy to use too.  Thanks, this app has something for everyone.

I enjoy I love the sessions. It gives me a chance to meet like-minded writers who aren’t just sitting next to me in a class. By and large, the participants are closer to my age than those with whom I take Writing classes at BSU. Nice atmosphere for fellowship.
Super convenient! Love this app! Makes it easy to connect with like-minded people and check my notifications. I use it more than the website.
Meet up Terrific app connecting people of common interests. Many times it allows the members of the particular group to upload photos of a field trip.
This MeetUp app works great! I don’t really have a lot to say about this app except that it works, and makes it so much easier to stay in the loop when you’re on the go!

Great app! I needed to find a group for creative writing and I found tens very close to me! It’s a great app to get in touch and partecipate to this kind of things that otherwise it’s hard to know about
Meetups sre great! If you find meetups with your interests you’ll be able to have instant rapport and make new friends- while having the opportunity to share and enhance your interests.
Simple and easy to work with Pretty simple and easy to work with. Has crashed on me a couple of times but besides that, it's super user friendly.
Overbooked picks the best books I just finished my first book with Overbrooked book club and all I can say is wow, if all the other books are this good this group is going to be very popular!
Just be safe Like any thing now days. So far I’ve had some great times. Again play it safe. Take some one with you the first time. Never meet in a dark spot and yes I was a Cop. But have fun! I do!
Great App for keeping active I love that Meet Up allows one to stay as active as you choose in any area of interest you choose. Plus the bonus is you are able to meet people and make friends.
What a shame Well. Haven’t we improved! With a nice simplified look & feel, I never feel the need to print a Meetup’s details. I haven’t tried all the features yet, but so far so good!
A great way to meet people I’ve lived in a number of places in the world, and I’ve found this a great way to quickly connect with people and make friends.

Adult 101 Very informative, the people were friendly, the atmosphere was warm and welcoming.  It gave me an interest to bring others to and it made me want to contribute more information to my community.

Great support group!! I was surprised when I walked into room full of people were on similar paths to mine.  How amazing to be in the energy of those who truly want to make a difference in the world. Go Light workers Go!
If you could only delete messages All good, does what it’s supposed to do. However, you can’t delete any private messages you receive. Totally annoying since at least 70% is spam/ crap.
Takes networking to a whole ‘nother level How easy can it be, pick your interests, select a group, show up and make friends.

Like it but how do I family enable I like this app but how do I enable family sharing ?  Also when I am browsing for the day or a week’s activities some groups come up which I have no interest in—can I delete them permanently if I can do this I would give a rating of five
Great way to Network Easy to use app. Gives tons of meetups to choose from. A new way of networking and learning something new without spending anything.

Great App I have found Meetup a great app for people with similar interests to communicate online and in person. There’s very wide and diverse interest groups to become involved in. Thank you to the developers and leaders!
Solid Easy to navigate and intuitive. So far, so good. I specifically enjoy the see events organized by certain days... this week, today, etc.

Have the developers actually used the app? Appears you can’t turn off notifications about ultra random new groups that have started up. I frankly don’t care that a “new meetup” group entitled “60+ice cream social” has started in my city. Lots of updates to their user interface and yet none of them any better than the last.

Great app! I love this app. It sets reminders for everything, and I especially appreciate being reminded of events that I am interested in and don’t yet know if I can commit. I plan on meeting a lot of new friends!

It’s all here No matter what your interests are, you’ll find it here. Found social meet up, networking for the pool Service I want to start, & comedy to make you laugh on those bad day.  This app is great!!
Works great This app is user friendly. Everything I need has a link that’s easy to find, and the app doesn’t have any bugs that I’ve noticed.
Like the app Meet up give the members of our organization a way to communicate with out having to log on to a website or send mass emails.

Great way to meet up This app is a great way to look for activities and meet people and make friendships! There is literally a lots of meet ups about a lots of movements and activities, classes, yoga you name it. This is awesome.

Great ways to get plugged into any city As a traveler, I’m always on the go and never in the city for very long - Meetup has made it easy to interact and find other people that have the same Interests.
Meetup has created a wonderful level of activity for me I am not that well but the photo meet-ups when I can make it, have created a new world for me to explore
Great Being a woman, I know it sounds silly but I am
Love the groups and the app makes it even better Awesome App. It allows me to scan events without having to log in each time.
Get out! Great way to meet others and socialize while doing things everyone likes. Recently used the app to volunteer with trail maintenance. Loved every experience so far.
Meet up I’ve made many new friends through this app. If you want more human connection, this group is the place to find it!
Good way to meet people Being single again I was looking for ways to meet people with common interests. This has been good for me to meet people my age and connect
A great way to meet like minded people! Whether you like to hike, run, dance or enjoy a nice restaurant, you will meet another group that likes to do just that. I’ve met many interesting people.
Keeps you in touch This app makes it easy to keep in touch with your groups especially if you have several meetups!
Convenient and Easy This is a nice app when it comes to organizing groups.  It’s both fast and simple to use—highly recommended!

Life saver I’m new in town and Meet-up made it really easy for me to get out and about! I have joined 3 new groups and have attended 3 different activities .... I mean, What’s not to love about that!! Thanks meet-up 💋
Love getting out and meeting new people Meetup makes it easy to find people who are into what you’re into and want to actually hang out in the real world.
I’ll do it all! I love learning and meeting people. Every experience has been rewarding! I highly recommend this app for everyone. I promote it as often as possible!
Great way to meet new people. We just moved to a new city and don’t know anyone here. This app will help us learn more about the city and meet new people Who have the same interests as us.
Confused so far.. I can’t join a group because a don’t have a profile & pic.
Fun App! Lots of options for social activities. There’s quite a variety of groups to join. Definitely something for everyone! I’m totally enjoying it.
The best app ever! This app is a fabulous way to meet new people and do activities you didn’t think existed at reasonable prices or even for free. This app is especially great if you’re traveling!
It’s a great way to get out! I’ve enjoyed my experiences on this app. It’s easy to see what’s next on a calendar for a meet up and it’s layout is easy. All in all, worth having 🤙
Nice group, very friendly people. Makes me feel more normal as a single person knowing others who are single also.

Good if you live in the right spot My first meetup went great and I’m glad that I got the opportunity to meet new people. Obviously results may vary, but if you live in a populated area I’d give this app a try.
Helps Much Being a single mom & no family in this area; this app was so helpful to find people with the same interests to get me out of the house & do the things I love.
Great new friends. Wonderful way to meet new people and to get involved in project you really love. I have made so many great friends on meetup and would recommend it to everyone.
Meet Up group As a newbie to meditation, I found a number of groups at different times/locations and find it quite interesting to learn mindfulness through meditation
Great for meeting people I actually made a great friend at an event and continue to be opened to opportunities.
Works as advertised Everything that I read in the description works as advertised. This is a great tool to get out there and meet people who do what you love to do!
Simple to manage Much easier to use the app when you are out and about headed to a meet up. I can’t Believe I waited so long to start using the app
Worth it So far my experiences using meet up have been great. I’ve been able to find all kinds of different groups with great people.
So great! I found so many new friends with this app! Very easy to use and get the hang of, i would recommend this app to any one who wants to just meet people and have fun.
Online to offline This is the bast app to move your online self into the offline real world!  I’ve been using this app for 13 years and counting. It’s the best. All over the world.
Excellent for lonely people Every group you can imagine is available to connect with. Notifications are prompt and make scheduling easy.

Very useful app This app is very useful for meeting new people and finding fun activities in the area. I am giving it four stars because it bombards me with emails even after I've attempted to change my email settings.
Easy to use Overall, I like this app, however unless you get into the settings and limit the area, you’ll get way too many emails about groups too far away.

Get out and have fun! The Meetup app is great for connecting with people who share similar interests. Easy to use and inspiring to see so many diverse groups. Philadelphia has got it going on! Get out and have fun!
Good for meeting likeminded folk This app you can just about anyone who’s interested in what you like. Very useful in finding also local activities in your area

Good app I like the app overall but it’s so expensive to run a group. Ive joined a couple groups over time and enjoyed them but I would like to start my own. I cannot afford it without a guarantee that people will join it

Clean and Organized, simple and sweet I think this app is by far the best that there is for meeting and enjoying hobbies. I do hope it continues to grow, and I hope more and more people gain awareness of it.
Works Well, might look better Might Look better with brighter colors and margins. Sometimes the lines and comment boxes are hard to see. Overall, I can use it, but could be better!
Rainbow springs This was my first time with this group and also at the springs. I had a great time. The group was friendly and being at the springs was really nice. Can’t wait for the next outing.
Definitely worth it. I’ve been using this app for like five years.  I have made many great friendships in various locations through meetup activities. :-)
Very convenient I’m enjoying using meet up to connect with fellow photographers and hikers. Good tools for describing the event and the location. Also sharing photos after the event.

Great app I’ve met a bunch of nice people through this app. It’s a great way to meet new people and do new things. It keeps me and my family out of the house once in awhile so to keep us from feeling trap in here over the winter months.

The Perfect APP to Meet great people I’ve been using this APP for 4 years and I’ve met so many people in certain groups. Meeting someone that enjoy the same activities is a joy to the heart. I can’t wait to host a GAME OF THRONES watch party....LOL
Community in a digital age I love Meetup. Through the different changes in my life, I could always find friends and activities that matched my interests and help me develop a wider range of friends.
Lots of options I have a lot of options when it comes to finding fitness interests near me. Even if I’m traveling I can find interests near me. Very convenient and helpful.
Great app Had it on my phone for quite awhile before I actually used it but once I did I was really impressed. Used it to join some groups and get out of my comfort zone big time last night
Great way to connect I recommend this app to people all the time who are having a hard time meeting people doing things they like to do
Awesome app I love the meetup app. Keeps me in the loop on what’s happening local with my network and in the city. I also love that I can manage my own group very easily and keep everyone connected.
Easy to use and great for a new social life The app is easy to navigate and find new groups. I’m definitely glad to be joining new groups and making new friends.
UPDATE - from great to worst to great again (not Trump style)! The app went from intuitive to difficult to navigate and now has become great to use again!
Great app Also great way to meet new and likeminded peeps that are super friendly. I always recommend this app and site to people that are looking for a way to get out and have fun.

Connect with friends, meet new ones Convenient tool for connecting with long time friends at planned events with clubs and good way to meet new friends. Most of the features work reliably. Easy to use interface.
I am feeling luck I found this app On my way to making new friends and family thanks to this app and what is has to offer. I hope many people join and make it a bigger success.

Great way to meet new people I have been using Meetup for many years, from the West Coast, to Texas, and now in South Carolina. It’s a great way to meet new people when moving to a new city. Highly recommend!
Great way to meet like-minded people I’ve really enjoyed finding like-minded people in so many areas of interests. It’s easy to use, and there are so many different groups to join. Love it!
Fantastic Tool This app has been fantastic for both personal and professional networking. Love that so many community groups can be found in one place!

Nice way to mingle while traveling I love to use Meet Up when I’m traveling because allows me to meet with locals and talk or do something I otherwise wouldn’t do. MU is a great way to find cool stuff to do.
Amazing! Whoever came up with the idea for Meetup is brilliant. I run 3 groups on here for the past 4 years and it has been life-changing! The app is easy to use. I rarely go on my computer.
New Member I wish I found this app years ago! Looking forward to connecting with my community through interests I love. Excited about the potential!
Great way to find new things to do Whatever you are looking for....friends, activities, groups, there are a lot to choose from!
Great opportunity to meet people and find what you’re looking!! I needed to meet new people and to find a group  that have the same interests of what I was looking.
New for me Just joined today and found several groups of interest. Looking forward to making and meeting new friends.
Love It! Thanks to this app I’ve been able to join various meetup groups and had a chance to network with people within my career field.
So easy to use Really impressed so many suggestions of fun things to do. I am moving to a new country and this app will help me make friends and find things to do.
Great way to meet like minded people When I moved here 6 years ago, I knew few people. But, through MeetUp, I have met many new friends, learned new skills, and had a great time doing it.
Connection at my fingertips I enjoy having my meet up info with me. My one concern is I would prefer my meet up schedule to be the first thing when I open the app instead of lower on the page.
Excellent app I’ve been using it for years but during Covid it has been essential! So many new friends I’ve met over zoom and go to meeting meetups!
Fabulous Opportunities Meetup provides so many great opportunities to meet other people in your area. It is an especially phenomenal way to move into a new city! People need people!
Great and easy to use This app has been very handy with planning, organizing and attending all the various events I am regularly involved in. It’s a major time saver. Highly recommended!

Notifications Please make sure you bring back notifications for discussions in groups.  Whenever someone posts one of these, it does not tell us that a new discussion has been implemented.  A year ago this works, but now it does not.
Great app This app has helped my business growth already just in the few meeting and networking events I have attended.
Easy to Use and Great to Find People I used this app to find many different groups across a wide range of interests. It’s great to use to meet people and find fun things to do.

Meetup is THE BEST!! Have had so many fun, free, random experiences & met great people through this app. As a single woman in a new city, Meetup has made my life a series of new adventures I would never have had on my own.
Pool Night at Fast Eddies The group was small but just enough. I enjoyed meeting new people and I though it was AWESOME that I new some embers. My Rachel is a happy cute little host, she was a doll.
Definitely the best local meetup app I like how you can see who else will be attending events. It’s nice to get a feel for who’s going and read people’s comments for the event.
Great Resource My husband and I just moved from CA to NC and we were able to find a WFPB group of people who meet at different residents each week. We found our community!
Great way to meet people & have fun This app is brilliant! There is something for everyone. If you can’t find a special interest group, start one! It’s super easy.
Its great! This app allows you to meet up and network with people in your city that you would never cross paths with on your own. Its great for people moving to a new city.
Meetups are Great I travel for work and Meetups help me make new friends and find fun things to do all over the US. I’m grateful to have this tool and it has been very helpful to keep me plugged in.
This app is great I’ve been using meetup for four years and I haven’t had any issues with the app and most of the groups I’ve gone to have been good.

Meetup is a fun and easy way to meet people I just recently started using meetup and I must say it is a super fun way to meet people with the same interests as me. I am very happy with the people I have meet on meetup!
Mah Jongg I’ve been using this app for a few years now. I’ve met so many nice people and look forward to playing as often as I can.

Great way to keep up with Meetup Easy way to keep up to date with Meetup groups and interact without being bombarded with notifications. Just enough reminders and surveys to provide feedback to the organizers.
Modern Day Event Planner!! I don’t have to do anything except ask to join groups that sound appealing to me! And the rest is magic! Oh and I have to actually show up to the event!
MeetUp App = A Fun Way to have Fun! And it is easy to run around and view various Groups to see what they are up to and determine if you are going to join them.
Great way to connect MeetUp is the best way to get to know people & the areas you’re interested in. So many subjects of interest. Runs the gamut. A lot of fun to search through.
A place to make friends I’ve been to a few meet ups:) I’ve made some friends and always had a great time doing stuff I’m interested in and love!
Great way to find like minded people when you’re from out of the area. I really enjoy meeting new people. It’s hard when you don’t drink or go to clubs.
Quick and easy A quick and easy way to see events that are happening Iocally that I am interested in!
Great Idea What a wonderful concept!  It’s nice for a person to find groups for activities they enjoy without the pressure of finding someone else who wants to do them.
Extra help Amazing experience, everyone needs to find their higher calling.. This group was so amazing and welcoming. Can’t wait to come again!
Simple to use and compatible with iOS calendars I am impressed with notifications and the calendar updates done without much effort

Still waiting for fix Ever since I upgraded to a new iPhone over a month ago, I've been unable to access any content having to do with meetings -- when, where, etc. This makes the app basically useless. When I notified the developers, they said they were aware of the problem. That was it. No word on when it might get fixed.
Happy group of people to be with Iv been in this group awhile now,and I’m just happy to know these kinds of groups are perfect for the lonely souls out there including myself. Thank you.
Pretty pleased Generally very happy with the app.

Awesome app!! I struggle with isolating, and for me this app makes all the difference! It helps to find people who have common interests and planned get planned get-togethers. I highly recommend giving it a try!
Meetup app is excellent The meetup app is easy to use  and had all the functionality of going onto your computer.  Recommend using the app if you go to meetups.
Helpful! Messaging feature, easy survey feedback, notification updates, clean interface

Gave me a new life! This is an amazing idea and I can’t wait for the possibility of meeting new people to be completely destigmaized, having moved to a new area I was totally alone and this app gave me such joy and positivity.
Bibbzma Been using this site for checking out crafting events in my area.  Great way to search for events and meeting new people who share you interests!
Fun way to meet people! It’s a nice way to meet new people and to get out of the house!  Bring out your adventurous side and try out new things without being judged !
Fun It’s fun people organize events and you just say whether or not you are going. Convenient If you wanna new new people, are new to the area, or just wanna try something new
Meet Up is awesome I truly appreciate the opportunities this app offers. I’m able to connect with like minded individuals and collectively grow through our interaction! Well done, Meet Up!

Great! Meetup is the perfect social site to engage in things that interest you! Don’t miss that concert, travel, get fit, try that new restaurant. New in town? Join meetup and make new friends and create great memories!

Life Changing Made new friends, developed new hobbies, learned new cultures and explored new places. Could not be possible without Meetup and its community and people who arrange it. Did not know that an app would shape my life😁

Meetup is awesome So glad I found Meetup! Making new friends and having a blast doing it! So many activities Super Bowl parties, bands, movie nights, dinner, and lots of dancing! Join, you’ll be so glad you did!
Really helpful app This app is well organized and makes it easy to find information within my meetup group
Great connections This is a great app that I started using when I moved to a new city.  I love having social options at my finger tips. Easy to add and delete groups as well as rsvp for events.
Awesome! Especially for those new to an area Great app.
Awesome! Especially for those new to an area Great app.

Great app lot of functionality Accomplishes what it needs to. Would be great to have more control on messaging subgroups or the ability to pm certain people and have all part of the same conversation.
A Platform of Services Meetup is a platform of services for personal and business whether you want to find a group or create a group!
Made for everyone Meet up has changed the way professionals get together and become better at what they were born to do.

Overall Great app I like the app and have had mostly good experiences.  Really don’t care for emails to meet up groups and conservatives or other possibly racist/bigoted groups though so better filters would be a great thing.
Makes Meet Ups easier I wanted to access Meetup through my phone so i could upload photos easier.

Lover of the social life! Grateful for this app and all the amazing people that participate to make it fun, no matter where you live, no matter your budget and no matter how busy your life is or what your age is!
Easy to Find things to do I appreciate being able to keep with my groups and stay engaged

Calle Ocho photo walk I arrived late and missed the group. Spent about two hours shooting in a new place and enjoyed myself. Thinking of returning next weekend. I’m so sorry for missing the group but it turned out to be a good opportunity for me.
Greater for meeting new people I personally enjoy using this app to see what other groups are in my area and it also helped me to be organized with my meetings.
Great app and community Can’t say enough good things about Meetup. Download it and check it out for yourself. If you’re in a medium to large city, there are probably plenty of groups.
Meet new people while doing what you love Great way to find people in your area that are interested in doing things that you like to do
Meet up This app is fantastic. You can find groups of people interested in just about anything. A way to connect to like minds. Give it a try.
Great! Since using this app I have met many great people with similar likes in activities, books, travel, etc.
6 stars This app is changing the landscape. Getting likeminded people together that would have to search high and low otherwise.
Great Networking App It doesn’t matter what you’re looking for if it involves networking you can find it here or at least find something close
Would rate it higher if it consistently worked at times it is difficult to connect Good app love it wish I could use it consistently but my apple phone has issues with opening apps

Great way to meet like minded individuals who share a passion I’ve mainly used this app to meet people to share camping and backpacking. So far, it’s been a great way to meet people who share your interests.
The recently added feature to save events is helpful The recently added feature to save events is helpful
Great way to keep in touch with humanity😊 Nice to know there’s always something to do with new faces and part of a social group. Makes it easier to meet people.
Great place to find local activities. Great app for finding activities in my area. Searching for activities in each group is easy to navigate.
So many interesting meetups around Love the app, I’ve done so much already! It would be great to add people as friends later on, sometimes you forget exchange numbers.
Join a Meet up Whatever your interests are there's a Meet up group for you tonight. Off you can't find one you're looking for then create one!

The Best I’ve lived in 4 different cities and have uses MeetUp everytime. It’s clutch and has definitely helped me make friends and helped me learn more about where I live. Perfect app for someone with Social Anxiety Disorder.
Very nice app to use Used couple months ago and right now come back again to this app to use it. Like a interface and structure of the app.
Nice Little App It works well.  I'm able to see upcoming Meetups and RSVP easily.  I love that the app makes it easy to pull up a Meetup on my phone to double check details at the last minute.
Just go I’ve been a member for awhile but hadn’t attended any events until this weekend. Thank you for having a space for like minded people to explore and come together!
Great way to reach out This is a fantastic means of meeting people with similar interests. Even if you don’t make friends, you still can have fun at an event with others.
Meetup app makes it easy! The Meetup mobile app makes it much easier to jump on the site from wherever I am, and I find it very user friendly.
Get for connecting I would not have been able to find some of the connections that I have without Meetups. It’s a great way to find like minded folks.
Meet-up A great way to try new things. A way to meet new people that you might never have met. I have been using it for the last three years and been able to do some very fun activities.
Great webinar. Clear and efficient meeting. This was a clear webinar that was highly efficient in its service for our group to enlarge and discuss without any technical issues.
There’s a group for everyone Love that I can browse through and find groups that have things in common with.
Fun Times! I love that I get out and do social things based on my hobbies. I am able to find fun things to do based on my schedule and meet nice people as well. Great Experience!!
Good app The app is really good, the only knock is that notifications (even when correctly set to notify) aren’t consistent, we’re that resolved for myself and others, this would be a 5 star app

No iPad version Great app for the phone, but I generally use my iPad in landscape mode with a Bluetooth keyboard (like a notebook computer). The app only works in portrait mode. Hopefully the app will be updated so it works landscape too.. doesn’t seem like it would be too hard to do that
Fun Stuff This is an awesome app if you want to meet people according to the things you like to do! Pick what you like & join people who like the same thing!

Cannot create an account through the app It won’t let me create an account. When I try to create one with my google email, it won’t upload a profile photo. I also tried using my Facebook account to create an account but it keeps around in circles from “open the Facebook app” to Facebook and back to open the Facebook app. So frustrating!! 😔😔
Works well I’ve been using for about 2 years and have no complaints, intuitive, does it’s job well.
Very intuitive app Meetup is easy to use and provides endless opportunities to make new connections and network with people that share common interests.
Welcoming I played pickle ball for first time. Everyone was welcoming & friendly. It was an enjoyable experience & I can’t wait to play again as my schedule allows
Definitely brings people together Take a risk and try a group.

Doesn’t work 99% of the time I open the app and get an error message immediately. Even when I don’t, trying to do anything yields an error message. Search? Error. Tap on an event or group? Error. This is with a strong internet connection. I’ve tried several times over several different days in several different locations - same result.

Pizza Class Andrew and Katarina were fantastic!  Andrew was very organized and humorous.  The food was great from the anti pasta to the black and white cookies.  The group of people that attended were also great. I want to attend more classes of his!
Really Enjoying MeetUp This app has made it so easy to find events with like minded individuals going on in NYC! It is very simple to use and the notifications and reminders are helpful.

Great community resource, one glitch. Meetup is a great thing, even more so because the mobile apps are so useful. But on iPhone 11, I can’t seem to like or reply to comments. Since I’m an event host this is a big problem. Please fix!
Meet Up Love this app. We were new to this area and we were able to find open play pickleball. People were so friendly and welcoming!

Love Meetup I move a lot and Meetup has been instrumental in getting to meet like-minded people in the communities I live in and also helps me stay involved in and give back to the communities I live in.

author_name: Carole B of Ft Collins CO
review_body: Works great for our group We use Meetup for reservations for our group events (30-40 per month). It works well; members reserve a spot cancel if needed and our host knows how many to expect whether it’s an in home event or a public venue. Great!

Exceptional Patti was a refreshing rain after dry spell.  I recommend her to all. She advised you on what the meetup entailed. She provided a short video presentation that would help you under her life’s work.

Very useful so far A good experience so far, except for the Notification alert, which does not indicate which item/post has the alert. Have to stumble around looking for it. That’s not very productive.
Amazing app You get to meet up with interesting people while going and enjoying the things that you like from the group

Good way to meet. Coming to a new city, with no social circle ? This is a great way to meet people without the super awkward ice-breaking phase. People at those meeting groups are normally very nice and welcoming. I’m growing my circle and also finding potential partners via all the various events found in this app.
LOVE I get to connect with people that are into the same things as me and in today’s age and time that is not always easy to do. Meetup is my favorite app and my only form of social media. LOVE IT
Great app I have yet to actually meet up, but there are sooo many options and it’s fantastic! I highly recommend this if you’re new in town.
Great place to find people with similar interest Great place to find people with similar interest, have been using this app for years
Really enjoying this app Gone to two separate tech meetups so far, and I intend to go to many more. Great platform for finding and setting up networking events.
Great group! Can always find something with this group & meet some great people.
Great app Great app to connect with people with specific interests. I’ve been on here since 2000 and when I want to explore a certain interest, I look for a meetup and meet new people. ☺️
Great way to find quick fun things to do This has always been a greasy place to meet new people and try new things.

Useless, with eternal load times This is currently the worst app on my phone. Chat feature send push alerts with no content; and can’t view threads in the app. Difficulty registering or viewing events in app. But GOOD NEWS EVERYONE! You can perfectly view infinite obnoxious “suggested” meetups and their events...you’ll just never be capable of interacting with the content you actually want to see. 👎🏻
Meet up at a glance Appreciate having an calendar update with opportunity to do things with others who share my interests.
Great For People Trying TonBe More Social There’s something for everyone here and if not, you can create a place for people who you have things in common with.
Awesome way to find events and groups ! Love how easy it is to search interests and find potential groups and events to look into. Really enjoying!
Meet up app Works very smoothly and delivers information about all meet up’s pretty consistently. Overall a nice way to stay in touchWith what’s going on.
meeting new people I really like meeting new people! doing new things!
Make new friends locally If your new to the area or just need to make new friends this is a great app just browse by keywords and find groups that share you interests.
Easy to use A great app for staying connected through your various meet up groups. It’s extremely easy to use and navigate.
A Great Way to Meet New People! I love being able to find others that share the same interests and doing activities together.
Very thought provoking Wonderful innovative ideas for a person just starting out.  I look forward to the next meeting!!

Meetup Review Excellent resource for keeping people informed of activities taking place in the community. Enables Meetup users to connect with others having similar interests and start new friendships.

This app is awful! This app is awful! It crashes a lot of the times & other times, it doesn’t load as it should! I am trying to edit my group settings, doing exactly as they instructed & it doesn’t load the page. The notifications button doesn’t even load when I use it! The entire website & app is counterintuitive!
It’s a good start to finding options Using this app I’m able to find things to do that can take boredom away or help me learn new things.

Great App!!! It’s been a fantastic & useful app! There’s tons to do in my city through this app & I’ve met many great people. There’s even lots of meetups with fellow dog owners that I’ve really enjoyed! I strongly recommend...
Great place He had a very large party and the service was efficient and knowledgeable .  The atmosphere did not feel “stuffy” and the food was delicious.  We will definitely return

Ok - awaiting new features Looking forward to MeetUp keeping up with features available in other apps - more seamless picture posting (multi select); spam / flirting detection; lower cost for yearly fee or better communication on why MeetUp is better than other platforms.
Makes meeting easy! Great for finding groups of people in my new town with similar interests. I like the reminders, the directions and rsvp features.
Great way to meet people! I love the feature where you can automatically add items to your personal calendar. App is easy to use.
Happy Happy! What a great app to bring people together. As a person new to the city—it was a wonderful way to do things and meet people with similar interest. Thank you!
Great platform Very helpful especially for those who frequently relocate. Thanks for providing people with means to get them closer in a tech dominantly world that made us further away

Meetup is Everything! I have met some of the most Amazing people. Not just locally but when I travel as well! I’m a real estate investor and Meetup has allowed me to meet my mentors. Thank you!! Meetup was the best idea ever!
Sing Together with OC Sound! Most fun and welcoming group of women!
Fabulous app for meeting new people! This app makes it really easy to meet new people who share your interests. I am really enjoying the connections I have made!
Great way to meet people. After college it’s pretty hard to make close friends but I’ve made a lot of friends through this app.
Great Opportunities in New City Lots of options and a great resource. Would love a calendar feature, an easy way to see all the events going on. But truly no complaints
Awesome way to meet like minded people No matter what you're into, there are others that are too. I've met so many different diverse people through this app.

Great tool to stay active in life Life has much to show, new friends, new hobbies, new locations & yes some locations are old. Enjoy, live love laugh 2018. Thank you Meetup for designing this tool for so many
Thank you Great teachers , they will definitely help you clear your mind from any negatives thoughts you might have and you will leave in peace and clarity . Thank you
Great but also clumsy Meetup app is a great way to find groups that interest you and to socialize, learn, and expand your knowledge in an easy way.

Here’s the place to meet new friends Always enjoy the events and groups on the Meetup app. Great way to meet people in town with your same interests. From hiking, running, dancing, potlucks, keto or vegan. It’s got it all!

Meetup This is new to me. I am astounded at all the fun things you can do. The variety and diversity is awesome. I just started joining so I’m not out there yet but I’m loving the topics/choices and looking forward to the meetups.
Meetup app is a great idea I have been using this app for quite a few years, both to form a group & to look for existing ones.
Great Way to Create meetings! I have never used this app before and now Im sorry I didn’t find it earlier! I had interest in my meetup from 20 people in one day! Great way to create meetups!
New In Town I recently moved to Jacksonville. I was looking for a way to connect with new people and do some networking. My son and a friend suggested the ‘Meetup’ app!
Great service and app I love using meetup to find like minded groups as well as hosting them myself. The app ties in to the website wonderfully and makes editing on the fly easy.
Awesome idea/app Love it! But...

This app was great one year ago What happened with this app? Notifications are sent but there are no messages or discussions cannot load. The majority of the groups don’t open, there is no description of groups, everything feels like I am blind and I am hitting every wall possible...
Works great No real issues I’ve found. Pic upload works great, notifications aren’t over bearing once you get them to your liking. All in all, good app.
Love Meetups We love meet up groups because everyone has something in common. Be it hiking, running, movies, motorcycle riding, whatever your likes are. These meetups get you up and out.
So convenient This app helps manage my schedule perfectly. Provides updates continuously and organizes all the events that I’m going to.
Wonderful app for meeting your local community I’ve been organizing meetups for the crypto community for a few months and I’ve been having a great time doing it.
Bored no more I have been a member for numerous years both in Illinois and Las Vegas area and have made good friends and enjoyed the experiences I would not have known about were it not for Meet up
Creating communities Great in finding like-minded people in an area. Notifications are easy to set so I only get the ones I want. Made new friends last week!
So far, so good Just moved to a new city 1,200 miles from home and I have had this app 2 day - already connecting people/groups that I’m interested in. Should be great!!
Great for moving to new areas I recently moved to the San Diego area and I have found the meet up app to be extremely helpful finding things to do events to attend and cool people to meet.

Uploaded photos are cumbersome to view Photos take forever to view in the “Highlight” section, even with a fast WiFi connection! Why does it take almost a minute in some cases to view an already uploaded photo? Can this somehow be optimized?
Easy I find it extremely easy ti find the meets I am want to try and enough information is given in order to make a decision to join.

Meeting others This app is pretty amazing I honestly don’t have many friends but I love to socialize and mingle this app makes it easy to meet new great people and friends that are interested in things that I also am interested in!!!
Meetup! Being new to certain places, this gives you the chance to really put yourself in the place of the locals to get adjusted and make friends. Great app!
Great way to get out there and meet people. New to town?  Looking to get out and do things?  Meetup has provided me with many opportunities to do both. Glad I found this app.
Great app Great way to keep in touch on various issues, but there have been some changes and it is hard to leave reviews now.

Meet up Meet up should be used for services that are true to what you do. I think it’s a good platform for things to do and meeting people. Especially in the gay community. Why doesn’t someone build a lesbian only bar?????
My gateway to a new social life When I first got separated and eventually divorced I stumbled on to the Meetup site and the App.
Easy to use I love the meet up app because it’s easy to use and I’m able to find the type of groups and interests that I have in such an easy manor.

App is great I’m not I really love this app, the biggest problem with me is I travel for work, and mostly weekends. So I miss ALL the meetups I want to go to, however I hear they are great and the app does what it’s meant to do

Super Frustrated Organizer Why is there no iPad app? I am trying to manage my group from the iPhone app on an iPad, and let me tell you, it is PAINFUL. The interface is slim and Portrait-mode only, the forward and backward functionality is limited as is the editing functions. It’s hard even to find events to edit or create them. Please create an app for iPad. In the meantime, I’m going back to the website.
